name: Union EXP
attributes_description: Union Level EXP. Obtained from exploration.
bg_description: Rich experience helps to adapt to the survival rules of this world.

name: Shell Credit
attributes_description: The universal currency issued by Huanglong, officially recognized across many regions.
bg_description:
In the ancient past, the ancestors of Huanglong utilized seashells as currency. Though the manufacturing techniques have evolved over time, the shell-like appearance of this currency has endured. 
"As a witness, it preserves the history of our people."

name: Astrite
attributes_description: The precious remnants of the civilization reverberate within... Perhaps they hold infinite possibilities.
bg_description: Echoes from distant planets have found their way here from the vast expanse of the universe. In the starry night, the symphony of civilizations from untold light-years away resonates.

name: Lunite
attributes_description: Within the changing Lunite lies a treasure known as truth... Perhaps it reveals everything about the past and the future.
bg_description: The moon has long been shattered by the Waveworn Phenomenon. What we observe is nothing but the past's mirage.

name: Waveplate
attributes_description:
Waveplates gradually restores over time and there is a storage limit.
Astrites can be consumed to exchange for Waveplates.
bg_description: Data values reflecting the real-time status of the Resonator. When the Resonator is active, the Waveplate gradually depletes. Once it reaches a critical level, the Resonator's mobility becomes restricted.

name: Crystal Solvent
attributes_description: Obtain 60 Waveplates after use.
bg_description: A necessary solvent for Resonators. It not only helps stabilize themselves but also enhances the numerical level of Waveplates.

name: Sanhua's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Sanhua's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Baizhi's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Baizhi's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Chixia's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Chixia's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Encore's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Encore's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Yangyang's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Yangyang's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Verina's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Verina's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Taoqi's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Taoqi's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Danjin's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Danjin's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Mysterious Code
attributes_description: Used for Rover's Ascension.
bg_description: The metal scrolls with mysterious symbols seem to be able to create some kind of connection with Rover.

name: Strife Tacet Core
attributes_description: The Crownless's drop, a Resonator's Ascension item.
bg_description: The core of Crownless's clone. Only more strife and sacrifice can mend the cracks and voids within this Tacet Core.

name: Thundering Tacet Core
attributes_description: Thundering Mephis's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: The core of Thundering Mephis. Like a miniature thunderstorm, the core radiates a dazzling light between the flashes.

name: Elegy Tacet Core
attributes_description: Mourning Aix's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: The Tacet Core of Mourning Aix, singing a never-ending elegy. Those who touch the Tacet Core will be overwhelmed by a great sense of loneliness and loss and will unconsciously shed tears. But this is not empathy, perhaps just a kind of emotional hypersensitivity.

name: Rage Tacet Core
attributes_description: Inferno Rider's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: The Tacet Core of Inferno Rider, surrounded by the never-ending fire of rage. The raging flames, fueled by the supreme clamor, vow to burn everything to ashes.

name: Roaring Rock Fist
attributes_description: Feilian Beringal's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: The rock shell covering the arm of Feilian Beringal, named for the thunderous roar of Feilian's heavy punch.

name: Gold-Dissolving Feather
attributes_description: Impermanence Heron's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: The golden feathers of Impermanence Heron, from which a dirty and rotten smell constantly flows. A researcher once tried to seal the feathers in various metal containers, but the containers would corrode in a moment.

name: Sound-Keeping Tacet Core
attributes_description: Lampylumen Myriad's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: The Tacet Core of Lampylumen Myriad, freezing the humming whispers. The surrounding sounds will be captured by the Tacet Core and turned into a cold absolute echo.

name: Group Abomination Tacet Core
attributes_description: Mech Abomination's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: The huge Clamorling hidden in the underground ruins of Court of Savantae, is a huge collection of countless program logics. The heterogeneous Tacet Core is stacked in disorder, just like the complex code of the mechanical puppet.

name: LF Whisperin Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: The Tacet Core of a feeble Whisperin. It takes the form of a broken star. Faint and deep frequencies are still lingering within the core, yet the messages they try to convey remain elusive to all.

name: MF Whisperin Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: The Tacet Core of a common Whisperin. It takes the form of a clear and complete star. Its Frequency Energy aligns with the hearing range of normal people. Yet, the question remains: what's the intention behind this imitation?

name: HF Whisperin Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: The Tacet Core of a powerful Whisperin. It takes the form of a star with sharp ridges along its outline—like an embodiment of its shrill Frequency Energy. Perhaps, its personification has already led to the Uncanny Valley effect.

name: FF Whisperin Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: The Tacet Core of a special Whisperin. It takes the form of an intricate star, bearing both recognizable and unfamiliar Frequency Energy. It seems that humans only know the tip of the iceberg of themselves.

name: LF Howler Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: The Tacet Core of a feeble Howler. It is the remaining part of a Tacetite Bloom after it withers. Despite its astonishing accuracy in mimicry, it only ends one way—reducing to a mass of twisted Frequency Energy.

name: MF Howler Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: The Tacet Core of a common Howler. After the Tacetite Bloom withers, a certain amount of Frequency Energy remains. Similar to the natural cycle of life, this frequency can probably serve as the sustenance for newcomers.

name: HF Howler Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: The Tacet Core of a powerful Howler. The fierce and untamed Frequency Energy continues to reverberate within it. Evolution is all about adapting to the environment. Who will emerge victorious from the ordeal of the devastating Waveworm Phenomenon?

name: FF Howler Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: The Tacet Core of a special Howler. It takes the form of a seed emerging from a withered Tacetite Bloom. Life is brimming with endless possibilities. This core, akin to the seed of life, also contains infinite possibilities.

name: Crude Ring
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A crude ring that serves more as an identification than for practical use. It is used to display one's commitment to sever ties with civilized society.

name: Basic Ring
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A ring with bearable quality. Apart from helping the Exiles to recognize each other's identification, it also provides various functions such as basic communication, location services, and scanning. These features assist the Exiles to better survive in the wilderness.

name: Improved Ring
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: An improved Ring, exclusive to a selected few. This ring stores a large amount of wilderness survival information. Certain entries detailing rare plants and special minerals hold academic significance compared to papers written by the Academy.

name: Tailored Ring
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A ring made of special material using unique techniques. Its owner must boast a legendary experience. Much of the information stored within it is encrypted and challenging to decipher for details.

name: Mask of Constraint
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A mask worn by Fractsidus recruits. It seems to be used to suppress the rejection reaction induced by the integration of Tacet Discords. The side effect that comes with it is the suppression of the wearer's normal human emotions. Perhaps, that's one of the designer's purposes?

name: Mask of Erosion
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A mask worn by Fractsidus active members. Due to long-term use, its ability to stabilize frequency has been greatly mitigated. One can clearly feel the torment of being drowning in negative emotions from the mask.

name: Mask of Distortion
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A mask worn by Fractsidus veterans. The original owner has now had no turning back on the road of Overclocking. Would they have chosen to wear this mask if they had foreseen all the torment and suffering that lay ahead?

name: Mask of Insanity
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A very peculiar Fractsidus mask. It would be nearly impossible for a normal person to imagine the mental state of its owner. Judging from the residual frequency on the mask, one can perceive that the owner's emotions have become severely distorted, generating frequencies that resemble Tacet Discords.

name: Monument Bell
attributes_description: Bell-Borne Geochelone's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: The ancient bell carried on the back of the Bell-Borne Geochelone. When the bell rings, the awakened past will leave a new mark in this era.

name: Wave-Cutting Tooth
attributes_description: Cetus the Tidebreaker's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: The blue spiral-shaped heteromorphic sharp tooth of Cetus the Tidebreaker, capable of cutting through waves. Legend has it that the water surface cut through by the Cetus's tooth will leave long-lasting ripples.

name: Unending Destruction
attributes_description: Scar's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: The card in Scar's hand with the mark of a black sheep. The flame attached to it seems to never extinguish. That flame will burn forever with Scar's never-ending desire for destruction.

name: Dreamless Feather
attributes_description: Dreamless's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: Emerging from the abyss with aspirations of ruling the land and the beings in Jinzhou, it now lies extinguished in the shadows, leaving behind only this feather.

name: Vitality Drink
attributes_description: Used to heal 20% of the current Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 160 HP.
bg_description: An energy drink rich in vitamins that helps invigorate the mind.

name: Single Revival Agent
attributes_description: Instantly revives a selected Resonator. Can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Single Revival Potion
[Effect] Stabilizes the Resonator's condition to a certain extent and aids in their recovery.
[Precautions] Long intervals between doses are recommended. Excessive use within a short period is not advisable.
[Warning] Prohibited to use in combination with the same type of potion or any frequency stabilizing potions.

name: Lotus Seeds
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: An aquatic plant prized for its ornamental and practical value. Its seeds are renowned for their fragrance in Jinzhou.

name: Climbing Fig
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description:
The fruit of climbing vines that thrive on the exterior walls of buildings, which is often used in desserts.
When Jinzhou people move to a new residence, it's a tradition to take a cutting from the vine growing at their old house and plant it near the new home.

name: Iris
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A plant native to Whining Aix's Mire. It symbolizes broken or concealed affection.
Affected by the continuous thundercloud weather of this place, this variant has a significantly shortened flowering period compared to its original species. A true pity, indeed.

name: Terraspawn Fungus
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: A fungus that spreads across dark soil, resembling a black lotus. Once the cap matures and darkens, it begins to liquefy and makes the ground fertile for more mushrooms to grow, hence its name.

name: Lanternberry
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A fluorescent berry growing in caves.
Before miners get down the mine in the Tiger's Maw, their family will tuck a lanternberry into their pocket, hoping its glow will lead them safely home in the midst of darkness.

name: Pecok Flower
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A vibrant flower, with its sap often processed into dye.
Known for its fragrance and water-resistant properties, the flower is commonly used to produce seal ink paste for official or personalized stamps.

name: Belle Poppy
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
Once the symbol of the Port City of Guixu, it nearly went extinct when Incinero Petals were rampant.
However, at the outskirts of the city ruins, Belle Poppy was found to bloom still at its home, having endured the disaster.

name: Coriolus
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A special fungus associated with ancient trees. Its medicinal and curative properties have been recorded in numerous medical classics of Jinzhou.
An ancient specimen is preserved in the Academy, a living relic tracing back to the era when the towering Central Banyan in the Dim Forest was not so majestic.

name: Wintry Bell
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A flower blooming on the high shores.
Legend has it that the Wintry Bell does not really wither. When the ancient bells born by the giant Turtoise in Gorges of Spirits resonate, they will rise again from the ice and snow.

name: Violet Coral
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: Violet Coral, commonly found trapped in the shallow beaches, is always revitalized with the flow and withered with the ebb.

name: Bittberry
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description:
A fruit of bitter taste and a childhood nightmare of many Jinzhou people.
Bittberry is often associated with phrases like "recall past bitterness, savor present sweetness" or "bitter food detoxifies the body".

name: Pavo Plum
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
Berries resembling feathers, the people of Hongzhen call them Linglong Hearts.
It is said to be exceedingly nutritious for the brain. But it's never seen as edible because of its extreme bitterness.

name: Pearl Leaf
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description:
Common countryside plants.
Mushed Pearl Leaves can quickly stop bleeding when applied to wounds.
Jinzhou pharmacopeia records an instance in which a Green Rabbit gnawed Pearl Leaves to accelerate the healing of wounds.

name: Dewvetch
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
A scarlet Dewvetch. Natural moisture often builds on its buds, thus it is called Dewvetch.
It is a major nectariferous plant within Huanglong. Its honey has a natural, fresh fragrance, and it is refreshing and sweet to taste.

name: Noctemint
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description: If applied externally, Noctemint soothes inflammation and relieves itching; if brewed with tea, Noctemint refreshes the user's mind. It is a daily essential, especially for warriors from the Midnight Rangers stationed in the wild. Chewing a few leaves offers a refreshing sensation from tongue to brain, assisting warriors through the enduring night.

name: Honeysuckle
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description:
Honeysuckle is named after its characteristic of two flowers blooming from one stem.
Besides its use in tea drinks and medicines, it is also a favorite ornamental pot plant in Jinzhou.

name: Perilla
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description:
Perilla is not impressive to the eye, but is known for its unique, rich aroma.
The adding of Perilla to a dish not only removes unpleasant odor, but also enhances the ingredient's freshness.

name: Angelica
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description:
A lone and tall herb. It seems that it can confront grave difficulties with a composed demeanor. In Jinzhou, it's affectionately known as the "'Cold Beauty".
This association sometimes sparks an intriguing comparison to a certain researcher from the Academy—yet, neither of them will comment on this.

name: Lemongrass
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description:
An aromatic plant native to the New Federation. It exudes a unique citrus fragrance.
The stems and leaves of Lemongrass can be used to extract essential oil, which is an ingredient for perfume, soap, or seasoning to add a flavor twist to foods.

name: Erodorchid
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
A plant that grows on the edges of Tacet Fields. It blooms even in the harsh environment.
As a saprophyte, it cannot support photosynthesis with its pale leaves, and only absorbs nutrition from decayed organisms. As it is often found blooming in areas lacking vitality, it is named "Erodorchid" by Resonators who often travel around dangerous zones.

name: Waterlamp
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
A fluorescent plant that grows by the riverbanks. They look like the lamps at the side of the ships anchoring for the night, hence the name Waterlamp.
The white pith inside Waterlamp's stem is used as wick, while the fibre of the stem skin is used for knit weaving and paper making.

name: Bunnywort
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: Common bladderwort in river crevices. An insectivorous plant that is not harmful to human. Its stamens secrete a unique fragrant substance that attracts insects.

name: Caltrop
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: The fruit of Caltrop is known as tropfruit. It is produced underwater, beneath the plant's dense leaves. To obtain the fruit, the whole plant must be picked and the leaf must be carefully removed.

name: Chromeshell
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
Chromeshell is a pearl shell. Under illumination, its nacre will glow with a strange polychrome gloss.
When it ebbs, many Chromeshells will be left on beaches.

name: Dripsnail
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
A snail with strange wave-like patterns on its shells. Usually spotted after Retroact Rains.
Dripsnail's shell can store the sound waves of specific frequencies, and once the shell is crushed, nearby creatures will hear a sound similar to the rain sound, hence the name.

name: Viola
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description:
The Exiles prefer Viola, a plant of great vitality. They cook the young shoots of Viola as a source of vegetable.
Experienced observers can determine the whereabouts of the Exiles by the distribution of Viola.

name: Cliffrecluse
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
A blossom on cliffs, swaying to the blowing of breezes.
When the flowers swing in the currents, their light gestures always leave a strong impression.

name: Umbragricus
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description: Legend has it that a traveler, who delighted in exploring mountains and rivers, stumbled upon this mushroom. Its shape, resembling a person sheltering from rain under an umbrella, inspired the traveler to name it "Umbragricus".

name: Gemberry
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: A gem-like plant with scarlet, sweet, and juicy fruit, perfect for immediate consumption or sauce making.

name: Edodes
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description: Edodes offers a richer and more tender flavor compared to common mushrooms. Simply boiling Edodes in fresh water with a pinch of salt yields a taste akin to Jinzhou Stew.

name: Gloom Slough
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
Gloom Slough is commonly found among the ruins of villages or cities, and is named for the glowing light that resembles a candle flame without the heat.
Gloom Cicada's diet is mainly fluorescent plants, and the sloughs they produce are left with the sedimented fluorescent matters from the insects' skin.

name: Fowl Meat
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description: Meat obtained from fowls. Freshly cut. Extra tender. With skilled hands, it can be transformed into exquisite dishes.

name: Feather
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: Lightweight and soft feathers that are often used in crafting of accessories or toys.

name: Raw Meat
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description: Meat obtained from animals, featuring a clean cut with distinct fat marbling. With skilled hands, it can be transformed into exquisite dishes.

name: Phoenix Butterfly
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
A large butterfly. They are often active in dense vegetation areas in woodlands or other environments. They often fly in pairs at high altitudes and feed on nectar. Hard to capture.
It is the most commonly seen butterflies because of its high reproductive ability and adaptability to the living environment.

name: Red Feather Butterfly
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: Red Feather Butterfly is a variant of the heterochrome Phoenix Butterfly family. Its overly bright coloration renders it less adaptable to various environments compared to the common Phoenix Butterfly, making it more susceptible to predators. It ranks second in terms of both quantity and rarity among the three butterfly species.

name: Blue Feather Butterfly
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: Blue Feather Butterfly is a variant of the heterochrome Phoenix Butterfly. Its genetic mutation gives it a dreamy scale color but also reduces its reproduction ability. As a result, the Blue Feather Butterfly is the rarest and most elusive of the three species.

name: Chrysopa
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
Chrysopa possesses two pairs of wings made of transparent membranes with delicate reticulate veins resembling leaves.
It primarily preys on small insects and serves as a natural predator for many pests, making it a valuable resource for biological pest control.

name: Golden-ringed Dragonfly
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: Golden-ringed Dragonfly is a wetland and water predator. Its diet includes flying insects and small fish and shrimp. It is known for rapid flying and predating speed.

name: Fish
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description: Meat obtained from fish, featuring a tender cut with a refreshing taste. With skilled hands, it can be transformed into exquisite dishes.

name: Silver-Banded Lizard
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: Carnivorous reptiles, mainly living in stone crevices or caves and other dark places. Their skin is covered with leathery scales, and their body has black and white ring-shaped patterns alternately arranged. They most feed on earthworms, snails, and insects.

name: Azure Lizard
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: Carnivorous reptiles, mainly living by waters or in wetlands. Their skin is covered with leathery scales. While their whole body is blue, musclar spines are found on their back. They favor wet, warm environments and small shrimp, crabs for diet.

name: Green Pit Lizard
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: Carnivorous reptiles, common lizards in grasslands, though occasional sightings in towns exist. They would hide themselves in parterres or plant trellis. However, as they are not poisonous, has a wide diet and a gentle temper, they are sometimes taken as pets by citizens.

name: Black-Striped Frog
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: A small frog often found on the banks of the rivers and lakes. Their habitat is often established on lush bushes. When it rains, they often come out to feed on snails and earthworms. Therefore, after rain, Black-Striped Frogs can often be seen crossing the roads in an attempt to return to the waterside.

name: Goldenback Frog
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: A small frog often found on the banks of the rivers and lakes. A heterochrome species of Black-Striped Frog. Since it is relatively scarce and more vulnerable to enemies due to the color, some amphibian fans will catch Goldenback Frogs after rain and take them home as pets.

name: Scarletthorn
attributes_description: A material used for Crafting.
bg_description: A specialty mineral with a shape of needle clusters. Sharp and tough. Mostly used in cutting metals or other crystals or making weapons.

name: Lampylumen
attributes_description: A material used for Crafting.
bg_description: A translucent specialty mineral found in the Tiger's Maw Mine. Both the crystal produce and raw status of this mineral has a translucent azure shine. As a material, it has excellent toughness and stability.

name: Indigoite
attributes_description: A material used for Crafting.
bg_description: A widely distributed mineral. Its unique, profound purple distinguishes itself from other minerals. Due to its fragility, it requires careful processing with specialized equipment.

name: Floramber
attributes_description: A material used for Crafting.
bg_description: Minerals formed over time from the remains of dead plants within Tacet Fields that had sunken into its terrains. Due to the retained woody plant-like structural appearances, these minerals were given the name "Floramber", though they are unrelated to ambers in terms of shape or form.

name: Bird Egg
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description: A gift from birds, and a regular on dinner tables.

name: Basic Resonance Potion
attributes_description: Provides 1,000 Resonator EXP.
bg_description: A potion that can slightly enhance the user's frequency perception ability. It is especially beneficial for Resonators struggling with mastering their Fortes, as it greatly enhances adaptability. However, when consumed by Resonators who already exhibit excellent control over their Fortes, its effectiveness is somewhat diminished due to its fully diluted nature.

name: Medium Resonance Potion
attributes_description: Provides 3,000 Resonator EXP.
bg_description: A potion that can further enhance the user's frequency perception ability. By adjusting the mixture ratio, this potion is more suitable for Resonators with relatively good control over their Fortes. With a near-perfect cost-effectiveness, it is regarded as flawless except for its "notoriously" bland taste.

name: Advanced Resonance Potion
attributes_description: Provides 8,000 Resonator EXP.
bg_description: A potion that can greatly enhance the user's frequency perception ability. Collaborating with professional nutritionists, this potion is more beneficial to both physical and mental well-being compared to many healthcare products on the market. This potion enjoys high popularity among Resonators, with many voices urging its manufacturer to explore a variety of flavors.

name: Premium Resonance Potion
attributes_description: Provides 20,000 Resonator EXP.
bg_description: A potion that can significantly enhance the user's Frequency perception. Its formula is locked within a vault with the highest security. Rumor has it the inventor of this potion is a powerful Resonator in their own right, and their hope is to groom a successor capable of surpassing their achievements.

name: Basic Energy Core
attributes_description: Provides 1,000 Weapon EXP.
bg_description: Purified liquid energy extracted from Tacetite, its purity increasing with higher ratings. When injected into a weapon, it offers a corresponding bonus.

name: Medium Energy Core
attributes_description: Provides 3,000 Weapon EXP.
bg_description: A supplement storing a small amount of Tacetite Energy. It can be used to recharge the core modules of Tacetite Weapons. Routine preventative maintenance of weapons is advised for all Resonators, or they may find themselves caught off guard in the case of an emergency.

name: Advanced Energy Core
attributes_description: Provides 8,000 Weapon EXP.
bg_description: A supplement storing a small amount of Tacetite Energy. It can be used in the core modules of Tacetite Weapons to increase power output. Weapons are the allies of Resonators and Tacetites serve as their food. Only by nourishing weapons well can they be handier and more powerful in battles.

name: Premium Energy Core
attributes_description: Provides 20,000 Weapon EXP.
bg_description: A supplement storing high-density Tacetite Energy, fully capable of powering most Tacetite Weapons. Experienced Resonators often preassemble and preheat this supplement to prevent weapon malfunctions during intense battles.

name: Inert Metallic Drip
attributes_description: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
bg_description: A fluid metallic drip whose activity has been greatly diminished. Its surface appears lackluster, covered with a dense layer of passivation film. However, under suitable temperatures, the residual Frequency Energy within it can still be utilized.

name: Reactive Metallic Drip
attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
bg_description: A fluid metallic drip whose activity has been partially retained. Its surface presents a luster similar to that of Tacetites. As it is quite reactive, it needs to be stored properly upon collection to prevent any loss of Frequency Energy.

name: Polarized Metallic Drip
attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
bg_description: A fluid metallic drip with high activity. Its surface presents an amazing luster. This polarized matter only forms under extremely strict conditions, and the scientific world has yet to fully figure out its transformation patter.

name: Heterized Metallic Drip
attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
bg_description: A special fluid metallic drip which can barely form naturally. It maintains a perpetual flow on its surface. Microscopic examinations of a few samples have revealed its intricate inner structure, resembling more of a living organism than an inorganic substance.

name: Impure Phlogiston
attributes_description: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
bg_description: A crystal shaped like a solidified flame. Its unconventional appearance challenges Old Science. Typically, it contains a rather high level of impurities and thus requires specialized purification treatment for practical use.

name: Extracted Phlogiston
attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
bg_description: A crystal shaped like a solidified candle flame. Its impurities are significantly reduced through a rough extraction and recrystallization process. This makes it simple even for those without expertise to distinguish between crystals of varying quality.

name: Refined Phlogiston
attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
bg_description: A crystal shaped like a solidified firework. After repeated purification, it is almost free of impurities. Its eye-catching and magnificent appearance not only holds practical utility but also elevates its collectible value.

name: Flawless Phlogiston
attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
bg_description: A crystal shaped like a raging flame, known for its impeccable purity. As a result, some Resonators don't want to use these crystals solely for enhancement, instead opting to entrust professional craftsmen to process them into unique accessories.

name: Lento Helix
attributes_description: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
bg_description: A helix with soothing waveforms. Facing this remarkable substance, human beings finally realize what static vibration is about.

name: Adagio Helix
attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
bg_description: A helix with gentle waveforms. Researchers can extract and utilize the sealed Cadence Energy within it. However, it is worth mentioning that researchers cannot effectively analyze the content contained within this helix.

name: Andante Helix
attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
bg_description: A helix with graceful waveforms, like a melodious song composed by nature. Instead of being studied by scientists, it might in essence be a subject best explored by researchers of aesthetics.

name: Presto Helix
attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
bg_description: A helix with intense waveforms. Researchers are greatly captivated by the perfect harmony of movement and stillness it displays. However, to this day, no one knows how this harmony is formed.

name: Waveworn Residue 210
attributes_description: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
bg_description: A Waveworn residue featuring a double-layered spherical shell. However, the inner balance has been disturbed, causing the Remnant within the inner core to reduce to the Reverberation.

name: Waveworn Residue 226
attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
bg_description: A Waveworn residue featuring a double-layered spherical shell. It is not in a state of decline. By selecting an appropriate absorber, users may still have the chance to extract Remnant Energy.

name: Waveworn Residue 235
attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
bg_description: A Waveworn residue featuring a double-layered spherical shell. It maintains a delicate balance. When it is highly concentrated in a centrifuge, it produces products that have various applications.

name: Waveworn Residue 239
attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
bg_description: A Waveworn residue featuring a double-layered spherical shell. It is known for its astonishing balance. Due to its indispensable role in many high-tech fields, it is subject to the most stringent trade restrictions.

name: Cadence Seed
attributes_description: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
bg_description: An unusual substance resembling the shape of a plant seed. If you listen carefully, you can feel a pulse-like rhythm. However, in fact, this substance is not alive, and its structure is pretty similar to that of the Tacet Core of a Howler.

name: Cadence Bud
attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
bg_description: An unusual substance resembling the shape of a plant bud. If you listen carefully, you can sense the pleasure of sprouting from the ground. However, it can never grow into a complete plant.

name: Cadence Leaf
attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
bg_description: An unusual substance resembling the shape of a new leaf. If you listen carefully, you can hear the faint rustle of it bathing in sunlight and sucking dew. In fact, it is able to absorb the wandering Frequency Energy from the environment.

name: Cadence Blossom
attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
bg_description: An unusual substance resembling the shape of a blossom. If you listen carefully, you can hear the petals unfolding. At the end of the silent time, a blossom of Cadence finally bursts into bloom.

name: Wood-textured Shard
attributes_description: Special drops from the Huanglong region, which can be used to exchange for various items in the Souvenir Store.
bg_description:
"In the Huanglong region, ancient buildings were traditionally built using wood, but it proved to be insufficient in meeting modern strength requirements. Hence, Huanglong began to explore alternative building materials that could replicate the traditional wooden texture while providing sturdiness.
These Wood-textured Shards can be found all throughout the region, with varying shapes and origins – from houses and shops to military camps and academies. Although uncovering the stories behind them is a challenging task, the Pioneer Association relentlessly pursues this endeavor. Each shard holds a piece of history waiting to be discovered.

name: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
attributes_description: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
bg_description: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance

name: Lustrous Tide
attributes_description: Used to Convene one time in Tidal Chorus.
bg_description: "Above the waves, I cry out loud. Twisting whirls, the response is proud. In chance, you and I shall meet. In shimmering waves, our fate shall greet."

name: Radiant Tide
attributes_description: Used to Convene one time in Featured Resonator Convene.
bg_description: "Above the waves, I cry out loud. Brilliant ripples, answers found. As promised, you will draw near. In radiant waves, our paths appear."

name: Oscillated Coral
attributes_description: Used to redeem items in the Store.
bg_description:
The ripples of the waves converge into the sprouts of desire.
"That is the echo of your call."

name: Afterglow Coral
attributes_description: Used to redeem items in the Store.
bg_description:
The ripples of the waves converge into the branches of hope.
"That is the proof of your encounter."

name: Lunite Subscription
attributes_description: After purchase, claim daily Astrites for 30 days.
bg_description: Get unlimited access to the Celestial Observatory for a specified period with this pass.

name: Lunite Subscription
attributes_description: Used to claim daily Astrites for 30 days.
bg_description: Get unlimited access to the Celestial Observatory for a specified period with this pass.

name: Boost Unit
attributes_description:
Increases Max STA by 10 points.
Can be obtained from upgrading the Data Bank.
bg_description: A component that requires a large amount of computing power to run. It can stably output power, and when loaded on a Terminal, it can significantly improve the owner's mobility.

name: Sonance Casket
attributes_description: Exchangeable for resources when delivered to the relic merchant.
bg_description: The Sonance Casket is a product of the natural decay and collapse of the Sonoro Sphere, containing the unlost past. Since the Sonoro Sphere is an important source of information for humans to understand the history of the Lament and the evolution of the civilization, the Sonance Casket, as a "fragment" and "condensation" of the Sonoro Sphere, is considered to have a high archaeological value and is regarded as an "antique" by people.

name: Resonator Experience
attributes_description: Level up your Resonators by gaining experience through daily explorations and reaching a certain value threshold.
bg_description: This is the proof of the Resonator's practice.

name: Basic Sealed Tube
attributes_description: Basic Echo EXP item. Provides 500 EXP.
bg_description: A cylindrical storage that contains simplified frequency cluster. To activate it, users must rotate the cipher wheel to the correct position. Resonators can then extract its data using their Terminal, employing it to optimize the performance of the absorbed Echoes.

name: Medium Sealed Tube
attributes_description: Medium Echo EXP item. Provides 1,000 EXP.
bg_description: A cylindrical storage that contains standard frequencies. To activate it, users must rotate the cipher wheel to the correct position. This medium-sized storage holds a greater volume of information compared to the basic version. Consequently, the database available for training is more complete, better optimizing the performance of the absorbed Echoes.

name: Advanced Sealed Tube
attributes_description: Advanced Echo EXP item. Provides 2,000 EXP.
bg_description: A cylindrical storage that contains advanced frequencies. To activate it, users must rotate the cipher wheel to the correct position. This storage not only contains the database needed for routine training, but also incorporates simulation materials tailored to diverse scenarios. Therefore, it can fully exploit the potential of the absorbed Echoes.

name: Premium Sealed Tube
attributes_description: Premium Echo EXP item. Provides 5,000 EXP.
bg_description: A cylindrical storage that contains special frequencies. To activate it, users must rotate the cipher wheel to the correct position. It contains precious data collected from various extreme environments, facilitating the revolutionary transformation of the absorbed Echoes.

name: Dagger with Special Symbols
attributes_description: A small knife given by Mr. Zi.
bg_description: A delicate small knife, engraved with patterns like a crocodile.

name: "Lingo Collection - Part One"
attributes_description: Industry Lingo provided by Mr. Zi.
bg_description: Lingo Collection - Part One Shoulder: buddy, man, friend. Make it Loud: State your name. The Silent: Who can't state the name. The Loud: Who have strong background. Outsiders: Who don't understand Lingo. Mingle: Use Lingo. Movers: Who have reputation. Shakers: Boss, leader. Pour the Water: Gimme the Money. Wipe Your Eyes: Take a good look. To the Far: Eyes. To the Wind: Ears. The Long: Legs. The Green: Weapons. Rod: Guns. ...

name: Heat Absorption Device
attributes_description: A device that can mitigate the negative effects of the Sea of Flames.
bg_description: The Protection Device comes in two parts, carrying both can significantly reduce the Incineranur's harm to the user. However, if you remain in the Incineranur for too long, damage values will accumulate over time. Please also be aware not to step directly onto the Petals.

name: Soundproof Device
attributes_description: A device that can mitigate the negative effects of the Sea of Flames.
bg_description: Two sets of devices that can mitigate the toxic pollens greatly. Please note that extended stay in the Sea of Flames can be dangerous even with these devices. Also, please stay away from the petals.

bg_description: During her days in the Exiles camp, she carefully preserved the things inside, but now they lay casually discarded in the corner.

name: Jiaping's Diary
attributes_description: Jiaping's Diary.
bg_description: It contains a record of what happened during Jiaping's stay in the Exile camp, as well as some nonsensical feelings and expectations.

name: Qingru's Reward
attributes_description: "The Precious" given by Qingru.
bg_description: In order to give Pinwen an inexpensive, precious, and inviting gift, Qingru has decided to ask for your help at a hefty price.

name: Metal Key
attributes_description: Key obtained from the Hoochief group.
bg_description: An old-fashioned key, obtained from a group of Hoochiefs.

name: Tacet Field Geological Data
attributes_description: Geological data collected from the Tacet Field.
bg_description: After the Lament, Tacet Fields have spread across the land, serving as one of the breeding grounds for Tacet Discords. Its geological data is a valuable research sample for researchers.

name: Active Tacetite Sample
attributes_description: Active Tacetite sample collected from the Tacet Field.
bg_description: Tacetite is both a new source of energy and a dangerous mineral. Please keep the active Tacetite samples collected from Tacet Fields in a safe place to avoid causing secondary disasters or affecting the health of others.

attributes_description: Delivery box from Squeaky Quick Delivery.

name: Jinzhou Skewers
attributes_description: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 100, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Skewers that have become a favorite for everyone in Jinzhou and must-have on the menu of every restaurant in Jinzhou. But each restaurant has its own secret recipe. "Come to my place, my skewers are the real deal!"

name: Stuffed Flatbread
attributes_description: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 200, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: An ordinary plain flatbread. Carries the memory of the difficult times of the residents of Huanglong.

name: Perilla Salad
attributes_description: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 10%, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A dish used to stave off hunger when supplies are scarce, it has now become a refreshing side dish on the dinner table.

name: Spicy Pulled Chicken
attributes_description: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 15% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A simple cold dish of pulled chicken with an appetizing splash of hot chili oil. Although simple to make, it always reminds people of their childhood.

name: Jinzhou Skewers Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Jinzhou Skewers.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Jinzhou Skewers.

name: Stuffed Flatbread Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Stuffed Flatbread
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Stuffed Flatbread.

attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Perilla Salad.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Perilla Salad.

name: Spicy Pulled Chicken Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Spicy Pulled Chicken.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Spicy Pulled Chicken.

name: Hot Pot Base
attributes_description: Ingredients obtained through Culinary Research.
bg_description: A universal seasoning made from chili, spices, and fats. It can bring unexpected flavors to almost all ingredients.

name: Clear Soup
attributes_description: Ingredients obtained through Culinary Research.
bg_description: A common thickening ingredient often used as a substitute for water in cooking to enrich the texture.

name: Braising Sauce
attributes_description: Ingredients obtained through Culinary Research.
bg_description: Wonderfully thickened broth with natural fragrances that can bring out the hidden flavors of meat dishes.

name: Sweet and Sour Sauce
attributes_description: Ingredients obtained through Culinary Research.
bg_description: A sweet and sour, bright red sauce that can provide a sweet and sour, rich taste to food.

name: Intimacy
attributes_description: NO CONTENT
bg_description: A wonderful testament to the solid friendship between the Rover and their companions. Increases intimacy with some (possible) pleasant surprises.

name: Intimacy

bg_description: A wonderful testament to the solid friendship between the Rover and their companions. Increases intimacy with some (possible) pleasant surprises.

name: Loong Whiskers Crisp
attributes_description: Restores 80 STA.
bg_description: A popular dessert in Huanglong, it is considered a symbol of good luck and blessings because of its association with loong.

name: Food Ration Bar
attributes_description: Reduces Cooldown for Grapple by 25% for a selected Resonator in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A staple food of the Jinzhou Garrison. Besides a hearty bite, it is also easy to make and carry around. Each serving comes with a message about guarding the homeland and a reminder to the soldiers that although the night is long and endless, Jinzhou always has their back.

name: Refreshment Tea
attributes_description: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 800, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A free herbal tea distributed by the Jinzhou government. It is known for its refreshing and detoxifying effects and is popular among the working class. "Thank you to everyone who works hard for Jinzhou."

name: Salted Milk Tea
attributes_description: Defeating overworld enemies yields 25% more Shell Credits, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A sugary, salty beverage inspired by the favorite tea drink of the miners in Huanglong. During the cold winter months, a bowl of Salted Milk Tea can warm the entire body.

name: Angelica Tea
attributes_description: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 25%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: During the period of material shortage, Angelica was used by the people of Huanglong as an important medicine to resist the cold. After the production of synthetic drugs was restored, the habit of drinking Angelica tea to resist the cold was retained and gradually developed into the current Angelica Tea.

name: Shuyun Herbal Tea
attributes_description: Increases ATK and Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 12% and 10% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Shuyun's ancestral secret herbal tea, most suitable for summer. But the taste is special, and the taste is polarized. The formula is never disclosed, and it is hard to buy. Usually, you can only ask Shuyun to make it.

name: Poached Chicken
attributes_description: Reduces Cooldown for Grapple by 15% for a selected Resonator in the team for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A must-have dish in the Panhua Restaurant, the poached chicken is added with a special sauce. Some people want to replicate the taste of the Panhua Restaurant's Poached Chicken, but there is always a difference. After all, a restaurant must have some skills.

name: Spicy Meat Slices
attributes_description: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 25%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A famous dish in Huanglong, the spicy taste is mouth-watering. Some people have tried to replace the spices with fruit sauce, but this was strongly protested by the Huanglong chefs.

name: Loong Bun
attributes_description: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 25%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: This round bun featuring Loong horns comes in a variety of flavors. Highly cherished by the people of Huanglong, they are a staple on festive tables. Legend has it that consuming a whole bun brings good fortune in the following year.

name: Iron Shovel Edodes
attributes_description: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 16%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A special dish that originated in the Huanglong army. Huanglong soldiers would use an engineer's shovel as an iron plate, and after heating, they would grill and enjoy the ingredients. This way of eating was later passed back to the home by the retired soldiers and became a famous dish.

name: Jinzhou Stew
attributes_description: Increases ATK and Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 8% and 6% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A stew comprised of mixed protein and vegetables. The popular Jinzhou family meal allows for the preservation of the ingredients' natural flavors to the maximum owing to its simplicity and versatility. "Jinzhou Stew, Jingzhou brew!"

name: Candied Caltrops
attributes_description: Increases DEF and Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 18% and 15% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: One of the famous signature dishes of the Panhua Restaurant. Its sweet and soft taste is very popular among the children of Jinzhou.

name: Wuthercake
attributes_description: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 30%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A kind of pure golden pastry made with a lot of egg yolks. It can maintain its crisp taste even in a humid environment. You can eat it with confidence at any time.

name: Aureate Fried Rice
attributes_description: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 20% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A fried rice dish that every family in Jinzhou knows how to make. Each grain of rice is coated in a golden layer of egg yolk, symbolizing good fortune. It is often served during festive dinners in the mines, carrying the workers' wishes that their toil and frugality may bring about peace and prosperity.

name: Lemon-Braised Pork
attributes_description: Increases Echo drop rate by 20%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-Op Mode.
bg_description: One of the famous field recipes of the Midnight Rangers, carefully selected Lemongrass and Raw Meat are combined for barbecue. Later adaptations transformed it into a stew, where Lemongrass's fragrance adeptly masks the gamey flavor of the meat, contributing to its widespread popularity.

name: Milky Fish Soup
attributes_description: Restores 40 STA.
bg_description: A fish soup that warms the body and seems to ward off the cold. Some families in Huanglong often serve it to sick family members.

name: Kudzu Congee
attributes_description: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 22%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A congee mixed with kudzu powders for high fiber and satiety. In the early years, there were always peddlers with shoulder poles in the streets and alleys of Jinzhou. When the clinkering sounds of their bells come, people would know it was for selling Kudzu Congee. Therefore, the elderly also use tinkering sounds to refer to Kudzu Congee.

name: Star Flakes
attributes_description: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 35%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A snack popular among the children of Jinzhou, made with deep-fried meat bits of starry shapes and served with a special power dip. It is said that you can make a wish after eating it. "One star, two stars... you can't make a wish without eating it!"

name: Caltrop Stir Fry
attributes_description: Defeating overworld enemies yields 25% more materials, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A famous medicinal dish in Huanglong, its ingredients are simple, just need to stir fry the Caltrop with meat after shelling. This dish can calm the mind and invigorate the body, and is popular with the people of Huanglong.

name: Caltrop Soup
attributes_description: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 30%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Also known as "Winter Cloud Soup”. A luxury congee made by slow-cooking Caltrop with poultry broth. The key to make this dish is the control of the heat and the ratio of the ingredients. The slow cooking with a gentle heat preserves the original sweetness of the Caltrop. Paired with Honeysuckle, even a lonely night will feel happy.

name: Crispy Squab
attributes_description: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 50%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: The squab, with crispy skin and tender meat, embodies Huanglong's warm hospitality, making it a must-have dish for welcoming guests and a favorite among visitors from all over the world.

name: Jinzhou Maocai
attributes_description: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 28%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Originally a dish invented by Huanglong miners who were too busy to cook, Maocai is prepared simply by mixing and stewing all ingredients with spices in one pot.

name: Rising Loong
attributes_description: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 40%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A golden and crispy fish dish with a complex preparation process. The carp is styled to look up to the sky, as if it wishes to transform into a dragon. It is said that when the Jué descends, the big fishes in the ocean all resurfaced. In order to commemorate this wonderous sight, people serve it on the table during festivals, praying for a good fortune in the coming year.

name: Sweet & Sour Pork
attributes_description: Increases Echo drop rate by 50%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-Op Mode.
bg_description: One of the must-have dishes at the Huanglong New Year's feast. Because of its sour, sweet, and crispy taste, it is popular with children and is also known as "Kid's Delight" by the people. Perhaps the heartfelt smile of happiness on the children’s faces when they taste the sweetness of this dish is more satisfactory the dish itself.

name: Chili Sauce Tofu
attributes_description: Defeating overworld enemies yields 50% more Shell Credits, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A dish of tender tofu served in chili sauce. The appetizing spiciness of it makes Chili Sauce Tofu a widely popular dish even among the nobles of the New Federation.

name: Morri Pot
attributes_description: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 40%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.

name: Map drawn by Hoochief
attributes_description: A map that marks the locations of the cages in the eastern forest and the Hoochief camp.
bg_description: Out of hatred for humans, the Hoochiefs in the Dim Forest will use tree cages to imprison passers-by. They use the hides of other creatures in the forest to crudely imitate humans and draw maps to remind the locations of the tree cages.

name: Strangely Shaped Key
attributes_description: A key that can open the hidden passage of the Dim Forest.
bg_description: A special-shaped key that can open the secret passage in the Dim Forest. It belongs to the zookeeper before the Lament.

attributes_description: A data card in the Dim Forest camp.
bg_description: A data card obtained from the Dim Forest camp, old and rusty. Perhaps, it can be used to open the nearby iron cage.

name: Special Waterlamp
attributes_description: Waterlamp that blooms during the day.

attributes_description: Core dropped by the Tacet Discord.
bg_description: One of the gifts that Yise asked Rover to collect. An exclusive gift used to please the researcher.

bg_description: This item can only be obtained when three Cliffrecluses grow into one piece.

name: Rescue Team Badge
attributes_description: A badge that seems to have been weathered.
bg_description: A badge from fifty years ago. It used to be worn by the Resonators who formed a temporary rescue team to protect Huanglong citizens from Tacet Discords and natural disasters during the great migration.

name: Special Dewvetch
attributes_description: A Dewvetch flower that represents a woman named "Dewvetch" from the Danjin family.
bg_description: A flower that carries an elder's deep feelings

bg_description: The weapons targeted by the Boar Gang. The original owner seems to be no longer important.

name: "Dream Return Song III: Stone Leaf Tears"
attributes_description: The tenth anniversary collector's edition of the storybook "Stone Leaf Tear".
bg_description: "He comes back every year, fantasizing her never leaving" Scripts once won the "Audience's Choice Award" in Jinzhou Theater. It tells a story about a couple of childhood sweethearts overcome obstacles to treat strange disease and rescue the whole village. The desolate yet beautiful scene of farewell won over the favor of young boys and girls. Its peripheral product, "Crystalized Vane", was once a heat in Jinzhou.

name: Dropped key

name: Crystallized Leaf

bg_description: A vane of the ancient tree "Loong's Gaze". Its surface is covered by hard crystals. Script Tear of Stone Vane compared this vane to tears and used it as a symbol of love for the male and female protagonists.

name: Philosophical Notes

name: The lost weapon

name: Revival Elixir Combination
attributes_description: Used to Instantly revive the selected Resonator. Can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Combination Revival Potion

[Effect] Stabilizes the Resonator's condition to a certain extent and aids in their recovery.

[Precautions] Long intervals between doses are recommended. Excessive use within a short period is not advisable.

[Warning] Prohibited to use in combination with the same type of potion or any frequency stabilizing potions.

name: Explosive Charge

name: Waypoint
attributes_description: A temporary Resonance Beacon that can be flexibly placed, it needs to be placed by consuming the core module.
bg_description: A temporary Resonance Beacon employed for location marking by utilizing beacon data from its surroundings. While retaining the same functions as Resonance Beacons, it offers enhanced mobility, rendering it indispensable for field workers.

name: Casket Sonar
attributes_description: A portable gadget designed for pinpointing undiscovered special collectibles. Re-activating it requires Sonar Circuits.
bg_description: Built upon the principles of previous sonar technology, this instrument can detect and pinpoint special collectibles by utilizing specific frequencies.

name: Lootmapper
attributes_description: Used to find the undiscovered treasures around the drop point.
bg_description: The Lootmapper identifies specific frequencies to quickly locate nearby undiscovered Supply Chests and Tidal Heritage. It is an indispensable tool to facilitate exploration in the wilds.

name: Casket Sonar Use Permit: Jinzhou
attributes_description: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to Casket Sonar in given regions.
bg_description: The use permit of the Casket Sonar in Jinzhou. To ensure frequency safety in Jinzhou, users are permitted to use the Casket Sonar only within authorized areas in compliance with this official permit.

name: Lootmapper Use Permit: Jinzhou
attributes_description: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to the Lootmapper in given regions.
bg_description: The use permit of the Lootmapper in Jinzhou. To ensure frequency safety in Jinzhou, users are permitted to use the Lootmapper only within authorized areas in compliance with this official permit.

name: Sonar Circuit
attributes_description: Can be used to activate the Casket Sonar's search and pinpointing functions for special collectibles.
bg_description: The most basic structure to artificially reproduce or store Remnant frequency. It allows the Casket Sonar to match the frequencies around with the Remnant information within its storage to locate special collectibles.

name: Waypoint Module
attributes_description: Used to activate the search function of Waypoint.
bg_description: The core module of the Waypoint, responsible for collecting, sharing, and updating location information. It connects the Waypoint and the Resonance Beacon, making it essential for initiating and maintaining the functioning of the Waypoint.

name: Grand Library Route Map
attributes_description: There is a mark on the top left of the map. This could be where the puzzle is.
bg_description: A small scroll inside the Sundial, mapping the possible routes of the "Grand Library", the central database in City Hall. There is a red circle on the top left corner of the map that possibily indicates the location of a secret contraption, indicating a confusing detour to the destination.

name: Wooden Plaque: Left
attributes_description: A Wooden Plaque for some kind of ancient rituals.
bg_description: A larger fragment of a wooden plaque with mysterious carvings, possibly used in ancient rituals. The meaning of the patterns is unknown.

name: Wooden Plaque: Right
attributes_description: A Wooden Plaque for some kind of ancient rituals.
bg_description: A smaller fragment of a wooden plaque with mysterious carvings, possibly used in ancient rituals. The meaning of the patterns is unknown.

name: Restored Wooden Plaque
attributes_description: Restored Wooden Plaque
bg_description: A restored wooden plaque with mysterious carvings. You remember seeing a socket where it could fit somewhere before…

name: A Diary
attributes_description: A Strange Diary
bg_description: A strange diary, filled with childish and broken handwriting. It emanates a strange mix of Resonator and Tacet Discords.

name: Black Fruit
attributes_description: Jinhsi's Token: I
bg_description: A heavy, dark fruit, just the right size for a hand, emitting a subtle fragrance, it doesn't seem to have anything unusual.

name: Mangosteen
attributes_description: Jinhsi's Token: I
bg_description: An ordinary fruit that somehow bears a striking resemblance to the old model of Tacetite Grenade. This is not an indigenous species, as its growth conditions don't agree with the climate of Jinzhou. It's imported by water via the Gunchao Port located in the South.

name: Leaf
attributes_description: Jinhsi's Token: II
bg_description: A purple leaf with a faint, peculiar energy.

name: Leaf affected by "Waveworn"
attributes_description: Jinhsi's Token: II
bg_description:
A purple leaf with traces of dual Tacet Discord frequencies. The asynchronous fluctuations of the frequencies caused them to cancel each other out and rendered them hard to track.
Could it be that there were actually two separate Tacet Fields surrounding the tree where this leaf originated from?

name: Small Device
attributes_description: Jinhsi's Token: III
bg_description:
A finely crafted small device, the surface is engraved with ancient text. The inner ring represents the Four Spirits of Heaven, indicating the location.
"East, the Teal Loong, West, the White Tiger, South, the Vermillion Bird, North, the Black Tortoise".
The outer ring represents the Twelve Earthly Branches, indicating the time.
"Zi, Chou, Yin, Mao, Chen, Si, Wu, Wei, Shen, You, Xu, Hai".

name: Sundial
attributes_description: Jinhsi's Token: III
bg_description:
This sundial has a secret compartment. 
Rotate the two disks to the right positions to unlock it and discover its hidden contents.

name: The Unlocked Sundial
attributes_description: Jinhsi's Token: III
bg_description: An unlocked Sundial-shaped puzzle box. The direction and time symbols on its disks have been rearranged. However, you have already obtained the key information given by the Jinzhou Magistrate. Now, it appears to be an ordinary small sundial. Only upon closer inspection can you see a faint light source at the top and the shadow of the needle is distorted, almost like a hushed whisper.

name: Sugar Pearl
attributes_description: Jinhsi's Token: IV
bg_description: A round, pearl-shaped candy ball hidden inside a simple sweet wrapper.

name: Sugar Pearl
attributes_description: Jinhsi's Token: IV
bg_description: A sweet oral vaccine, reminiscent of candy for children in Jinzhou, symbolizes their triumph over the epidemic.

name: Candy
attributes_description: A small gift from a child. She hopes you enjoy a sweet time in Jinzhou.
bg_description: A popular treat among the children of Jinzhou, the candy's wrapper bears signs of being eagerly clutched by tiny hands, its folds and creases revealing its cherished history.

name: Archive: Tacet Discord
attributes_description: Open the information interface after use
bg_description:
The archives stored in the Huaxu Academy, Jinzhou Campus, record the research information related to "Tacet Discord".
"The information energy body composed of Reverberation, has a mimicry of life activities, and its core behavior goal is to devour and absorb the frequency it needs."

name: Archive: Huaxu Academy, Jinzhou Campus
attributes_description: Open the information interface after use
bg_description: An archive of Huaxu Academy, Jinzhou Campus that contains the event of its founding, branches, and other information.

name: Archive: Sugar Pearl Vaccine and Tacet Discord Outbreak
attributes_description: Open the information interface after use
bg_description: A research report on "Sugar Pearl" and "Tacet Discord Outbreak", placed on the "Wei" Shelf of Huaxu Academy's archives.

name: Archive: "The First Resonator"
attributes_description: Open the information interface after use
bg_description: A research report on Jinzhou's first Resonator, placed on the "Wei" Shelf of Huaxu Academy's archives.

name: Rover's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Rover: Havoc's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless invisible Wavebands. When the Remnant Wavebands are compiled to form a complete Resonance Chain, their Forte receives an upgrade in power.

name: Pioneer Association Sigil Supply
attributes_description: Provides the Pioneer Podcast's exclusive Sigil.
bg_description: "Would you like a unique Sigil that stands out? Sign up for our Connoisseur Channel today!"

name: Ginkgo: Syntonize Supply
attributes_description: Provides an exclusive Syntonize Material for the Golden Eternal series weapon.
bg_description: NO CONTENT

name: Forging Tide
attributes_description: Used to Convene one time in Featured Weapon Convene.
bg_description: "Above the waves, I cry out loud. Brilliant ripples, answers found. With you, my blade, I shall ascend. In shimmering waves, our bond won't end."

name: Yellowed Sketch
attributes_description: Sketch Obtained in the camp of the Séance Society.
bg_description: A sketch drawn with a naive stroke, pressed between faded leaves of a damaged diary. It portrays a family of four and separate image on each one.

name: Peculiar Blake Bloom
attributes_description: Peculiar Blake Bloom
bg_description: Identity mark used by members of the Black Shores. You can feel the surge of Remnant Energy when carrying it with your hands.

attributes_description:
Open to claim one Originite series weapon of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Broadblade#41 *1</color>

<color=Rare4>Pistols#26 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Gauntlets#21D *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Rectifier#25 *1</color>
