name: Standard Weapon Mold
attributes_description: Used for weapon crafting.
bg_description: A rare crafting material with extremely high plasticity. Can be used for the manufacture of various weapons.

name: Happiness Tea
attributes_description: Increases DEF and Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 12% and 10% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: One of the traditional handmade drinks of Huanglong, implying "double happiness". The method of making it is simple, just dry the fresh Honeysuckle, stir-fry it with Lemongrass, and pour it into boiling water. Add a little Caltrop before drinking to add sweetness. The finished product is sour and sweet, with a slightly bitter aftertaste, which helps digestion, so it is often seen on the festival table.

name: Happiness Tea Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Happiness Tea.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Happiness Tea.

name: Liondance Companion
attributes_description: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 120, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Snacks Lingyang made for the Liondance audience. The treats were a perfect combination of fatty and lean meats, complemented by fruits and vegetables to balance out the heaviness. Ideal for enjoying while watching the performance.

name: Iced Perilla
attributes_description: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 12%, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: In moments of research block, Baizhi turns to the chilled Perilla she always has on hand for a refreshing pause. The cool, herbal flavor soothes her senses and helps calm her racing thoughts. As she finishes her plate, her mind clears and she's able to refocus on her work with renewed determination.

name: Silky Reveries
attributes_description: Restores 100 points of STA.
bg_description: The delicious scent of Loong Whiskers Crisp enveloped Danjin as she bit into the perfectly crisp exterior, her teeth sinking into the dreamy floss coating. Despite her love for this sweet treat, she always wished for more. The kind stall owner suggested adding extra ingredients to enhance the sweetness even further, a tempting offer that Danjin couldn't resist.

name: Ration Bar
attributes_description: Reduces Cooldown for Grapple by 30% for a selected Resonator in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Calcharo has a fondness for Huanglong's Food Ration Bar. He believes it efficiently satisfies basic energy needs in the wild and has a unique taste. To cater to some of the younger merc's preferences, Calcharo has enhanced the bar by adding dried fruits, sugar beans, and various seasonings, creating a variety of flavors.

name: Sanqing Tea
attributes_description: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 28%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: The Sanqing tea from Yuanwu Boxing Gym has healing properties, aiding the spleen, lungs, and alleviating worries. A cup after a boxing session boosts blood flow and circulation while soothing the mind. The perfect combination of exercise and tea brings a sense of inner peace, momentarily freeing one from mundane concerns and desires.

name: Crystal Clear Buns
attributes_description: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 28%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Sanhua revamped the traditional ingredients used in Loong Buns, creating a refreshing and translucent treat perfect for cooling down during hot summers. This delicacy quickly became a staple on the City Hall's tables, winning over the hearts of all visitors... and the Jinzhou Magistrate herself.

name: Yesterday in Jinzhou
attributes_description: Increases ATK and Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 10% and 8% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: While many may turn up their noses at General Jiyan's cooking, the Midnight Rangers, a group of experienced soldiers, savor each bite. The stew is brimming with hearty vegetables and sparing on meat, a reminder of their past battles on the frontlines. Its familiar flavors evoke a sense of nostalgia for their time as warriors, making it a treasured dish among these old soldiers.

name: Fluffy Wuthercake
attributes_description: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 33%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A Wuthercake made with Yangyang's special formula. It incorporates whipped egg whites instead of the usual yolks. The result? A fluffy and tender treat that is both delicious and nutritious, thanks to the addition of berry jam. This revamped recipe caters to all ages, from seniors to picky kids, making it a satisfying indulgence for everyone.

name: Golden Fried Rice
attributes_description: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming stamina consumption for all Resonators in the team by 24% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Fried rice is a staple dish for beginner cooks, but only those with a discerning palate can master it to perfection. Yinlin, accustomed to the affluent and refined through her job, has developed a taste for the finest cuisine. This golden fried rice, made with humble ingredients but expert skill, is her favorite. It embodies what she values most in cooking - the ability to turn simplicity into excellence.

name: Floral Porridge
attributes_description: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 24%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Gently simmer the rice over low heat, adding a few delicate flower petals for flavor. As it begins to lightly boil, this simple yet sweet dish becomes a favorite snack for Taoqi when relaxing at home. With each slow sip, it seems to wash away the accumulated fatigue of the day, leaving a refreshing feeling in its wake.

name: Baa Baa Crisp
attributes_description: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 40%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: After multiple attempts, Encore triumphantly created a dish she was pleased with. Golden and crunchy, each bite resembled a miniature lamb. And after indulging, one would surely dream of frolicking among sheep. With this culinary masterpiece, there's no need to fret — it can be savored without hesitation.

name: Lotus Seed Soup
attributes_description: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 33%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Maintaining a healthy body is crucial. The combination of gold and silver lotus seeds in this recipe provides warmth, nourishment, and a calming effect on both the body and mind. It was the first medicinal meal Jianxin learned during her mountain retreat and remains one of her go-to recipes for overall health and well-being.

name: Smoked Pigeon
attributes_description: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 55%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Mortefi's signature dish, created during his time wandering in the wilderness. Despite early struggles with controlling his powers, he has now mastered the art of cooking it. A perfect balance of crispy outer layer and tender interior, it boasts a sweet and fragrant flavor while maintaining the freshness of the meat itself.

name: Champion Hotpot
attributes_description: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 30%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A steaming hot pot filled to the brim with Victor Savor, known for its spicy and flavorful taste. Chixia claims it is the best hot pot in the world. However, for those who can't handle the spiciness... caution is advised before trying.

name: Green Field Pot
attributes_description: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 44%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Verina's prized Morri Pot brims with a delectable blend of freshly grown vegetables and herbs. Her meticulous care and patience in breeding and preparing these ingredients result in a uniquely delicious taste. Through the growth of her plants, she witnesses the beauty of life cycles, and in cooking, she finds joy in the anticipation of harvest.

name: Misty Tea
attributes_description: Increases DEF and Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 14% and 12% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
This tea is a favorite of Aalto's. As the water in the pot turns to mist and then back into water in the cup, the aroma of the tea is coupled with the soothing mist.
"Now, let's get down to business."
It seems Aalto's mastery of tea-making is just one of his many skills in the business world.

bg_description: A pressurized canister spray filled using an advanced process that creates a special protective layer on the user's body surface to increase resistance to specified types of injuries.

bg_description: A medication for reviving downed individuals in emergencies. Its portable design includes a mechanical compartment with highly concentrated active ingredients for quick recovery.

name: Supersonic Solvent
attributes_description: Reduces Echo Skill Cooldown of a selected Resonator in the team by 30% for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A solid solvent made using a special process allows the user to use Echo Skill more frequently.
“I run faster after taking this, which means I must have gotten lighter, which means I have gotten thinner... So does it mean it's also a weight-loss product?”

name: Trainer Solvent
attributes_description: Increases Echo Skill DMG of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A solid solvent created using a special process that boosts the Echo Skill you cast.
Said to be invented by a self-proclaimed aspiring Echo Training Master.

name: String Solvent
attributes_description: Grants a selected Resonator in the team 1 Concerto Energy per second for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Using a solid solvent made by a special process. Just one tablet can put the whole squad in a melodious melody and follow the music to finish the battle gracefully.

name: Drummer Solvent
attributes_description: Boosts Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Using a solid solvent made by a special process. Just one table can make the entire squad's ears ring with a thrilling rhythm, as if they were holding drumsticks instead of weapons.

name: Potion No. 5
attributes_description: Used to heal 20% of the current Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 160 HP.
bg_description: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

name: Morale Tablets
attributes_description: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to additionally reduce the Vibration Strength of the targets by a certain percentage when they trigger Counterattack within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

name: Harmony Tablets
attributes_description: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to regain 20 Concerto Energy when releasing Intro Skill within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

name: Passion Tablets
attributes_description: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to regain 5 Resonance Energy when they successfully Dodge an attack within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

name: Vigor Tablets
attributes_description: Grants a selected Resonator in the team immunity to the next fatal damage and heals 25% of the Resonator's Max HP, lasting for 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

name: Morphable Echo
attributes_description:
Can be used to obtain a random collected Echo.
Upgrade the Data Bank to increase your chance of getting Echoes of higher Rarity.
bg_description: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

name: 5-star Weapon Supply Chest
attributes_description:
Open to claim one 5-star Winter Brume series weapon of your choice:
<color=Rare5>Lustrous Razor *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Emerald of Genesis *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Static Mist *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Abyss Surges *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Cosmic Ripples *1</color>
bg_description: NO CONTENT

name: Gilded Ginkgo
attributes_description: Used to increase the Syntonization Rank of Golden Eternal weapons.
bg_description: A beautiful jade has been carved into the shape of a ginkgo leaf.

name: Obscure Recipe
attributes_description: A recipe detailing the ingredients and method for Jade Treasure Soup.
bg_description: A recipe found in an old book by Panhua, it is said that following this recipe can recreate the long-lost wartime dish, the Jade Treasure Soup that people describe as “a condensed bowl of Jinzhou". However, through time, the terms written in the recipe have become obscure and difficult to understand. Before cooking, it is necessary to further confirm the specific ingredients.

name: Mahe Special Ingredient Pack
attributes_description: Special ingredient pack for cooking Jade Treasure Soup.
bg_description: The grocer Mahe, who has traveled far and wide, has identified and prepared an ingredient pack according to the recipe. This pack contains all the ingredients needed to make the Jade Treasure Soup.

name: Koko's special "Luohan Clearwater"
attributes_description: Special potion used for cooking Jade Treasure Soup.
bg_description: Luohan Clearwater, an unrecognizable term for Mahe, is used among pharmacies years ago, referring to the potion made by boiling Coriolus, Perilla, and Lemongrass. To make the Jade Treasure Soup, Koko gave you a portion.

name: Traveler's EXP Aid
attributes_description: Basic Experience Gift Pack
bg_description: These resources come from all over Solaris-3, delivered on time by Lollo Logistics for customers. When traveling in dangerous areas, mutual support is indispensable for safe travel.

name: Sage's EXP Support
attributes_description: Advanced Experience Package
bg_description: These resources come from all over Solaris-3, delivered on time by Lollo Logistics for customers. When traveling in dangerous areas, mutual support is indispensable for safe travel.

name: Gardener's Aid
attributes_description: Basic Weapon Skill Ascension Material Bundle
bg_description: Among various supply services, some supply providers are particularly mysterious, such as the Black Shores. No one knows how it obtains these supplies, but the quality is indeed excellent.

name: Blake Bloom's Aid
attributes_description: Advanced Weapon Skill Ascension Material Bundle
bg_description: Among various supply services, some supply providers are particularly mysterious, such as the Black Shores. No one knows how it obtains these supplies, but the quality is indeed excellent.

name: Blake Bloom's Data Aid
attributes_description: Echo Development Bundle
bg_description: Among various supply services, some supply providers are particularly mysterious, such as the Black Shores. No one knows how it obtains these supplies, but the quality is indeed excellent.

name: Abandoned Data Chip from Norfall Barrens
attributes_description: Data chip collected from Norfall Barrens
bg_description: Ages had marked themselves on their surface. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these fragments.

name: Torn pages from Port City of Guixu
attributes_description: Torn pages collected from Port City of Guixu
bg_description: They carry a deserted story and some nostalgic memories. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these fragments.

name: Torn pages from Gorges of Spirits
attributes_description: Torn pages collected from Gorges of Spirits
bg_description: They seem to be anecdotes from some kind of folklore. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these fragments.

name: Torn pages from Central Plains
attributes_description: Torn pages collected in Central Plains.
bg_description: Seems like it is frequently leafed through, as many fingerprints are left on the pages. The storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these.

name: Abandoned Data Chip from Whining Aix's Mire
attributes_description: Data collected from Whining Aix's Mire.
bg_description: They seem to come from a diary of a courier. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these fragments.

name: Torn pages from Desorock Highland
attributes_description: Torn pages collected from Desorock Highland
bg_description: These letters home are someone's messenger. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these fragments.

name: Abandoned Data Chip from Tiger's Maw
attributes_description: Data chip collected from Tiger's Maw.
bg_description: They are casual daily records by the staff at the Mine. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these.

name: Aircraft Accident Report
attributes_description: Data Chip collected from Norfall Barrens
bg_description: It's an investigation report without an exact date. You can now read it after the Storyteller has repaired it, though this may take effort.

name: As the Express through the Rain
attributes_description: Torn pages collected from Port City of Guixu.
bg_description: "All our dreams disappear in the heavy rain, as they evaporate in the aching land."

name: Jinzhou Folklore Journal
attributes_description: Torn pages collected from Gorges of Spirits.
bg_description: "The culture and spirit of Jinzhou all included in this book, begins with the battle in the Gorges of Spirits."

name: Study on Mythical Beasts in Huanglong
attributes_description: Torn pages collected from Central Plains.
bg_description: "Here comes a beast, akin to a lion. It exudes might and intellect, embraces a human's act..."

name: Lo, Lo, Lollo Logistics!
attributes_description: Data Chip collected from Whining Aix's Mire.
bg_description: "Lo, Lo, Lollo Logistics! I want to be a proud courier today!"

name: Untitled Family Letters
attributes_description: Torn pages collected from around Desorock Highland.
bg_description: "I miss you too, with all my body and soul. I would remember this till the end of life, and carve those names upon an eternal stone."

name: Strange Messages
attributes_description: Data Chip collected from Tiger's Maw.
bg_description: "I received a message the other day. Why would I receive these messages..."

name: NO CONTENT
attributes_description: NO CONTENT

attributes_description: Data Chip collected from Dim Forest

name: Dim Forest Survey Team Diary

name: Base Fluid
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: It is widely used as a base liquid in various preparations.

name: Fluid Catalyst
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: Catalytic fluids that can accelerate the onset of action of all types of potions.

name: Strong Fluid Catalyst
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: Powerful catalytic fluids that can significantly accelerate the onset of action of all types of formulations.

name: Fluid Stabilizer

name: Strong Fluid Stabilizer

name: Premium Incense Oil
attributes_description: An ingredient used to cook special dishes.
bg_description:
An extremely rare seasoning with an unrivaled aroma that fills your nose once the bottle is uncorked.
It is said this seasoning not only enhances the dish's flavor but also, depending on the ingredients used, changes one's perceptions in a particular way.
 "What do I smell? It smells so good..."
 "Oh, I know... It's the aroma of motor oil! The best I've ever smelled!"
 "Huh?"

attributes_description: An advanced ingredient used to cook special dishes.

name: Morphable Echo - Freezing Frost
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Freezing Frost.
2pcs Set: Glacio DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Glacio DMG + 10% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 3 times, each stack lasts 15s.
bg_description: Chills are emanating from the crevice...

attributes_description:

2pcs Set: Electro DMG + 10%.

bg_description: Thunder is rumbling in the crevice...

5pcs Set: Havoc DMG + 7.5% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 4 times, each stack lasts 15s.
bg_description: The chaos seems to devour everything in the crevice...

attributes_description:

5pcs Set: Increases the ATK of all Resonators in the team by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.
bg_description: The breath from the crevice brings peace and calm...

name: Pavo Plum
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
Berries resembling feathers, the people of Hongzhen call them Linglong Hearts.
They have an incredibly spicy taste and are said to be able to refresh the mind and enhance intelligence when consumed.

name: Loong's Pearl
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: A tranquil flower, casting its gentle radiance amidst the shadows.

name: Silver Lotus
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description: A resilient lotus blossoming amidst the freezing snow. When cooked with other ingredients, it can offer solace and warmth to those in need of comfort from the cold.

name: Fluorite
attributes_description: A material used for Crafting.
bg_description: An ore bearing a likeness to the Sentinel's scale. Can be used to repair weapons.

name: Windchimer
attributes_description: Exchangeable for resources when delivered to Xian'ge.
bg_description: An ingenious gadget that captures sounds and transforms them into energy. It can be used in tuning. It is said to be of great interests to some collectors, who'd provide resources in exchange for them.

name: Chrono Sign
attributes_description: A key used to open the Woodveil Hall laboratory.
bg_description: The Court of Savantae Committee left many mysteries in Mt. Firmament: its unfinished research buried deep in the mountains and the ending that befell the researchers. Perhaps you'll be able to uncover these dust-sealed secrets with this key.

name: Stories of Guqin
attributes_description: A book obtained at Mt. Firmament.
bg_description:
"In this vast expanse, every goodbye could be a farewell for life.
Be well. Farewell."

name: Morphable Overlord Class Echo
attributes_description: Obtain collected Overlord Class Echo.
bg_description: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

name: Morphable Elite Class Echo
attributes_description: Obtain collected Elite Class Echo.
bg_description: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

name: Morphable Common Class Echo
attributes_description: Obtain collected Common Class Echo.
bg_description: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

name: Ultrasonic Pulse Chip
attributes_description: Release a powerful vortex to cleanse muds and the mud shield of Tacet Discords.
bg_description: Developed by Huaxu Academy, this chip can release vortex flow and facilitate researches surrounding the Whining Aix's Mire.

name: Cipher Key
attributes_description: An energy device crafted by the Court of Savantae. Can be used to disable the sealing device of Mianloong Chamber.
bg_description: Those blessed by the deity aspired to raise a gate, however modest it may seem to the divine eyes. Even in its decay, the solitary gate stood sentinel: upholding reverence, for the divine is near.

name: Preparation Credits
attributes_description: A written order for materials with an inventory schedule attached. Used for Wishes. Automatically restored to 100 at 04:00.
bg_description: The supplies prepared for the Moonlit Fair must be meticulously planned and allocated to ensure they fulfill as many wishes as possible.

name: Operation Fund
attributes_description: Funds prepared for the Moonlit Fair that are used for construction or Wishes.
bg_description: You can never have too many funds if you want to hold a grand festival.

name: Wish
attributes_description: The Wish Tag of a fulfilled wish. Used to improve characters' stats.
bg_description: Completed Wish Tags are stored carefully as invaluable mementos to everyone who has worked hard to make the Moonlit Fair possible.

name: Popularity
attributes_description: Popularity Points are gained by completing Wishes. They indicate how successful the Moonlit Fair is.
bg_description: An objective overview of the number of visitors at the Moonlit Fair and their feedback, gathered through big data analysis, anonymous questionnaires, community reviews, and random street interviews.

name: Palace Lantern
attributes_description: A common souvenir of the Moon-Chasing Festival that can be exchanged for exclusive rewards.
bg_description: Perfect for holding in one's hand, this small and exquisite lantern is usually given out as souvenirs during the festival.

name: Ashen Dream
attributes_description: An item obtained from defeating Scar in Somnoire.
bg_description:
"I don't want to be your enemy, nor do I actually plan to destroy anything.
Let me make it clear for you: destruction is not my end goal. It's not even a matter of anyone's desires, but an inevitable conclusion.
Embrace IT. You will come to realize that resistance is futile."

name: Lotus Pastry
attributes_description: Increases Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 32%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
One of the specialties in Mt. Firmament. It resembles the fruit of the Silver Lotus. In fact, the residents of Mt. Firmament do incorporate Silver Lotus into this pastry.
It is said that the Silver Lotus only grows in thick snow, blooming amidst the cold. The residents on Mt. Firmament believe that this flower blooms in deep snow to show gratitude to the forest and to uphold a belief in eternal blossoming. Thus, they have wrapped this promise within this pastry. As the stars rise and the moon sets, as snow falls and melts, the people of Mt. Firmament will never forget their promises.

name: Spicy Meat with Pavo Plums
attributes_description: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 20%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
This dish features meat stir-fried with a generous amount of Pavo Plums. It's flavorful yet not greasy, aromatic, and spicy. It's an essential, simple dish to help you get through a lengthy winter.
"Want it tasty? Just add more Pavo Plums. It has to be spicy! The spiciness is key to its flavor!"

name: Spring Pastry
attributes_description: Increases Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 36%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Jinhsi's modified version of Lotus Pastry, a special dessert in Mt. Firmament.
As snow blankets the landscape, wishes drift down with the snowfall, settling quietly in the woods.
Though the snow continues to fall, it will eventually be swept away by the spring breeze, and the wishes buried deep in the snow will bloom like flowers.

name: Blazing Feather Spicy Meat
attributes_description: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 24%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Changli's favorite dish, which is made with extra chili.
The vibrant redness hints at its intense flavor, which seems to leap out of the bowl. Served alongside rice and a cup of osmanthus syrup, amidst the bustling ambiance of Capital Mingting, it provides a heavenly culinary experience.
While few in Mingting, apart from Changli, venture to taste this delicacy, it's a cherished household favorite among families in Hongzhen. Accompanied by wine, it adds an extra layer of warmth to the dining experience.

name: Recipe: Lotus Pastry
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Lotus Pastry.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Lotus Pastry.

name: Recipe: Spicy Meat with Pavo Plums
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Spicy Meat with Pavo Plums.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Spicy Meat with Pavo Plums.

name: Lollo Stamp
attributes_description: The voucher used to redeem the Lollo Helper special delivery.
bg_description:
Thank you for being a Lollo Helper!
To express our gratitude, we'd love to present you with a Lollo Stamp. You can use it to exchange for your Lollo Helper special delivery at the designated Lollo Logistics stations.

name: Jinhsi's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Jinhsi's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Changli's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Changli's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Sentinel's Dagger
attributes_description: Sentinel Jué's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
bg_description:
A ritual vessel gifted by Sentinel Jué.
Legend holds that upon the Lament's arrival in Jinzhou, time became entangled, with no more clear line between mornings and nights.
The Magistrate used the Sentinel's dagger as the gnomon of the sundial to determine the date and time.

name: Glazed Lamp
attributes_description: A key item in the Rite of Offering. Can be used to activate the Altar of Initiation.
bg_description: An ancient lamp crafted from special minerals. Its luminous blue radiance flickers ceaselessly, as if infused with boundless energy that endures through the ages.

name: Changli's Letter
attributes_description: A letter penned by Changli, containing a message for you.
bg_description:
With a subtle delightful scent, it reads: "Behold Hongzhen in its entirety, next to a ring and hanging eaves. When eternal snow thaws into flowing streams, let us reconvene."
It appears to be an invitation.

name: Feather Pendant
attributes_description: A feather pendant left behind by Changli.
bg_description:
Warm and weightless, it gently lands in your palm.
Its purpose remains a mystery.

name: Flame Feather Pendant
attributes_description: A flame feather warm to the touch, bestowed by Changli. It symbolizes a cherished sentiment.
bg_description: Through relentless practice, the most brilliant flames born of Forte are condensed into a flame feather nestled in your palm. Radiating a warmth akin to the touch of its creator, it shields the carrier from the harm of Flame Manipulation. This gift is reserved solely for the most significant individual.

name: Trace Scale
attributes_description: A unique item that unlocks Scale of Past when equipped.
bg_description: A crystal-clear scale that seems to reveal a different world within. It possesses an ability called Chrono Trace, which records surrounding time and space, allowing them to be revisited in the future. It is said to have intricate connections with Sentinel Jué.

name: Pavo Plum Sample
attributes_description: A Pavo Plum sample collected near the hot spring. It should come in handy for Bing'ge.
bg_description: Like Pavo Plums found elsewhere, this fruit looks incredibly delicious. However, knowing its taste, you wouldn't be quick to eat it.

name: The Second Coming of Solaris in-game redemption code.
attributes_description: An in-game item redemption code that can be used to redeem Second Coming of Solaris x Jewel Boba Collaboration Pack.
bg_description:
The collaboration between Jewel Boba and the Pioneer Association's Second Coming of Solaris has begun, bringing exclusive "jewels" to Second Coming of Solaris!
This secret key includes an in-game item redemption code, which can be used to claim the exclusive Jewel Boba Collaboration Pack in the game client.

name: Morphable Echo
attributes_description:
Can be used to obtain a random collected Echo.
Upgrade the Data Bank to increase your chance of getting Echoes of higher Rarity.
bg_description: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

name: Nova
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: An unstable crystal precipitated out of highly concentrated Remnant Energy. It is so unsteady that it starts to sublimate as soon as it is formed, disappearing into thin air as energy. Its existence reminds one of the transience of the life of a Nova.

name: Sea Flytrap
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description: A translucent shellfish, known as the "sea flytrap." It has a body composed of a dense gelatinous substance. It uses the luminescent pearl-like objects on its body to lure in and prey on marine organisms.

Havoc Eclipse Set: Tambourinist (Havoc DMG Bonus)
bg_description: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

name: Waveplate Crystal
attributes_description:
Refined Waveplate with a higher purity.
Waveplate Crystals start to regenerate once Waveplates are full, at the rate of 1 per 12 minutes. Consume to replenish an equal amount of Waveplates.
bg_description:
Created using the special technology from the Black Shores. An effective form to store and manage Waveplate resources.
"Always be prepared to avoid wastage."

name: Activated Chrono Sign
attributes_description: While equipped, this allows you to use the Chronopins left by CSC to temporarily slow down time in the surrounding area.
bg_description: Confirming identity, code name: Rover. Top-level access to the Woodveil Hall laboratory granted. May this item guide you to the answers and enlightenment we seek.

name: Tide Note
attributes_description:
A note containing music scores of Solaris's unique music.
Collect a certain number of these notes to claim rewards on the event page.
bg_description:
In a world constructed out of energy and syntony, all words and stories can be sung in music.
"I came into this world, bringing naught but paper, rope, and a shadow."

name: Dream Fragment
attributes_description: Dream Fragment
bg_description: Dream Fragment

name: Voucher of Reciprocal Tides
attributes_description: Use to redeem a free chance of Giveback Custom Convene
bg_description: Obtained via in-game mail. Use to redeem a free chance to Convene a 5-Star Standard Resonator of your choice in the Giveback Custom Convene. Thank you for choosing to stay with us on the journey forward.

name: Phantom: Impermanence Heron
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Xiangli Yao's Waveband
attributes_description: Used to activate Xiangli Yao's Sequences.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Zhezhi's Waveband
attributes_description: Used to activate Zhezhi's Sequences.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Skyshaker
attributes_description: A special firecracker sold at the Fireworks Shop. After equipping this to Utility, you can throw firecrackers to damage enemies. (Only available during the "By Moon's Grace" Event and will be removed from Backpack after the Event ends.)
bg_description: A special firecracker made by following a secret blueprint found in Xisha. Refrain from using this in crowded areas as it is both powerful and loud.

name: The Present
attributes_description: A folding fan that Zhezhi painted for you.
bg_description: Zhezhi's painting on this fan captures everything that is beautiful about this moment forever. It is her wish that you will recall this beautiful moment when you see this fan no matter where you are.

name: Dream Fragment
attributes_description: Dream Fragment
bg_description: Dream Fragment

name: Dream Fragment
attributes_description: Dream Fragment
bg_description: Dream Fragment

name: Magisterial Radiant Aid
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Magisterial Forging Aid
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Skyshaker
attributes_description: A special firecracker sold at the Fireworks Shop. After equipping this to Utility, you can throw firecrackers to damage enemies. (Only available during the "By Moon's Grace" Event and will be removed from Backpack after the Event ends.)
bg_description: A special firecracker made by following a secret blueprint found in Xisha. Refrain from using this in crowded areas as it is both powerful and loud.

name: Huanglong Omelette
attributes_description: Increases ATK and Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 6% and 10% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A common dish that has become a hallmark of Huanglong cuisine. Golden and exquisite, it is a breakfast plate beloved by people of all ages.
As it is always found on the dining tables of Huanglong, most folks see it as an everyday indulgence. But those who have been away from their homes always find themselves longing for its delicate fragrance.

name: Plumpcake
attributes_description: Restores 80 STA.
bg_description:
A cake that is baked in every kitchen in Huanglong when the Moon-Chasing Festival is around.
Shared on the reunion dinner among the elder and the young, who exchange good wishes in the moonlight sifting through the lush leaves of the osmanthus trees. Over the moon-chasing tale that's been told a thousand times before, everyone bites down on this sweet, fragrant treat and savors the joy of reunion.

name: Moon Pearl
attributes_description: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 1000, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A signature dessert of the Moon-Chasing Festival, with chewy rice balls served in rich, mellow sweet soup.
While some people pray to the moon for blessings, others put their prayers and blessings into this dessert.
"Reunion is what these Moon Pearls are all about!"

name: Moon Brew
attributes_description: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 20%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A mellow and refreshing wine enjoyed during the Moon-Chasing Festival.
In Jinzhou, there is a famous play about a person who drinks a thousand cups of wine so that, as he's awake, he can still walk in a dream, for there are places only reachable in the dreamland. The sweet taste enjoyed with closed eyes is the taste of home.

name: Vege Omelette
attributes_description: Increases ATK and Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 8% and 12% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
This nutritionally balanced, simple dish is a breakfast staple in Huanglong and a regular dish found in every household and the breakfast shops in Jinzhou. For someone who has lived in Jinzhou for many years like Xiangli Yao, it is an easy first choice for breakfast.
A sip of tea after a bite perfectly balances the flavors, satisfying your appetite while awakening your taste buds and mind after a deep sleep.

name: Sweet Stuffed Flatbread
attributes_description: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 220, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Zhezhi likes her Stuffed Flatbread sweet. She improved on the original recipe by adding her favorite sweetener. This simple, modest pastry restores energy quickly upon consumption and doesn't go bad for a long time. After learning how to make it, Zhezhi always stores lots of it at home and considers it an essential snack for her sketching trips.

name: Huanglong Omelette Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Huanglong Omelette.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Huanglong Omelette.

name: Plumpcake Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Plumpcake.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Plumpcake.

name: Moon Pearl Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Moon Pearl.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Moon Pearl.

name: Moon Brew Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Moon Brew.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Moon Brew.

name: Serenity of Xiehua Village
attributes_description: A scroll painting that Zhezhi gave you. This is the first scroll painting she has painted with her Forte in many years. The beautiful scenery depicted in the painting seems to give off a different feeling than before.
bg_description: It is an opportunity for encounters, a testimony of shared experiences, a key that opens hearts, and an unforgettable collaboration.

name: The Second Coming of Solaris in-game redemption code.
attributes_description: An in-game item redemption code that can be used to redeem Second Coming of Solaris x Jewel Boba Collaboration Pack.
bg_description:
The collaboration between Jewel Boba and the Pioneer Association's Second Coming of Solaris has begun, bringing exclusive "jewels" to Second Coming of Solaris!
This secret key includes an in-game item redemption code, which can be used to claim the exclusive Jewel Boba Collaboration Pack in the game client.

name: Phantom: Dreamless
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Youhu's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Youhu's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: The Shorekeeper's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Shorekeeper's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Topological Confinement
attributes_description: Fallacy of No Return's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: A dataset with an ever-changing topology that serves to create an infinite, eternal representation of reality. The Tethys System created this prison of causality, where unknown variations, including love and hope, are forever trapped.

name: Investigation Report on the Quick-Access Portals on the Black Shores
attributes_description: Open to view the content.
bg_description: A report with an appendix over 10 pages long of meticulous data analysis. Whoever submitted it was conscientious; that much is clear.

name: Blake Bloom's Radiant Aid
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Blake Bloom's Forging Aid
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Sword of Atrocity
attributes_description: A knight's sword, imbued with an obsession for mercy, must be placed in the right Sword Pedestal to seal its power.
bg_description: What one calls mercy, another experiences as cruelty.

name: Sword of Greed
attributes_description: A knight's sword, imbued with an obsession for generosity, must be placed in the right Sword Pedestal to seal its power.
bg_description: The greedy souls always complain that the world is not generous enough.

name: Sword of Ignorance
attributes_description: A knight's sword, imbued with an obsession for wisdom, must be placed in the right Sword Pedestal to seal its power.
bg_description: True wisdom is always accompanied by an equal measure of folly.

name: Sword of Vanity
attributes_description: A knight's sword, imbued with an obsession for honor, must be placed in the right Sword Pedestal to seal its power.
bg_description: Those who put ends before means only find empty glory.

name: Sword of Cowardice
attributes_description: A knight's sword, imbued with an obsession for bravery, must be placed in the right Sword Pedestal to seal its power.
bg_description: A coward's heart seeks refuge in the shell of bravery.

name: Dream of Chaos
attributes_description: An item obtained from defeating Dreamless in Somnoire.
bg_description:
Sweet dreams, bad dreams, ordinary dreams, heroic dreams, empty dreams...
Dreams that collide and fuse before dissipating like foams. At the point of impact, a hazy shadow appears—a projection of the anticipation and premonitions intertwined within...

name: The Unworthy Dreams
attributes_description: An item obtained from clearing the Nonexistent Dream.
bg_description:
A young woman dreams of the vibrant garden back in her hometown.
An elderly man envisions pouring tea for his late wife, just as he did in their early days together.
Yet IT claims these dreams are worthless, devoid of meaning.
Do you also agree that they should be erased?

name: Data Log of Black Shores Staff Forum
attributes_description: Open to view the content.
bg_description: An incomplete record of a discussion thread on the Black Shores' Staff Forum about the access doors.

name: KU-Cass Cartridge
attributes_description: Submit it to KU-Cass to raise the Data Hub level.
bg_description:
Game cartridges gathered and distributed by KU-Cass, a small robot active on the Black Shores. Some of the games are discontinued ones. These cartridges are sometimes given as awards in the Black Shores area.
"Why the cartridges if we can make them digital?"
"It's the tradition!"

name: Forgery Basic Supply
attributes_description:
Open to claim one basic material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare2>Inert Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare2>Impure Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare2>Lento Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare2>Waveworn Residue 210 *1</color>
<color=Rare2>Cadence Seed *1</color>
bg_description: A special supply chest. Its exterior is made from high-performance materials designed to withstand extreme heat and pressure.

<color=Rare3>Cadence Bud *1</color>
bg_description: A special supply chest. Its exterior is made from high-performance materials designed to withstand extreme heat and pressure.

bg_description: A special supply chest. Its exterior is made from high-performance materials designed to withstand extreme heat and pressure.

name: Forgery Premium Supply
attributes_description:
Open to claim one premium material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare5>Heterized Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Flawless Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Presto Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Waveworn Residue 239 *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Cadence Blossom*1</color>
bg_description: A special supply chest. Its exterior is made from high-performance materials designed to withstand extreme heat and pressure.

name: Fisher's Chowder
attributes_description: Increases DEF and Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 10% and 20% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A thick soup made with fish and dried Sea Flytraps simmered in milk. People in the coastal areas love this hearty and rich dish. With the cold wind blowing in from the sea, what dish could beat a bowl of hot soup?

name: Honeysuckle Cake
attributes_description: Increases ATK and Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 8% and 12% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A cake filled with honeysuckle paste, offering a subtle floral aroma and a distinctly sweet taste.

name: Creamy Clouds
attributes_description: Increases DEF and Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 12% and 22% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A thick soup beloved by the Shorekeeper made with nothing fancy but the freshly caught seafood commonly found in coastal households. The secret is to add in heavy milk and reduce the soup slowly.
It's little known that the soup was a result of the Shorekeeper's effort to recreate a soup that used to bring her so much comfort. She tried to replicate it to the best of her recollection, but through numerous attempts, she ended up with a recipe with her personal touch. The sweetness of the seafood blends well with a freshly toasted slice of bread. Its warmth soothes fatigue and soul... Maybe that's what that person meant by a "simple but certain" happiness.

name: Frostwork Cake
attributes_description: Increases ATK and Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 10% and 16% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Snacks kept by Youhu in her ice cauldron, always cool to the touch. 
It’s difficult for Youhu to find food and accommodations while she travels around Solaris hunting for antiquities. These tasty cakes are what keep her from starving at times like these.
Youhu likes to put fruits in the cauldron too. As a result, the moist crusts of the cakes always gives off the faint fragrance of the seasonal fruits.

name: Fisher's Chowder Recipe
attributes_description: Use it to learn how to make Fisher's Chowder
bg_description: A detailed recipe for Fisher's Chowder

name: Honeysuckle Cake Recipe
attributes_description: Use it to learn how to make Honeysuckle Cakes
bg_description: A detailed recipe for Honeysuckle Cakes

name: The Forgotten Blake Bloom
attributes_description: An abandoned Blake Bloom in a cave.
bg_description: This Blake Bloom once symbolized Lady Flora's role as a Bloom Bearer. However, its owner left it behind on the Black Shores.

name: Crushed Candy
attributes_description:
Increases Echo drop rate by 50% for 30m.
A gift from Painter: Thank you, my best audience.
bg_description: How could this happen... I had kept it safe for so long, yet now it's crushed—perhaps I should blame that little stumble during the Night Reveries. Still, I hope you'll accept it, as it's a small token of my gratitude.

name: Stardust
attributes_description: A special material. A reward will be granted after you've gathered a certain number of them.
bg_description:
Tiny shards of stars that long lost their blaze.
Observe and deduce, and in time, you'll find the entire history of Solaris in even the tiniest of fragments.
"For eons, she has been a solitary caretaker of stars, old or new, dead or alive."

name: Deep Sky Blazar Weapon Chest
attributes_description:
Open to claim one Deep Sky Blazar series weapon of your choice:
<color=Rare4> Waning Redshift *1</color>
<color=Rare4> Endless Collapse *1</color>
<color=Rare4> Relativistic Jet *1</color>
<color=Rare4> Celestial Spiral *1</color>
<color=Rare4> Fusion Accretion *1</color>
bg_description:
A prototype weapon designed by the Black Shores for elite combatants. This weapon takes its name from an active galactic nucleus whose blinding radiance pierces the cosmos.

No matter where you are, the starlight of the shores will always guide your way.

name: Stellar Matrix's Core
attributes_description: The core of a Stellar Matrix, where records of the key indicators of the Lament are compressed into. Upload it at the Modulation Hall to retrieve the data.
bg_description: If the stars ever cry, they must sound like the wrenching wails stilled in this cosmic relic.

name: "Starlight"
attributes_description: A Blake Bloom that symbolizes the supreme authority of the Black Shores, donned by the leader of the organization.
bg_description: She has seen all the stars, journeying to the end of time and space and back. This gleaming star kept her company, a speck of blooming stardust illuminating the night sky and guiding her way home. Listen closely to hear echoes of her prescence.

name: KU-Money's Personal Collection
attributes_description: A music player in which the Black Shores merchant KU-Money keeps a playlist of personal favorites.
bg_description: Even a merchant who handles millions every day listens to music to relax. Of course, it's up to you to decide what the value of this music player is.

name: Model HL-1
attributes_description: A device used by the Black Shores to monitor the status of each of the Sentinels. This model bears the serial HL-1. The meter reads 0.
bg_description: It is the Black Shores' duty to monitor the Sentinels, who are at the forefront of keeping the Lament and Threnodians at bay—yet it seems some have found ways to evade their surveillance.

name: Sonance Casket: Ragunna
attributes_description: Sonance Caskets in Ragunna are often found in precarious locations. Use Grapple for easier access. Deliver them to the Plushies in the Garden of the Lost in exchange for resources.
bg_description: The product of a collapsed Sonoro Sphere, scattered all over the world. It records the untwisted memories of the past. The Plushies are collecting them—perhaps they'll have something in exchange.

name: Molded Elite Class Echo I
attributes_description:
Open to claim one <color=Rare5>5-Star Elite Class Echo</color> of your choice.
 
List of Echoes:
Rejuvenating Glow Set: Rocksteady Guardian (Energy Regen)
Moonlit Clouds Set: Stonewall Bracer (Energy Regen)
Lingering Tunes Set: Spearback (Energy Regen)
Freezing Frost Set: Lumiscale Construct (Energy Regen)
Molten Rift Set: Viridblaze Saurian (Energy Regen)
Void Thunder Set: Violet-Feathered Heron (Energy Regen)
Sierra Gale Set: Hoochief (Energy Regen)
Celestial Light Set: Lightcrusher (Energy Regen)
Havoc Eclipse Set: Havoc Dreadmane (Energy Regen)
bg_description: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

name: Molded Elite Class Echo II
attributes_description:
Open to claim one <color=Rare5>5-Star Elite Class Echo</color> of your choice.

List of Echoes:
Rejuvenating Glow Set: Chasm Guardian (Energy Regen)
Moonlit Clouds Set: Spearback (Energy Regen)
Lingering Tunes Set: Flautist (Energy Regen)
Freezing Frost Set: Glacio Dreadmane (Energy Regen)
Molten Rift Set: Havoc Dreadmane (Energy Regen)
Void Thunder Set: Lumiscale Construct (Energy Regen)
Sierra Gale Set: Carapace (Energy Regen)
Celestial Light Set: Cyan-Feathered Heron (Energy Regen)
Havoc Eclipse Set: Tambourinist (Energy Regen)
bg_description: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

name: Innocent Dreams
attributes_description: A toy made from unknown materials, capable of detecting weak but warm frequencies.
bg_description:
A token of your successful completion of all the challenges in the event "Fairy Tale’s Finale." It’s a fitting gift for a brave soul like you.
A beautiful glass ball that looks somewhat familiar to you.
You can sense weak but warm frequencies pulsating from the miniature landscape inside it. Yet, it's still unclear what it's supposed to be used for.
"I hope you can draw strength from my story and win all battles."

name: Treasure Map to Sword of Courage
attributes_description: A treasure map bearing the location of the Sword of Courage. With the help of the map, one can find the Sword of Courage.
bg_description:
A map painted on wood, showing where the Sword of Courage can be found.
This is a gift given to Ying by Ying's mother before she passed away, which embodies the unspoken agreement between a mother and a daughter, whether the fabled gateway of wishes is real or not.

name: Wreath of Hope
attributes_description: A wreath woven from the feelings of the Wooly Adventure Squad. It marks the beginning of a new leg of the journey.
bg_description:
A wreath infused with the myriad feelings and emotions you and your friends have experienced along the way. The sight of this wreath gives you the strength to forge ahead.
You and the girl who suggested making this wreath have made a pact: Stories are an extension of life. You'll never run out of them, if you're adventurous enough. There will always be more adventures to be had, and more stories to be told.

name: Spicy Pulled Chicken
attributes_description: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 15% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A simple cold dish of pulled chicken with an appetizing splash of hot chili oil. Although simple to make, it always reminds people of their childhood.

name: Lumi's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Lumi's Resonance Chain
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Adventure Log
attributes_description: A token earned by submitting exploration reports from various regions. Can be exchanged for "Adventure Packages" at the Lollo Logistics truck.
bg_description: "If the Pioneer Association is the eyes of civilization, then Lollo Logistics aspires to be the feet that carry humanity forward," a Lollo Logistics member remarked during an interview.

name: Iced Grape Tea
attributes_description: Defeating overworld enemies yields 28% more Shell Credits, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Chilled, diced fruit is put in ice water and sweetened with fresh nectar. The clinking ice cubes produce a clear, melodic sound. 
Camellya made this fruit tea to her liking, with just a hint of milk and grapes as the base, subtly balanced by a splash of gooseberry juice. 
The refreshing sweetness dances on the tongue, leaving a delightful aftertaste as the faint bitterness from the tea fades.

name: Yuezhou Spicy Meat Noodles
attributes_description: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 28%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Long, silky noodles absorb the rich, spicy broth. Chopped scallions adorn generous slices of meat. One bite can make you sweat, even in winter's chill.
In the remote, rustic village of Yuezhou, this dish is Lumi's fondest memory of home. 
Despite her travels after joining Lollo Logistics, tasting a variety of cuisines, Lumi still believes that the steaming bowl of noodles from her hometown is the true definition of happiness.

name: Delivery Box
attributes_description: A delivery box from Lollo Logistics
bg_description: A sturdy, heavy-duty delivery box. If you happen to find one of these boxes abandoned by the roadside, please help recycle it.

name: Hearty Supper
attributes_description: Used to increase the Syntonization Rank of Somnoire Anchor.
bg_description:
Ever since he turned into a white cat, Ivory Gatekeeper has been dreaming of a grand meal...
It's a shame that he refuses to share any details with anyone.

name: Medium Enclosure Tank
attributes_description:
Open to claim one medium material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare3>Basic Ring*1</color>
<color=Rare3>MF Whisperin Core*1</color>
<color=Rare3>MF Howler Core*1</color>
bg_description: The Bloom Bearers of the Black Shores always return from their field trips with abundant samples, which are inventoried and sealed away by the Gardener after running the necessary tests for future use.

name: Advanced Enclosure Tank
attributes_description:
Open to claim one advanced material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Improved Ring*1</color>
<color=Rare4>HF Whisperin Core*1</color>
<color=Rare4>HF Howler Core*1</color>
bg_description: The Bloom Bearers of the Black Shores always return from their field trips with abundant samples, which are inventoried and sealed away by the Gardener after running the necessary tests for future use.

<color=Rare5>Tailored Ring*1</color>
