<color=Rare2>LF Whisperin Core*1</color>
<color=Rare2>LF Howler Core*1</color>
bg_description: The Bloom Bearers of the Black Shores always return from their field trips with abundant samples, which are inventoried and sealed away by the Gardener after running the necessary tests for future use.

name: Montelli Clearance Module - Level I
attributes_description: A clearance module specially authorized by Carlotta, granting you full access to every section of Averardo Vault.
bg_description:
"This is the highest level of access I can grant you, though it won't save you from the trouble of obtaining permissions within the Vault. I'm counting on you, Cat's Eye."
 
In other words, your clearance within the Averardo Vault is now on par with hers.

name: Montelli Clearance Module - Level II
attributes_description: A clearance module specially authorized by Carlotta, granting you full access to every section of Averardo Vault.
bg_description:
"This is the highest level of access I can grant you, though it won't save you from the trouble of obtaining permissions within the Vault. I'm counting on you, Cat's Eye."
 
In other words, your clearance within the Averardo Vault is now on par with hers.

name: Montelli Clearance Module - Level III
attributes_description: A clearance module specially authorized by Carlotta, granting you full access to every section of Averardo Vault.
bg_description:
"This is the highest level of access I can grant you, though it won't save you from the trouble of obtaining permissions within the Vault. I'm counting on you, Cat's Eye."
 
In other words, your clearance within the Averardo Vault is now on par with hers.

name: Ripples of Serene Dreams
attributes_description: An energy entity, symbolizing treasured memories, like ripples formed by a single sound.
bg_description: NO CONTENT

name: Stake of Imbalance
attributes_description: An item that can remove the Lifer's buff.
bg_description: Once a pivotal stake at the negotiation table, its intricate patterns seem to capture the tension, strategy, resolve, and compromise that transpired between the Order and the various fractions gathered around the table.

name: Bay Leaf
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description:
An herb with the longest history of use in Rinascita. 
Bay Leaves are used in cooking to give extra flavor to dishes because of their unique aroma, while Cassia Buds are used for their calming properties and to ward off insects. Together, they are revered in Rinascita as the "Sublime Remedy."

name: Thief's Talon
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
Golden Thiefbat's talon.
Golden Thiefbats have dexterous claws and like to steal anything that shines. The Thief's Talon is considered a lucky charm in Rinascita.
It is not unusual for a Ragunnesi businessman to put a Thief's Talon in their pocket in the hope of cutting lucrative deals.

name: Animal Fat
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description:
Refined animal fat, rich with savory aroma.
In expert hands, it creates a perfectly golden crisp crust, delivering indulgent flavor without a hint of greasiness. 
One bite and your taste buds will be in pure bliss.

name: Sea Bunny Meat
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description:
Sea Bunny Meat, rich in protein with a tender, succulent texture.
This delicacy requires careful preparation. The Heliobane Fungia, along with other poisonous glands and fluids, must be removed, and the meat cooked to just the right temperature to neutralize any toxins. Whether it becomes a delicious delicacy to die for, or one that costs you your life, depends entirely on the chef's skill.

name: Fur
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
Thick, soft fur, gentle to the touch, and warming to the very core.
Why strip their coats bare, you ask? Well, haven't you heard of the law of conservation of energy? The warmth hasn't disappeared, it's simply been transferred from them to you.

name: Goldcrest Scarab
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
A species of scarab that resembles a coin in appearance, with a reflective golden exoskeleton.
For Golden Thiefbats, Goldcrest Scarabs are both a pleasant sight and a delicious snack.

name: Heliobane Fungia
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description:
A type of poisonous algae that forms a symbiotic relationship with Sea Bunnies. Heliobane Fungia is rich in gelatine, an important ingredient in many desserts.
Gelatin extracted from Heliobane Fungia has a subtle sweetness and gives desserts a silky, springy texture.

name: Bell Crab
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description:
A species of crab that makes its home in miniature bells. 
Bell Crabs feed on fish, shrimp, clams, and other small sea creatures. They can scuttle about quickly, emitting a jingling sound as they go. At night, they avoid predators by hiding beneath the decaying hulls of beached boats.

name: Mastic Nuvola
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description:
A creamy resin produced by Nuvola trees, shaped like a cloud and carrying a unique fragrance.
The Nuvola tree is a symbol of healing and renewal. If such a tree is cut, it produces resin to seal the wound until it fully heals. The Ragunnesi call Mastic Nuvola "Healer's Tears."

name: Sunflare Everlasting
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description: A type of strawflower that grows in clusters. Sunflare Everlasting has pinnate leaves and disk-shaped flowers. Once picked and air-dried, the flowers retain their golden hue, described as "sunlight that never fades."

name: Viscum Berry
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description:
Legend says the first divine oracle given to Ragunna was carved into a tree trunk, and from the mark, a green branch grew.
The Viscum Berries that sprout from this branch are known as the "Fruit of Wisdom." It is believed that eating them grants spiritual enlightenment.

name: Cassia Bud
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description:
An herb with the longest history of use in Rinascita. 
Bay Leaves are used in cooking to give extra flavor to dishes because of their unique aroma, while Cassia Buds are used for their calming properties and to ward off insects. Together, they are revered in Rinascita as the "Sublime Remedy."

name: Felicitous Olives
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
bg_description:
The delectable fruit of a wild olive shrub that grows in fertile soil. Felicitous Olives are a favored food for certain animals.
Herders often raise herbivores with a keen sense of smell to help track down these prized olives.

name: Golden Fleece
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A cluster of golden sulfur crystals, often found in caves rich in geothermal activity. They resemble their mythical namesake—the Golden Fleece guarded by a venomous dragon.
When ground into a fine powder and combined with a hint of molten copper, Golden Fleece transforms into stage-worthy fireworks.

name: Sword Acorus
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A tall flower with a firm stem, crowned by delicate flowers.
Sword Acoruses are often used by instructors to teach swordsmanship to young nobles, replacing real swords with these harmless blooms. The children, entranced by the beauty and fragrance, find their attention captured far more easily than by cold, menacing blades.

name: Firecracker Jewelweed
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A vividly colored flower shaped like an unfurling firework.
Give a Firecracker Jewelweed a gentle shake, and its swollen capsules will burst open...
The seeds scatter in all directions, resembling the colorful burst of a firecracker.

name: Seaside Cendrelis
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A fluorescent flower often found in the crevices of ruins. In the past, Seaside Cendrelis wreaths were used in the rite of initiation for infants and the inaugurations of new Fisalia family heads. As a result, it became a symbol of the power once held by the old nobility.
Ever since the tower's fateful ascent to the sky, the Seaside Cendrelis has been considered extinct, for it has never been seen again.

name: Resonant Calcite
attributes_description: A material used for Crafting.
bg_description:
A mineral soaked in the waters of Nimbus Sanctum, its surface gleaming with an iridescent sheen. Resonant Calcite is an excellent conductor of Remnant Energy.
The origins of Resonant Calcite are still debated. Some believe its unique properties come from prolonged exposure to the flow of frequencies in Nimbus Sanctum, while others argue that these frequencies seeped into geological fissures, where they influenced the mineral's formation.

name: Fool's Gold
attributes_description: A material used for Crafting.
bg_description:
A versatile, bronzed iron ore often mistaken for gold, though it's not hard to tell the difference upon closer inspection.
In the past, con artists would craft Fool's Gold into jewelry and sell it as real gold.
Though such tricks are long obsolete, the name "Fool's Gold" endures to this day.

name: Awakening Bundle (For Pre-Sales)
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Awakening Bundle
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Tattered Photos
attributes_description: A stack of old, candid photos, most worn beyond recognition.
bg_description: In one, Camellya sits on a chair, seemingly talking to someone nearby.

name: Tattered Photos
attributes_description: A stack of old, candid photos, most worn beyond recognition.
bg_description: In one, Camellya sits on a chair, seemingly talking to someone nearby. It was a day of celebration on the Black Shores, with golden confetti drifting through the air, and the soft light casting a gentle glow on flowers, stones, and the sea. The expression she wore that day has long since faded from memory.

name: Lady Flora's Bracelet
attributes_description: A personal belonging stored at the Hall of Foreign Affairs.
bg_description: The lingering frequencies on the bracelet can help trace more of this Bloom Bearer's forgotten belongings.

name: Her Bracelet
attributes_description: Lady Flora's late personal belonging, and also a gift.
bg_description:
"Okay, okay, I'll wear it... but it's just for peace of mind, huh? If something I can't handle happens, well, you'll find me, won't you? Alive or dead... Hehe, wouldn't that be perfect too?"
"Oh, don't give me that look, Leader. As long as I have you, I'll wear it, I swear. I'll be such a good girl... just for you, hehe..."

name: Roccia's Gift: Luceanite
attributes_description: A gift from Roccia. A gold-striped black stone that shines with a soft brilliance, much like the gentle sparkle in your eyes.
bg_description: A piece of Luceanite washed ashore by the tide. Despite enduring centuries of wind, rain, and the ravages of time, this special Luceanite has retained its sheen. Roccia discovered it, carefully polished it, and kept it safe. After much hesitation, she finally gathered the courage to give it to you.

name: Scattered Petals
attributes_description: A few petals likely once part of a wreath. They have since wilted under the harsh sea winds.
bg_description: A few petals found near the Pilgrim's Sail. Likely once part of a wreath, they have since wilted under the harsh sea winds. Their advanced state of decay suggests they've been adrift at sea for a long time.

name: "Star"
attributes_description: A clear and sparkling star that shines just like the North Star in Pegasus.
bg_description: During their pilgrimage, everyone gathered around this "star" and sang Pegasus in praise of freedom to encourage one another. Wherever they could laugh freely, that was home.

name: Adventurer's Starter Pack
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Quality Adventurer's Starter Pack
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Roccia's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Roccia's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Carlotta's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Carlotta's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Cleansing Conch
attributes_description: Queen of the Night's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: A mystical, star-speckled conch. Hold it to your ear, and you may hear Lorelei's faint whispers. It was once used by the lost faithful to clear their minds and strengthen their belief. Some say a tiny Sonoro hides within, and the whispers are nothing more than echoes of one's true self.

name: Platinum Core
attributes_description: Sentry Construct's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: A finely crafted armor grants the Echo unstoppable strength, while a restless core hums quietly beneath its protective shell. Is it a mechanical component that powers the Echo, or a spirit trapped within its metal confines?

name: Blazing Bone
attributes_description: Dragon of Dirge's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
The bone of the giant dragon, burning with a haunting flame.
The fire blazes from its marrow, bringing both a soul-shaking trial and destruction to those who dare intrude. This is its eternal duty, a rage that never fades, ignited by those who forced it into service.

name: Tyrvine
attributes_description: A blade sealed with the very powers of Sentinel Imperator, and the artifact used to select Their Resonator.
bg_description:
The Sword of Divinity—"Tyrvine."

A blade sealed with the very powers of Sentinel Imperator, and the artifact used to select Their Resonator.

Approach it, and you might hear the faint howling of the wind.

name: Hognis
attributes_description: The blade exudes an aura as deep and mysterious as the abyss of the sea.
bg_description:
The Sword of Discord—Hognis.

A blade of unknown origin. According to Cartethyia, it seems to be the key to unraveling the seal in the Inverted Tower.

It exudes an aura as deep and mysterious as the abyss of the sea.

name: Haultir
attributes_description: A blade that bears no traces of time.
bg_description:
The Sword of Virtue—Haultir.

This sword once belonging to Cartethyia has now become one of the keys to unraveling the seal.

name: The Netherworld's Stare
attributes_description: Hecate's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: The joyful rhythm of her rondo taps on the gates of the netherworld, and with a single exchange of glances, death takes its first step. A gaze from the other side transforms into a full moon, filling her hollow right eye—thus, the still moon shifts, awakened by her stare.

name: Benett's Terminal
attributes_description: The Reserved Terminal owned by Benett, a deceased member of the Montelli family. It is severely damaged, with components missing or broken.
bg_description: Once repaired by a technician, it can provide information about the movements of its previous owner. However, further repairs are required to unlock more data. Though the deceased cannot speak, this Terminal serves as his voice. Complete the restoration to uncover the mystery—those covered data may hold the key to the truth you seek.

name: Cat's Eye Brooch
attributes_description: A Cat's Eye brooch from Carlotta, reflecting your golden eyes—also a personal token from her.
bg_description: In Montelli, each member has an item corresponding to their code name. Carlotta might begin preparing this gift for you from the very moment she was captivated by your golden eyes and offered you the code name "Cat's Eye." Although you don't intend to officially join Montelli, you know that she will forever keep this code name for you—Cat's Eye, the first and only member to receive Opal's personal invitation.

name: LF Polygon Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A fractured polygonal Tacet Core with an intricate, terraced pattern. Cracks can be found on its frail spiral structure. Seems to be a simple power unit of a Tacet Discord.

name: MF Polygon Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A common polygonal Tacet Core with an intricate, terraced pattern. The spiral structure is fairly complete. Seems to be an analog circuit recording the behavioral patterns of a Tacet Discord.

name: HF Polygon Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A robust polygonal Tacet Core with an intricate, terraced pattern. The concentric layers spiral inward in dense steps. It's deduced the density of its pattern correlates with the complexity of the Tacet Discord's behavioral patterns.

name: FF Polygon Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A robust polygonal Tacet Core with an intricate, terraced pattern. The polygonal structure shows a tendency to expand outwards, likely because of the lack of capacity for storing the growingly complex logic in the behaviors of a Tacet Discord.

name: LF Tidal Residuum
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A friable formation resembling a stranded boat, often found on Tacet Discords in Rinascita. Legends say these once covered every shore as the Dark Tide receded.

name: MF Tidal Residuum
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A common formation resembling a storm-weathered boat, often found on Tacet Discords in Rinascita, which are said to be born of the Dark Tide and carry this Residuum since their formation.

name: HF Tidal Residuum
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A robust formation resembling a sailing ship, occasionally found on certain Tacet Discords in Rinascita. Legend say Tacet Discords with this Residuum can hear the distant echoes of the Dark Tide.

name: FF Tidal Residuum
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A unique formation resembling a tide-breaking vessel, found only on a few powerful Tacet Discords in Rinascita. Legend say Tacet Discords bearing this Residuum can chart the course to the Journeying Paradise.

name: Saving Light
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: Lifted Clouds of Eons
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: All the Rediscovered Tales
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: Rinascita Commemorative Stamp
attributes_description: Commemorative stamps issued by the Pioneer Association. Obtain enough number of them to redeem rewards.
bg_description:
A commemorative stamp issued by the Ragunna branch of the Pioneer Association, themed around the long-awaited return of the Carnevale.
The sea breeze welcomes the return of this grand celebration!
"Some spend their entire lives chasing illusions, only left to seek relief within them.
Now, go forth—time to live in a real life!"

name: Monnaie
attributes_description: Special drops from the Ragunna region, which can be used to exchange for various items in Averardo Bank.
bg_description:
The old currency issued by Averardo Bank, which is no longer in circulation in Ragunna.
Nowadays, it is good for nothing but commemoration. Averardo Bank is working to recycle these antiques.

name: Porto-Veno's Badge
attributes_description: A badge that bears the crest of the Fisalia family.
bg_description: There are four special trials taking place around Porto-Veno Castle. Those who conquer these challenges will be granted this badge by the Fisalia family.

name: Carlotta's "Gem"
attributes_description: Before the battle begins, Carlotta places a handful of crystals in your hands. These are crafted from her Forte, akin to the texture of the bullets she uses in combat. Could there be a hidden message within this gesture?
bg_description:
In the Montelli family, it's common to pass on messages through coded language, gestures, and postures. By handing you her weapon and bullets, Carlotta assures you that you are safe—she has no intention of harming you during the upcoming action. 
Trust her, and follow her lead in this performance.

name: Invitation with a Fragrance
attributes_description: An invitation with a faint fragrance. The Montelli family crest embossed in the sealing wax.
bg_description:
The letter not only mentions that "the Carnevale will soon return to Rinascita" but also extends an offer to you: as the recipient, you are granted special status as an esteemed guest of the Montelli family, with access to the funds provided at Averardo Bank.
In a world of advanced technology, sending such an invitation via traditional letter speaks to the sincerity of the sender, highlighting their desire to forge a genuine and lasting connection with the invitee.

name: The Martyrdom of Blessed Fleurdelys - Act III (Unfinished)
attributes_description: A play written by the mysterious playwright Cristoforo, telling the story of Fleurdelys, the Blessed Maiden of the Order of the Deep.
bg_description:
A play written by the mysterious playwright Cristoforo, telling the story of Fleurdelys, the Blessed Maiden of the Order of the Deep.
The script, however, is unfinished, leaving the story hanging just before the Maiden's martyrdom.

name: Lycoris with Ominous Aura
attributes_description: A withered lycoris, its petals exuding an ominous aura.
bg_description: A withered lycoris, its petals exuding an ominous aura. You feel as if you've encountered a flower like this before...

name: Cloudcaster's Handle
attributes_description: The Cloudcaster's handle, once used as a fishing reel by the Troupe member.
bg_description:
The Cloudcaster's handle, once used as a fishing reel by the Troupe member.
It can be assembled with other parts of the Cloudcaster. Collect all the components and go find Roccia for the next step.

name: Cloudcaster's Base
attributes_description: The Cloudcaster's base, once used as a desk by the Troupe member for composing music.
bg_description:
The Cloudcaster's base, once used as a desk by the Troupe member for composing music.
It can be assembled with other parts of the Cloudcaster. Collect all the components and go find Roccia for the next step.

name: Cloudcaster's Resonance Unit
attributes_description: The Cloudcaster's Resonance Unit, once used to calibrate pitch and rhythm by the Troupe member.
bg_description:
The Cloudcaster's Resonance Unit, once used to calibrate pitch and rhythm by the Troupe member.
It can be assembled with other parts of the Cloudcaster. Collect all the components and go find Roccia for the next step.

name: Pizza Classica
attributes_description: Increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A traditional dish from Rinascita, topped with gemberry jam, cheese, and smoked sausage. When it comes out of the oven, it fills the air with a rich aroma.
There was a man who swore he'd never have olives on his pizza, but the more he resisted, the more olives he got.

name: Pizza Tropicale
attributes_description: Increases Healing Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A non-traditional dish from Rinascita, topped with gemberry jam, cheese, and crownapple. When it comes out of the oven, it elicits gasps and cries.
1. NEVER mention Pizza Tropicale to a Ragunnesi.
2. NEVER mention crownapple to a Ragunnesi.
3. NEVER mention apple or crown...

name: Triple-Scoop Ice Cream
attributes_description: Reduces Flight STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 15% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Three perfectly stacked scoops of ice cream, balanced on a crunchy cone. Each scoop brings a different flavor, and every bite tastes like joy.

name: Nuvola Pasta
attributes_description: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 30% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Pasta made with Mastic Nuvola, known for its strong, inviting fragrance. It is said that the fragrance attracts the singing wraiths from the Nimbus Sanctum. People often venture out at dawn to gather fresh Mastic Nuvola, hoping to catch the melody it holds within.

name: Ragunna Espresso
attributes_description: Reduces Flight STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 10% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A traditional coffee from Ragunna, rich and intense. Finishing a cup of Ragunna Espresso without flinching is a true mark of adulthood.
"You've already had three cups today!"
"But this is only my third task!"

name: Steak Margherita
attributes_description: Increases Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A massive, freshly cooked steak perfect for a family gathering. According to a well-meaning local, the only proper way to enjoy Steak Margherita is medium-rare. Noted. But let's go with medium-well, just to be safe.

name: Laurus Salad
attributes_description: Increases Healing Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Freshly mixed with Viscum Berries and Laurus Sprouts, this salad is light, sweet, and healthy.
Acolytes of the Order regard the Viscum Berry as the "holy nourishment of the wise." They chew the fruit alongside sacred texts, believing that doing so imprints the teachings upon the soul.

name: Nectarwine
attributes_description: Increases Healing Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 15% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Brewed from the nectar of Sunflare Everlasting, this mead is gifted by the Montelli family to each of its new members. To drink this mead is to let go of old grudges, and show the truest of hearts.

name: Daily Panini
attributes_description: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
The perfect morning sandwich—delicious, quick, and wholesome. 
Even the simplest bread holds infinite potential. Like life, a panini may seem the same every day, but it is always a little different.

name: Every Flavor Bell Crab
attributes_description: Increases ATK and Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 22% and 12% respectively for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: The troupe's favorite seafood, Bell Crab, is the soul of this dish. Each Bell Crab finds its perfect shell, giving it a distinct flavor. Before every meal, the troupe members place a bet: What will the next crab taste like?

name: Baton Bread
attributes_description: Increases Healing Bonus and Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 5% and 10% respectively for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A bread that looks like a baton and tastes like one. Rumor has it, someone once tried to use it as the main shaft for an aircraft—fortunately, that idea never took off.

name: Orange Espresso
attributes_description: Reduces Flight STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 12% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: An espresso with a hint of orange, this has become Carlotta's morning ritual since joining the Montelli family. The bold coffee flavor is mellowed by a citrusy sweetness, creating a refreshing balance. It's perfect for those gearing up for a challenge or unwinding after one.

name: Multi-Scoop Ice Cream
attributes_description: Reduces Flight STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 18% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: With a makeshift mini ice cream maker, Roccia serves up simple ice cream that's both generous in portion and light on the pocket. It's become a beloved treat among the troupe, satisfying their cravings for sweets without straining their budget.

name: Riccioli Fishery Coin
attributes_description: The fishery coin circulated within the Riccioli Islands. Can be used to purchase fishing gear and cover daily expenses.
bg_description: The Riccioli Islands, a territory of Rinascita, uses Shell Credits as well. However, fishermen and sailors there have their own unique currency for sea trade.

name: Abyssal Coral
attributes_description: A precious coral cherished by Riccioli fishermen. Can be used to redeem rewards.
bg_description: It's a tradition to trade using precious corals in the Riccioli Islands—though, not all corals are conveniently washed ashore by the waves.

name: Coast Flax
attributes_description: A special Coast Flax native to the Riccioli Islands. Can be used to enhance Fishing Abilities.
bg_description: A special Coast Flax native to the Riccioli Islands, often used as a roughing material.

name: Palm Tree Log
attributes_description: A special Palm Tree Log native to the Riccioli Islands. Can be used to enhance Fishing Abilities.
bg_description: A special Palm Tree Log native to the Riccioli Islands, often used as a roughing material.

name: Metal Debris
attributes_description: Metal Debris discovered in the Riccioli Islands. Can be used to enhance Fishing Abilities.
bg_description: Metal Debris discovered in the Riccioli Islands. Despite erosion from the sea, it is still suitable as a roughing material.

name: "Sweet Puff"
attributes_description: A special species of Gulpuff. Can be used as explosives, thus they are known as "Bampuffs."
bg_description: It is said that this particular type of Gulpuff releases a sweet fragrance when it explodes, making it a sought-after material for crafting wedding fireworks.

name: Sandworm
attributes_description: The most common bait in Rinascita. Casting it with Baiting creates an ideal Fishing Spot.
bg_description: The go-to bait for Riccioli fishermen, rich in the shallow seas.

bg_description: An expansion unit of Data Bank, steadily increasing the maximum power limit of the Flight function.

attributes_description: A special coin forged by the Fisalia family, obtained by completing Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain. Can be exchanged for a variety of supplies prepared by the Fisalias.
bg_description: NO CONTENT

name: Codex of the Deep: Preface (137th Edition)
attributes_description: A gift from Phoebe. This book introduces the Codex of the Order and explains the basic doctrines and philosophies regarding the Divinites, written in simple terms.
bg_description: A gift from Phoebe. This book introduces the Codex of the Order and explains the basic doctrines and philosophies regarding the Divinites, written in simple terms.

name: Tower
attributes_description: A painting gifted by the traveling painter Claudia, capturing a scene from the tower ruins.
bg_description:
According to legend, the Thorncrown Rises, located in Thessaleo Fells, holds the lost glory of the Fisalia family. 
Through the painter's delicate brushstrokes, one can sense her upset and confusion.

name: "Wishes Under a Clear Sky"
attributes_description: A toy made from unknown materials, emanating a faint but warm frequency.
bg_description:
Proof of successful completion of all the challenges in "Although Colors Have No Form."
A talisman from Claudia, rumored to be a fragment of the Genesis Nexus. It emits a faint but warm frequency, though its true purpose remains uncertain.
"...They longed for the sky above, yearning for it more desperately than any soul in this world."

name: City Bathed in Sea Breeze
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: Casket Sonar Use Permit: Rinascita
attributes_description: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to Casket Sonar in given regions.
bg_description: The use permit of the Casket Sonar in Rinascita. To ensure frequency safety in Rinascita, users are permitted to use the Casket Sonar only within authorized areas in compliance with this official permit.

name: Lootmapper Use Permit: Rinascita
attributes_description: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to the Lootmapper in given regions.
bg_description: The use permit of the Lootmapper in Rinascita. To ensure frequency safety in Rinascita, users are permitted to use the Lootmapper only within authorized areas in compliance with this official permit.

name: Averardo Vault Brochure

bg_description: "Why choose us to manage your wealth?"

name: Lonely SOL-3: The Complete Guide to Ragunna
attributes_description: A book found in Egla Town.
bg_description: "Your Egla column hasn't been updated since last Carnevale. It's just the same article over and over. You guys can't afford to pay the writer or something?"

name: Former Privy Councilor's Notes
attributes_description: A book found in Penitent's End.
bg_description: "I look to my side, surprised to find that my former seminary classmate, Lord Fenrico, has his face shrouded in a strange shadow."

name: A Transgressor's Transcript
attributes_description: A book found in Thessaleo Fells.
bg_description: "O my glorious Fisalia, the shadows of my people are approaching, guiding me to the deep sea."

name: Witchcraft, Spies, and Complaints
attributes_description: A book found in the Hallowed Reach.
bg_description: "We shall pray for them day and night, that they may be saved by our Sentinel Imperator. Praise be to Imperator."

name: The Codex of Holy Rituals
attributes_description: A book found in the Fagaceae Peninsula.
bg_description: "After this I looked, and behold, a white horse with only half a body. It commanded me to lift my lantern and pray, that people may come to know one another and be granted victory upon victory."

name: Essays on the Ragunnesi Drama
attributes_description: A book found in Ragunna City.
bg_description: "Please, don't turn me into a blade of seagrass tomorrow!"

name: Voyage Logbook
attributes_description: A book found in Nimbus Sanctum.
bg_description: "Mom, when I get back, can I just hug you for a bit?"

name: Unfettered Dove through Day and Night
attributes_description: A custom-made Carnevale mask ordered by Carlotta for you. It draws inspiration from her impressions on you and Abby.
bg_description:
A custom-made Carnevale mask ordered by Carlotta for you. It draws inspiration from her impressions on you and Abby. 
This mask covers half of the face, creating a perfect balance of personality and enigma. Minimal decorations ensure that it remains functional, offering unobstructed vision and mobility during combat.

bg_description: The time we spend on stage makes our wishes shine brighter.

attributes_description:
Open to claim one Poetry and Paean series weapon of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Meditations on Mercy *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Fables of Wisdom *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Romance in Farewell *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Legend of Drunken Hero *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Waltz in Masquerade *1</color>
bg_description: A standard weapon forged by the Montelli family. Though it may seem like a mere stage prop, in essence, it is a deadly instrument of destruction. It is said that many members of the Montelli family carry this weapon during the Carnevale, prepared for the inevitable...

name: Troupe Strength
attributes_description: Increases Heavy Attack DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: The troupe's self-brewed liquor, its name a symbol of ownership, power, and honor. The seafarers used to bicker endlessly over what to call it. After many wagers and a fair bit of their private stock on the line, the drunken Fools finally reached a decision: it would be called "Troupe's Strength."

name: Gold Star Pizza
attributes_description: Increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 50% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Now available at Trattoria Margherita in Ragunna City, a new pizza said to come from the distant land of Huanglong. With a unique topping of beef, pineapple, durian, and cheese, this pizza delivers a flavor that surprises and lingers. As fans of this bold combo always say, "It hits like a wave!"

name: Peach Blossom
attributes_description: Used to unlock a Resonator-specific outfit that grants the designated Resonator a new look.
bg_description:
Dance in the moonlight, sing to the blooms. It is a dance to commemorate your first meeting, the many journeys you'll share, and the companionship forged along the way.
"Now that spring returns, who will share it with me?
The peach blossom's beauty longs for eyes that see."

name: Exorcistic Adjuration

bg_description: Silver hair, piercing red eyes, monochromatic garments... A ferocious mask conceals her face, while a gleaming blade rests in her hand. Her voice rings out in a powerful chant, driving away evil spirits and banishing malicious souls.

name: Morphable Echo - Frosty Resolve
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Frosty Resolve.

2pcs Set: Resonance Skill DMG +12%.

5pcs Set: Casting Resonance Liberation grants 30% Glacio DMG Bonus and 30% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for 6s.
bg_description: Between the cracks, crystalline ice blooms...

name: Morphable Echo - Eternal Radiance
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Eternal Radiance.
 
2pcs Set: Spectro DMG +10%.
 
5pcs Set: Inflicting Spectro Frazzle on enemies increases Crit. Rate by 20% for 15s. Attacking enemies inflicted with 10 stacks of Spectro Frazzle grants 15% Spectro DMG Bonus for 15s.
bg_description: Between the cracks, shimmering lights dance and flicker like distant stars...

name: Morphable Echo - Midnight Veil
attributes_description:

5pcs Set: Triggering Outro Skill deals additional 480% Havoc DMG to surrounding enemies, and grants the incoming Resonator 15% Havoc DMG Bonus for 15s.
bg_description: Between the cracks, obscure shadows merge and coil like a dark veil...

name: The Nimbus Chorale: Soil of Abundance
attributes_description: A musical record found in Nimbus Sanctum. This chorale was performed by the people of Rinascita long before the Order's founding.
bg_description: "We thank Rinascita, for she embraced us with her fertile lands, offering a shelter to those of us drifting in the winds on the sea. From this day forward, we shall have a place to call home, where our roots embed deeply."

name: Fusion-resistant Spray
attributes_description: Within 180s, deal DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses to increase Fusion DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 10s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

name: Plushies' Photo
attributes_description: A group photo of Plushies, accidentally discovered within a morph painting.
bg_description: A group photo from the past, capturing the feeling that never fades.

name: Plushie Village Restoration Log: Final
attributes_description: The last commemorative item earned from restoring the Plushie Village.
bg_description: A proof of the efforts made in restoring the Plushie Village alongside your Plushie friends. It represents the cherished memories you share with your Plushie companions—"No one needs you, but I do; no one accepts who you are, but I do."

name: Bell of Resonance
attributes_description: A special item obtained after fully restoring the Plushie Village.
bg_description: A bell said to resonate with others, no matter the distance.

name: The Nimbus Chorale: Crystal Sky
attributes_description: A musical record found in Nimbus Sanctum. This chorale was performed by the people of Rinascita long before the Order's founding.
bg_description: "We thank the towering figure in the skies above, who guided our sails and protected us as we pressed onward."

name: The Nimbus Chorale: Order of Nature
attributes_description: A musical record found in Nimbus Sanctum. This chorale was performed by the people of Rinascita long before the Order's founding.
bg_description: "We thank the cycle of day and night, the ever-shifting seasons, for they have kept hope alive in the darkness and have taught us to look forward to the harvest even in the coldest winters."

name: The Nimbus Chorale: Glory to Humanity
attributes_description: A musical record found in Nimbus Sanctum. This chorale was performed by the people of Rinascita long before the Order's founding.
bg_description: "We thank each ancestor who boarded the ship of expedition, knowing they will never return. Time would wear their bodies down, yet their unwavering will carried them forward."

name: Loneliness of the Deep Sea
attributes_description: A toy made from unknown materials, capable of detecting weak but warm frequencies.
bg_description:
A token of your successful completion of all the challenges in "Dream Patrol: Ragunna," a gift to you, who remains as warm as ever in the depths of the deep sea.
A delicate glass bottle containing a miniature landscape that emits weak but warm frequencies. Yet, its true purpose remains uncertain.
"The warm Rinascita, where the sun shines blazingly and the water ripples tenderly."

name: Nameless Coin

name: Judgment Lost Flag
attributes_description:
After casting Intro Skill, increases Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 15s.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: A flag used by ships transporting prisoners between islands.

name: Sermon Lost Flag
attributes_description:
Every time a Resonator deals Basic Attack DMG, their next Basic Attack DMG is Amplified by 4% for 15s, stacking up to 5 times.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: A flag used by ships transporting Acolytes from the Order between islands.

name: Merchant Lost Flag
attributes_description: NO CONTENT
bg_description: A flag used by merchant ships conducting commerce between islands.

name: Hunting Lost Flag
attributes_description:
Every time a Resonator deals damage, their next Heavy Attack DMG is Amplified by 4% for 15s, stacking up to 5 times.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: A flag used by pirate ships hiding within the sea mist.

name: Assistance: Rare Pact
attributes_description:
Summons an Echo to support you in combat. It does not take damage from the Resonators.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: A strange pact and its accompanying Echo, offered by an unnamed lady. It recreates fragments of the Sentinel's divine miracles in a mysterious way.

name: Development Rare Pact
attributes_description: NO CONTENT
bg_description: An amazing device paired with its detailed instruction manual brought from distant shores. It vanished without a trace after being auctioned off to a mysterious magnate.

name: Pioneer Captain's Seal
attributes_description: NO CONTENT
bg_description: The seal of a captain whose settler ship foundered within sight of its new homeland. The captain ordered those onboard to save themselves, while he himself gripped the helm and vanished into the deep with his cherished ship.

name: Plunderer Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Recovers 3% of the Resonator's HP per second and deals 600% Electro DMG to nearby targets upon the sixth HP recovery.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: A pirate ship wandering in the mist, known for instilling everlasting fear with the simplest tricks.

name: Betrayer Captain's Seal
attributes_description: NO CONTENT
bg_description: A ship, wrecked in the struggle for its seal. Treachery set its sail ablaze, toppled its masts, and left nothing but this seal.

name: Absolver Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
After casting Resonance Liberation, increases Basic Attack Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 15s and reduces their Resonance Skill cooldown by 10s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: A ship of the Order Tribunal, often found cruising the sea. It always arrives in time to "mediate" conflicts. They may have "absolved" the guilty, but others never "absolve" them.

name: Pilgrim Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Each time casting Resonance Skill reduces Resonance Liberation cooldown by 20% and recovers Resonance Energy by 20%. This effect has a cooldown of 3s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Everyone celebrates its departure; no one anticipates its return.

name: Old Compass
attributes_description: An old compass, used to unlock and enhance other Fishing Abilities.
bg_description: This compass is so old that it's impossible to tell if it's malfunctioning or working perfectly. But does it really matter? As long as it points somewhere, who cares where it lead, right?

name: Rinascita Fishing Guidebook
attributes_description: A guidebook obtained by chance, used to enhance Rover's Fishing Ability.
bg_description: A detailed guidebook compiled by Rinascita's finest fishing experts—but remember, it takes no responsibility for what's caught.

name: Fragment of a Mysterious Scripture
attributes_description: A scripture fragment obtained by chance, used to enhance Phoebe's Fishing Ability.
bg_description: A scripture fragment found on the seabed of the Riccioli Islands, documenting what is unrecorded in the Codex of the Order of the Deep. Those fragmentary words seem to respond to the very call of the ocean.

name: Rinascita Fishing Guidebook: Chapter One
attributes_description: A guidebook obtained by chance, used to enhance Rover's Fishing Ability, and increase the sale price of catch.
bg_description: This chapter explains the proper technique for using groundbait.

name: Rinascita Fishing Guidebook: Chapter Two
attributes_description: A guidebook obtained by chance, used to enhance Rover's Fishing Ability, and increase Fishery Coins obtained from requests.
bg_description: This chapter explains the proper technique for reeling fish in.

name: Rinascita Fishing Guidebook: Chapter Three
attributes_description: A guidebook obtained by chance, used to enhance Rover's Fishing Ability, and increase the materials obtained from processing.
bg_description: You've now mastered every fishing technique. Now put your skills to the test. Reel in that whale!

name: Fragment of a Mysterious Scripture: Chapter One
attributes_description: A scripture fragment obtained by chance, used to enhance Phoebe's Fishing Ability, add Request slots, and lower Request consumption.
bg_description: "Hooves churn the sea as the fish's tail thrashes the foam."

name: Fragment of a Mysterious Scripture: Chapter Two
attributes_description: A scripture fragment obtained by chance, used to enhance Phoebe's Fishing Ability, and increase hull Durability.
bg_description: "...Let it be known—on tranquil waters, no sailor reigns supreme."

name: Fragment of a Mysterious Scripture: Chapter Three
attributes_description: A scripture fragment obtained by chance, used to enhance Phoebe's Fishing Ability, and increase the probability of obtaining Mutants.
bg_description: "Avenge... for the divine... and for yourself."

name: Melody Box
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: Reveler Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

name: The Gospel that Receives Harmonized Praise
attributes_description:
After casting Intro Skill, increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 40% and Crit. DMG by 80% for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: "Amidst the panicked Fools, he stood out, kneeling devoutly before the terrifying anomaly. Raising his brooch high, he chanted hymns, surrendering himself to the tide until he became one with it..."

name: The Sails that Display Endeavor
attributes_description:
Casting Resonance Liberation Amplifies Resonance Skill DMG of the active Resonator by 90% for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Time was too short—he only managed to save a single possession before plunging into the sea. Even as his lungs emptied of air, his grin widened. "Surely, I'm the greatest merchant in the world! Trading my life for my family's future—a bargain like no other!"

name: The Ambition that Lies Hidden
attributes_description:
Increases Spectro DMG by 12.5% for each stack of Spectro Frazzle inflicted on targets, stacking up to 10 times. This effect lasts for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: In the opening act, an obscure youth boarded the ship with nothing but a dagger. In the final act, a notorious pirate captain met his end, betrayed by his own confidant, sinking with a dagger into the deep.

name: Adventure Log
attributes_description: A token earned by submitting exploration reports from various regions. Can be exchanged for "Adventure Packages" at the Lollo Logistics truck.
bg_description: "If the Pioneer Association is the eyes of civilization, then Lollo Logistics aspires to be the feet that carry humanity forward," a Lollo Logistics member remarked during an interview.

name: Familiar-looking Large Fish
attributes_description: A large fish acquired by chance from fishing. It can be used to replace another fish.
bg_description: This fish leaped into the boat as the net was hauled in, almost as if eager to be caught. It looked strangely familiar...

name: Helm Village Lighthouse Key
attributes_description: Use this key to activate the lighthouse in Helm Village.
bg_description: "Oh, you mean this? Ahab asked me to keep it for him. I don't know where he got it, but... this thing, it must have something to do with that whale, right?"

name: Titanium Mackerel
attributes_description: A mysterious mechanical device. It activates the Serene Bay lighthouse.
bg_description: This mysterious fish doesn't seem to be from this world. Perhaps that's why it has the power to activate the lighthouse Imperator built.

name: Reyes Treasure Map Fragment
attributes_description: A fragment of a treasure map. Collect all pieces to assemble the complete map.
bg_description: Why are treasure maps often fragmented? They should probably conceal the treasure in multiple locations. Easier for the later generations to find.

name: Pequod Blueprint: Basic
attributes_description: Basic blueprint for constructing "Pequod."
bg_description: The island's fishermen never actually saw the real "Pequod." Captain Ahab only described it as a ship that sank at sea. This design is based on Ahab's sketches and the Ragunna boat model.

name: Pequod Blueprint: Advanced
attributes_description: Advanced blueprint for constructing "Pequod."
bg_description: "The world is a vast ship sailing onward, with no single, definitive voyage."

name: Ahab's Diary
attributes_description: A sea-weathered journal of Ahab's past sailing experiences.
bg_description: He was invincible at sea until he encountered it. The Captain Ahab who once traversed Solaris's vast oceans, is now but an old man, filled with hatred and hope, defiantly awaiting death by the sea.

name: Nannerl's Bottle
attributes_description: Nannerl's drift bottle that holds her dreams.
bg_description: "Brother, wherever you may be... if you can see this, play a song for me. I will hear it. One day, you will hear my music too."

name: Wonder Bubble in the Port of Riccioli
attributes_description: A mysterious floating bubble where fish might be hiding. Upon purchase, a Wonder Bubble will be generated near the current dock to help Rover catch crabs and urchins.
bg_description: Legend has it that this bubble forms from the breath of the Cetus the Tidebreaker, serving as a natural shelter for fish... until fishermen burst their bubble of sanctuary.

name: Wonder Bubble of Helm Village
attributes_description: A mysterious floating bubble where fish might be hiding. Upon purchase, a Wonder Bubble will be generated near the current dock to help Rover catch crabs and urchins.
bg_description: Legend has it that this bubble forms from the breath of the Cetus the Tidebreaker, serving as a natural shelter for fish... until fishermen burst their bubble of sanctuary.

name: Wonder Bubble of the Serene Bay
attributes_description: A mysterious floating bubble where fish might be hiding. Upon purchase, a Wonder Bubble will be generated near the current dock to help Rover catch crabs and urchins.
bg_description: Legend has it that this bubble forms from the breath of the Cetus the Tidebreaker, serving as a natural shelter for fish... until fishermen burst their bubble of sanctuary.

name: Wonder Bubble of the Reyes Ruins
attributes_description: A mysterious floating bubble where fish might be hiding. Upon purchase, a Wonder Bubble will be generated near the current dock to help Rover catch crabs and urchins.
bg_description: Legend has it that this bubble forms from the breath of the Cetus the Tidebreaker, serving as a natural shelter for fish... until fishermen burst their bubble of sanctuary.

name: Sailer's Conviction
attributes_description: An awning for Rachel. Enhances cruising speed.
bg_description: What follows is a long voyage—a relentless pursuit to the every edge of the world.

name: Blue-Spotted Giant Fish
attributes_description: Used to increase the Syntonization Rank of Ocean's Gift.
bg_description: The eyes of this mysterious giant fish gleam with an eerie glow, and if you listen closely, you might even catch a faint melody within the flickers. Undoubtedly, it is one of the ocean's gifts.

name: Faith of Unity
attributes_description: An awning for Rachel. Boosts the chance of gaining high-quality catches.
bg_description: In the heart of the tempest, we gather. The storm may rage, but we were born to prevail.

name: Valor of Tidebreaker
attributes_description: An awning for Rachel. Helps evade certain threats while cruising.
bg_description: Amidst the furious waves, we press on. It lies just before us.

name: Passion of Vengeance
attributes_description: An awning for Rachel. Increases the chance to gain catches of extreme sizes.
bg_description: In the end, silence reigns. I am the only one who reports to you.

name: The Blood Pact that Corrupts to the Core
attributes_description:
Increases the Resonance Liberation DMG dealt by the active Resonator by 120% for 20s after every 10 instances of damage dealt by Resonators in the team. 

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: "His body grew heavier, the darkness wrapped around him, dragging him steadily toward the abyss. In the silence, only the whisper of the ring echoed, 'You cannot escape; no one can...'"

name: The Revelry that Unveils Mysteries
attributes_description:
While Resonators are in mid-air, their DMG dealt is Amplified by 55% for 15s when Resonators are in mid-air.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Sing and dance, my friends! Rejoice in our triumph over a thousand reefs and a thousand storms! Sing and dance, my friends! With gratitude to the Sentinel and memories of our fallen comrades, we shall live proudly on this scorching land!

name: Phoebe's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Phoebe's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Brant's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Brant's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: "Sweet Puff"
attributes_description: Bampuff for detonating certain reefs
bg_description: Intended as fireworks for Starbuck's wedding with a certain fish, this Bampuff is incredibly powerful and can also be used to destroy reefs.

name: Fresh Fish
attributes_description: Fresh Fish for Julien.
bg_description: Julien loves it! Thanks meow!

name: Special Every Flavor Bell-less Crab
attributes_description: Special Every Flavor Bell-less Crab, though it looks like the taste might be a bit weird.
bg_description: Perhaps "delicious" is always subjective, just as Imperator understands that not everyone knows how to ride a horse.

name: Phaom Whistle
attributes_description: A whistle Cartethyia taught you how to use. When equipped in Utility, it allows you to summon the Gondola Phaom near water. (Usable only in Avinoleum)
bg_description: A whistle Cartethyia taught you how to use.

name: Amber Key
attributes_description: An amber key that seemingly holds the secret to unlocking a treasure chest.
bg_description: "It looks like a chunk of amber. Its color is quite beautiful. Let's take it and head to the next isle."

name: Captain's Chart
attributes_description: A chart worth "a whole coin," carrying a hidden story, a big adventure, and... a person's untold life.
bg_description: "If we want something from the sea, we have to offer something in return."

name: Half A Lucky Coin
attributes_description: A lucky coin discovered while gutting a fish, bearing the mark of Captain Drake. Unfortunately, it's only a half.
bg_description: According to the crew, this coin might point the way to a hidden treasure...

name: Lucky Coin
attributes_description: A whole coin. The map it reveals points the way to Captain Drake's treasure under the moonlight.
bg_description: With the coin complete, the path to treasure lies ahead. The course is set, ready to sail!

name: Morphable Echo - Freezing Frost
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Freezing Frost.
2pcs Set: Glacio DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Glacio DMG + 10% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 3 times, each stack lasts 15s.
bg_description: Chills are emanating from the crevice...

name: Morphable Echo - Molten Rift
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Molten Rift.
2pcs Set: Fusion DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Fusion DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Resonance Skill.
bg_description: Flames are flickering and rising in the crevice...

name: Morphable Echo - Void Thunder
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Void Thunder.
2pcs Set: Electro DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Electro DMG + 15% after releasing Heavy Attack or Resonance Skill. This effect stacks up to 2 times, each stack lasts 15s.
bg_description: Thunder is rumbling in the crevice...

name: Morphable Echo - Sierra Gale
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Sierra Gale.
2pcs Set: Aero DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Aero DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Intro Skill.
bg_description: A gust of wind is howling through the crevice...

name: Morphable Echo - Celestial Light
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Celestial Light.
2pcs Set: Spectro DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Spectro DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Intro Skill.
bg_description: Dazzling rays of light are emanating from the crevice...

name: Morphable Echo - Havoc Eclipse
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Havoc Eclipse.
2pcs Set: Havoc DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Havoc DMG + 7.5% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 4 times, each stack lasts 15s.
bg_description: The chaos seems to devour everything in the crevice...

name: Morphable Echo - Rejuvenating Glow
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Rejuvenating Glow.

2pcs Set: Healing Bonus + 10%.

5pcs Set: Increases the ATK of all Resonators in the team by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.
bg_description: The breath from the crevice brings peace and calm...

name: Morphable Echo - Moonlit Clouds
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Moonlit Clouds.
2pcs Set: Energy Regen + 10%.
5pcs Set: After using Outro Skill, increases the ATK of the next Resonator by 22.5% for 15s.
bg_description: A bright moon seems to hide in the crevice...

name: Morphable Echo - Lingering Tunes
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Lingering Tunes.

2pcs Set: ATK + 10%.

5pcs Set: While on the field, ATK increases by 5% every 1.5s. This effect stacks up to 4 times. Outro Skill DMG + 60%.
bg_description: Mysterious melodies echo endless from the crevice...

name: Morphable Echo - Frosty Resolve
attributes_description:
Open to claim one premium material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare5>Layered Wing Polarizer *1</color>
<color=Rare5>FF Carved Crystal *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Reverb Combustor *1</color>
<color=Rare5>FF Waveworn Shard *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Melodic String *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Heterized Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Flawless Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Presto Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Waveworn Residue 239 *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Cadence Blossom*1</color>
bg_description: Between the cracks, crystalline ice blooms...

name: Morphable Echo - Eternal Radiance
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Eternal Radiance.
 
2pcs Set: Spectro DMG +10%.
 
5pcs Set: Inflicting Spectro Frazzle on enemies increases Crit. Rate by 20% for 15s. Attacking enemies inflicted with 10 stacks of Spectro Frazzle grants 15% Spectro DMG Bonus for 15s.
bg_description: Between the cracks, shimmering lights dance and flicker like distant stars...

name: Morphable Echo - Midnight Veil
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Midnight Veil.

2pcs Set: Havoc DMG +10%.

5pcs Set: Triggering Outro Skill deals additional 480% Havoc DMG to surrounding enemies, and grants the incoming Resonator 15% Havoc DMG Bonus for 15s.
bg_description: Between the cracks, obscure shadows merge and coil like a dark veil...

name: Morphable Echo - Empyrean Anthem
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Empyrean Anthem.

2pcs Set: Energy Regen +10%.

5pcs Set: Increase the Resonator's Coordinated Attack DMG by 80%. Upon a critical hit of Coordinated Attack, increase the active Resonator's ATK by 20% for 4s.
bg_description: Through the cracks, gentle melodies reverberated...

name: Morphable Echo - Tidebreaking Courage
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Tidebreaking Courage.

2pcs Set: Energy Regen +10%.

5pcs Set: The Resonator's ATK is increased by 15%. When reaching 250% Energy Regen, the Resonator gains 30% all Attribute DMG increase.
bg_description: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

name: Unborn Echoes I
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo from the Tacet Field of your choice in Jinzhou, Huanglong, or Rinascita.

List of Tacet Fields:
Central Plains: Lingering Tunes & Rejuvenating Glow
Desorock Highland I: Sierra Gale & Freezing Frost
Desorock Highland II: Void Thunder & Molten Rift
Port City of Guixu: Molten Rift & Rejuvenating Glow
Tiger's Maw: Freezing Frost & Void Thunder
Dim Forest: Havoc Eclipse & Moonlit Clouds
Whining Aix's Mire: Celestial Light & Lingering Tunes
Penitent's End: Empyrean Anthem & Midnight Veil
Fagaceae Peninsula: Frosty Resolve & Eternal Radiance
Riccioli Islands: Tidebreaking Courage & Eternal Radiance
Beohr Waters: Midnight Veil & Gusts of Welkin
Mournfell Canyon: Windward Pilgrimage & Flaming Clawprint
bg_description: In the fissure, a Tacet Mark is expanding, pulsing with a thudding rhythm like a heartbeat...

name: A Slice of Pizza
attributes_description: Increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 44% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A slice cut from an unimaginably large pizza, rich with melted cheese and laden with various toppings. Every child can find a slice they like, making for a rare treat eaten together only once a month.

The nannies used to say, "Love inspires faith, faith fosters sharing, and sharing brings love full circle."

name: Purity Strength
attributes_description: Increases Heavy Attack DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 28% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Crafted by Brant himself, this exceptional brew offers a refreshing flavor with a lingering aftertaste.

Just as he dedicates his soul to every performance on stage, Brant pours his passion into each bottle.

With his name signed proudly on the bottle, he extends his heartfelt well wishes to those who receive this meticulously prepared gift.

"Life is to celebrate and to embrace freedom."

name: The Ambition that Lies Hidden
attributes_description:
Increases Spectro DMG by 12.5% for each stack of Spectro Frazzle inflicted on targets, stacking up to 10 times. This effect lasts for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: In the opening act, an obscure youth boarded the ship with nothing but a dagger. In the final act, a notorious pirate captain met his end, betrayed by his own confidant, sinking with a dagger into the deep.

name: Reveler Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

name: Box of Silence
attributes_description: A bomb originally used by the Order to frame the Montelli family. It has been transformed by Phoebe's soul-healing power into a tool for saving lives.
bg_description: A sacred aura lingers, as if a quiet sigh was left behind by someone.

name: Mysterious Complete Treasure Map
attributes_description: A fully pieced-together treasure map marking hidden treasure.
bg_description: A life at sea entails battling the the ocean and fighting pirates to the death. To the victor goes the spoils. Thus this Treasure Map is a testament to our victory.

name: Every Flavor Bell-less Crab
attributes_description: Increases all team members' ATK by 22% and Crit. DMG by 24% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Bell Crabs shed their iconic bells during certain times of the year. During this period, these crabs are also known as "Bell-less Crabs," said to have a distinct flavor apart from Bell Crabs.

name: Wine-Brewed Octopus Clam
attributes_description: Increases all team members' Max HP by 30% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: It is said that a drunken Troupe member once mistook wine for water while cooking seafood, accidentally creating this dish. Fortunately, no fires were involved.

name: Riccioli Salt Baked Fish
attributes_description: Increases all team members' DEF by 35% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: The finest ingredients often require only the simplest preparation. Fresh fish, lightly cleaned and baked in sea salt, brings out its pure, natural flavors. For seasoned sailors, this dish is a commonplace staple. However, for the sheltered nobles of Ragunna, it represents their most vivid imagination of the sea.

name: Every Flavor Bell-less Crab Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Every Flavor Bell-less Crab.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Every Flavor Bell-less Crab.

name: Wine-Brewed Octopus Clam Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Wine-Brewed Octopus Clam.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Wine-Brewed Octopus Clam.

name: Riccioli Salt Baked Fish Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Riccioli Salt Baked Fish.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Riccioli Salt Baked Fish

name: Originite Weapon Supply Chest
attributes_description:
Open to claim one Originite series weapon of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Broadblade#41 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Sword#18 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Pistols#26 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Gauntlets#21D *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Rectifier#25 *1</color>
bg_description: The special supply chest obtained from Shilang in the Tiger's Maw.

name: Rusty Iron Case
attributes_description: An iron case discovered in a shipwreck in the waters of the Riccioli Islands. Open it to claim mysterious rewards.
bg_description: Don't just discard rusty iron cases, as they might contain hidden treasures. And if not, they still make a formidable melee weapon!

name: Lingering Tunes & Rejuvenating Glow
attributes_description:
Open to obtain an Echo from one of the following Sonata Effects:

Lingering Tunes
Rejuvenating Glow
bg_description: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

Freezing Frost

Lingering Tunes

attributes_description:

Empyrean Anthem
Midnight Veil
bg_description: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

name: Frosty Resolve & Eternal Radiance
attributes_description:
Open to obtain an Echo from one of the following Sonata Effects:

name: When Irises Bloom
attributes_description: Fleurdelys' drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
bg_description:
An item bestowed on her during the Order's Initiation.

Fleurdelys used to be a meticulously crafted "idol" for the public. Only when the divine shell is shed can her true life begin.

Fleurdelys, or Cartethyia... Which name does she truly wish to live by?

name: A Manuscript of Golden Anthem
attributes_description: A manuscript of Golden Anthem, transcribed by Cristoforo.
bg_description: A manuscript from the Golden Anthem Poets Society preserving their poems and musical compositions, transcribed by Cristoforo.

name: A Lithograph With the Sentinel's True Form
attributes_description: A lithograph etched with Sentinal Imperator's true form.
bg_description: A lithograph carved with Sentinal Imperator's true form. Members of the Poets Society concealed it in Egla Town, assuming it was a relic left by the ancient Rinascitans.

name: "Past"
attributes_description: A strange book, aged and worn. It is marked with traces of erosion from seawater.
bg_description:
A strange book found floating in the Sea of Ghosts, one that seemingly records the past, its cover ravaged by seawater, and the waterlogged pages stick together, making it impossible to open. The past cannot be retraced, yet the abyss insists on drawing you back in time.
Past and Present come together, leading to the Future.

name: "Present"
attributes_description: A strange book with a fluid form. It is marked with traces of erosion from seawater.
bg_description:
A strange book found floating in the Sea of Ghosts, its cover formless, its pages sealed. There is no need to look further, for you are presently writing this book.
Past and Present come together, leading to the Future.

name: Fairytale SketchBook
attributes_description: A heartwarming fairytale sketchbook. Its pages are slightly yellowed. This book seems to have been made by the maidens.
bg_description: A heartwarming fairytale sketchbook, telling a story of princesses embarking on an adventure. Even though caged, the maidens' hearts were still brimmed with hopeful fantasies.

name: A Strange Book
attributes_description: A strange book marked with traces of erosion from seawater.
bg_description: A strange book found floating in the Sea of Ghosts... maybe it's the key to a hidden bookcase door. This book cannot be opened, its contents will not be revealed... Perhaps that's for the best.

name: Homemade Panini
attributes_description: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 28% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A Panini made by Cantarella herself.

Two pieces of perfectly baked, crispy bread are stuffed with a blend of carefully seasoned seafood.

With each bite, the rich flavors slide down your throat and settle in your stomach, filling it with unparalleled satisfaction.

Unlike potions' mysterious flavors, this is a taste of simple comfort and warmth.

name: Potion Vial
attributes_description:
A potion vial that Cantarella carries with her all the time. Its body is adorned with a sapphire that represents the family head's authority.

To a Fisalia like her, what's stored inside is more than just potion but her very essence: her trust, her emotions, and her soul...
bg_description:
A token from Cantarella. This vial holds a potion she specially crafted for you. Its delicate, calming fragrance works to soothe your mind. She has noticed your specialty, the burdens you carry, and the efforts you put forth. In her kindness, she hopes this potion brings you a peaceful slumber wherever you are.

This vial also contains her deepest sincerity and affection for you. It grants its owner unrestricted access to Porto-Veno Castle. All of Fisalias' elixirs, secrets, and resources... are yours to claim.

name: Phantom: Lorelei
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: "Messenger of Deep Dreams"
attributes_description:
A seemingly ordinary feather, soft and warm to the touch.

A token of your successful completion of all the challenges in "If You Gaze Into the Abyss of Dreams."
bg_description:
This feather doesn't belong to any real bird, yet it looks somewhat familiar to you.

For a brief moment, holding it evokes the sensation of overlooking the entire Somnoire from great heights.

Though its purpose remains unclear for now, it might come in handy one day.

"If you gaze into the abyss of dreams, the abyss of dreams gazes also into you."

name: Eerie Sketchbook
attributes_description: An eerie Sketchbook scribbled in messy and twisted handwriting.
bg_description: An eerie sketchbook, its pages inscribled with a haunting song, scribbled in twisted handwriting. What once were vivid fantasies have now turned into silent tears, dripping across its surface and leaving behind blurry and heartbreaking stains.

5pcs Set: Inflicting Aero Erosion on enemies increases Aero DMG for all Resonators in the team by 15%, and for the Resonator triggering this effect by an additional 15%, lasting for 20s.
