name: Matrix Crystal
attributes_description: A data crystal generated by the system's backend, containing challenge-related data. Can be used to redeem event rewards in "Virtual Crisis."
bg_description: The Tethys System faithfully logs every action in the simulated battleground. These data crystallize into tangible forms, fueling the Stellar Matrices' calculations. Though not in reality, every success and failure paves the way to the future.

name: Popularity
attributes_description: A unit of quantified influence used to support your favorite Cube. Only to be used in the Second Coming of Solaris.
bg_description: Enjoy the attention on you and the competition itself! Feel the rush of wild winds upon the field, and embrace both the victories and defeats that await at the finish line.

name: Reveler Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

name: The Gospel that Receives Harmonized Praise
attributes_description:
After casting Intro Skill, increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 40% and Crit. DMG by 80% for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: "Amidst the panicked Fools, he stood out, kneeling devoutly before the terrifying anomaly. Raising his brooch high, he chanted hymns, surrendering himself to the tide until he became one with it..."

name: The Gaze that Pierces Through Time
attributes_description:
Each time dealing Coordinated Attack DMG increases Basic Attack DMG of all Resonators in the team by 12%, stacking up to 10 times for 30s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: "He bent down and picked up the box, salvaged from the wreckage. Its surface, stained with blood, radiated a strange, captivating glow. This eerie luster seemed to beckon him, drawing him away from the tragic aftermath of the crew's violent fights. Without a glance back, he vanished into the depths of the island."

name: The Call that Comes from a Lost Land
attributes_description:
Each time the Resonators in the team cast Resonance Liberation, Resonance Skill DMG of all Resonators in the team is increased by 62.5%, stacking up to 2 times for 30s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: The traveler clung to the belief that the blood flowing through his veins was tied to a lineage from a land long forgotten by Rinascita. The visions of cold and fjords relentlessly plagued his mind. Finally, he poured all his savings into a ship, set sail, and never returned.

name: Reveler Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

name: The Wave that Cleanses the World
attributes_description:
Casting Resonance Liberation grants 36% Spectro DMG Bonus per second for 15s to the active Resonator, stacking up to 4 times.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Some Acolytes believed the Dark Tide was not a disaster but a trial to weed out nonbelievers so that only the Righteous remained. This heretical notion quickly faded into obscurity, but not before the heretics created weapons that harnessed the power of the Dark Tide itself, weapons now lost to the depth of the sea.

name: The Finale that Fails to Reach
attributes_description:
Each time defeating a target increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 9%, stacking up to 10 times.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: "Mary, by the time you read this letter, everything will have already settled. Do not mourn for me. I have given my life willingly, alongside my comrades, to defend the glory of the Sentinel. We will ascend to the heavens and stand beside Them."

name: The Resolve that Burns for All or Nothing
attributes_description:
Casting Intro Skill gives all Resonators in the team 150% Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: He continued to roll the dice, silently praying that he wouldn't be forced to face the fate head-on. Yet, deep down, he understood that by continuing to roll, he had already made his choice. He was prepared to bring it all to an end.

name: Pioneer of the Virtual Frontier
attributes_description: A special reward obtained in "Virtual Crisis: Prototype Trials." It records the highest total Stress Level reached during the challenge.
bg_description: This marks the borderline of simulation, not the end of your potential. The crisis may persist, but the flame of hope burns ever brighter.

name: Modifier
attributes_description: Used to modify the Mainstat of an unenhanced 5-Star Echo.
bg_description: Used to adjust Echo frequencies to obtain different characteristics.

name: Magic Dice
attributes_description: A dice for the Warmup. Can be used in the Cubie Derby: Warmup.
bg_description: A peculiar dice crafted to spice up the match. Its creator believes that luck-based competition is far more thrilling than mere tests of strength, especially when a single lucky roll can help the underdog snatch victory from the jaws of defeat.

name: Ruler of the Tower
attributes_description: An honor Huanglong presents to those who have achieved tremendous feats in the Tower of Adversity. A testament to their courage, wisdom, and strength.
bg_description: Obtain all Crests in the Tower of Adversity: Hazard Zone in 10 Trial Phases.

name: Legend of the Deep
attributes_description: In the abyssal dark, you stilled numerous tempests unnamed. Under the beacon you ignited, wandering souls have finally found their way home.
bg_description: Clear 10 phases of Whimpering Wastes: Infinite Torrents with SSS Rank.

name: Fortified Flour
attributes_description: Material needed for a Lollo Errand.
bg_description: Flour with enriched nutrients sold in the Gondola Market, which fuels the body and satiates hunger.

name: Margherita's Gift of Milk
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description: A natural dairy product, not only suitable for direct drinking, but also can provide a unique milk flavor for the dish.

name: Margherita's Gift of Flour
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description: Food made from ground wheat, rich in starch, often used for making staple food.

name: Repaired Key

bg_description: A key obtained upon passing the Remnant Trial. It might unlock the answers you seek.

bg_description:

You can zoom in to view the photo.

name: Special Cube Cookie
attributes_description: A kind of special cookie that can be found in the Cube World. Used to increase Cube Experience.
bg_description: Theoretically, pastries loaded with sugar and fat aren't great for fitness, but... it's just a game, so go ahead and indulge!

name: 1st Anniversary Coin
attributes_description: A kind of commemorative coin that can be used to buy supplies and rewards from Abbowser.
bg_description: An event token commemorating the first anniversary of the Second Coming of Solaris's beta test. The tail was intended to feature the Pioneer Association's logo, but somehow, it bears Abbowser's portrait instead. It seems Abbowser has taken a particular interest in this coin.

name: Forsaken Key

bg_description: An anonymously gifted birthday cake, brimming with warm wishes and blessings. With rich chocolate, colorful fruit jam, and a lifelike marshmallow Abby on top, it's almost too wonderful to eat!

name: Adventure Log
attributes_description: A token earned by submitting exploration reports from various regions. Can be exchanged for "Adventure Packages" at the Lollo Logistics truck.
bg_description: "If the Pioneer Association is the eyes of civilization, then Lollo Logistics aspires to be the feet that carry humanity forward," a Lollo Logistics member remarked during an interview.

name: "Blazing Claw"
attributes_description: The brass knuckles Zani used to wear, as famous as the Blazing Nightwalker's tale itself.
bg_description: For endless nights, these brass knuckles were her only light in the darkness. Now dawn finally breaks. The Blazing Nightwalker may fade into legend and even be lost in history, but the adventures you shared will stay with you forever.

name: Zani's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Zani's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Nightmarket Token
attributes_description: A black-gold metallic token that the Gilded Nightmarket accepts in exchange for all sorts of items.
bg_description: A chip found in Black Alley. Some say it is cast from the daggers of the defeated, while others say it is made from violently pried-off bottle caps... In any case, it's worth something to Black Alley merchants.

name: The Stars that Shine For You
attributes_description: A customized 2025 birthday accessory for Rover. Before you even notice, this crown gently finds its way into your Backpack.
bg_description: Before you even notice, this crown gently finds its way into your Backpack. Our bonds shine like starlight, weaving stories as brilliant as the boundless galaxies.

name: Happie Birthdaie!
attributes_description: The 2025 birthday song, magnificently performed by the Plushie Squad.
bg_description: A sweet Rinascitan-style birthday song performed by the Plushies of the Plushie Village, infused with their warmest wishes just for you!

name: Darkness Repeller
attributes_description: The countless overwritten records epitomise your tribulations and the limit you have yet reached.
bg_description: Obtain all Crests in the Tower of Adversity: Hazard Zone in 5 Trial Phases.

name: Adversity Expeditioner
attributes_description: You've reached the boarder of the Tower of Adversity. Truth lines beyond a thin wall.
bg_description: Obtain all Crests in the Tower of Adversity: Hazard Zone in 1 Trial Phase.

name: Nightkeeper of Oceans
attributes_description: You plummeted to the ocean's abyss, where numerous valiant souls lie silently in their eternal vigil.
bg_description: Clear 5 phases of Whimpering Wastes: Infinite Torrents with SSS Rank.

name: Overwatcher of Tides
attributes_description: The seatides swell to embrace you, in your triumphant return from the beyond.

name: Trial Point
attributes_description: Can be used to increase your Trial Level.
bg_description: The essence of tribulations endured by warriors, which charges up the Banners of Conquest.

name: Hunt Point
attributes_description: Can be used to increase your Glory Level.
bg_description: The essence of bravery shown by warriors, which charges up the Banners of Conquest.

name: Reveler Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

name: The Sails that Display Endeavor
attributes_description:
Casting Resonance Liberation Amplifies Resonance Skill DMG of the active Resonator by 90% for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Time was too short—he only managed to save a single possession before plunging into the sea. Even as his lungs emptied of air, his grin widened. "Surely, I'm the greatest merchant in the world! Trading my life for my family's future—a bargain like no other!"

name: The Stigma that Signifies Vainglory
attributes_description:
When Resonators are in mid-air, their DMG dealt is Amplified by 80%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: "Return, people, to ways of old, and cast aside the arrogant boasts of progress. For yesterday's light shall ever outshine today's pale imitation, as today dimly outglows tomorrow's coming darkness. Cling to the known, the tried, the true. Only then may we find shelter from the terrors and confusion of the unknown."

name: A Breeze from Faraway Shores
attributes_description:
When a Resonator inflicts Aero Erosion upon enemies, the active Resonator in the team gains 40% Aero DMG Bonus for 15s, stacking up to 3 times. 

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: He heard from his grandmother that birds could carry wishes from the mortal world to the heavens. From that moment on, he began carving birds day and night, hoping that the Sentinel would allow him to see his departed mother once more. When the chisel in his hand suddenly fell to the ground, he realized that it was the moment the Sentinel answered his wish.

name: Crimson Baton
attributes_description: Phrolova's baton, imbued with part of her Forte.
bg_description:
A precarious alliance demands deep trust. She handed you her last hope, just to earn a moment of your faith.
Keep it close. Even from afar, a temporarily allied enemy must remain in your grasp.

name: Weekly Challenge Supply Pack
attributes_description:
Open to claim a type of advanced skill material of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Monument Bell x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Unending Destruction x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Dreamless Feather x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Sentinel's Dagger x1</color>
<color=Rare4>The Netherworld's Stare x1</color>
<color=Rare4>When Irises Bloom x1</color>
bg_description: Upon touching the chest, you hear what sounds like a battle hymn.

name: Torn Pages from Avinoleum
attributes_description: Torn pages found in Avinoleum.
bg_description: Torn pages found in Avinoleum. Collect them all and deliver them to Fuling.

name: Titular Repository Memoir
attributes_description: A book found in Avinoleum.
bg_description: "The Sentinel teaches us to illuminate the world for others, and never let it dim for those beside us."

name: Matrix Crystal
attributes_description: A data crystal generated by the system's backend, containing challenge-related data. Can be used to redeem event rewards in "Virtual Crisis."
bg_description: The Tethys System faithfully logs every action in the simulated battleground. These data crystallize into tangible forms, fueling the Stellar Matrices' calculations. Though not in reality, every success and failure paves the way to the future.

attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Token of Radiance
attributes_description: A badge earned by completing the challenges of Peaks of Prestige. Can be used to redeem rewards in Radiant Selection.
bg_description: A badge that represents the spirit of the duel. Furius hopes it sparks the fire within challengers during their fights and drives them to seek true glory.

name: Prestige Point
attributes_description: Frequency data collected from fights in Peaks of Prestige. Used to unlock or enhance special Echoes exclusive to the event.
bg_description: Echoes from Peaks of Prestige can't be enhanced using Sealed Tubes or processed in Data Bank. Instead, players must use Frequency data called "Prestige Points" to unlock or enhance them.

name: Duel Resonance
attributes_description: A stored memory of your battles in Peaks of Prestige. Used to increase your level in the event.
bg_description: Using the Terminal's built-in recorder, Duelists can review every match they've fought. For those who want to improve, studying past duels is essential.

name: Fame Flag
attributes_description: A virtual flag that marks your victories in Peaks of Prestige. It stands as a symbol of fame and unmatched skill.
bg_description: While Duelists don't fight like Gladiators, they share the same goal: to claim victory and glory in the heat of battle.

name: Pasta Bocadillo
attributes_description: Gives 8% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team and increases their Max HP by 12% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
For a wandering bard like Ciaccona, meals on the road are all about striking a balance between taste and convenience.
One day, as the campfire crackled to life, she had an idea and took the bread she always carried.
As the rich aroma of meat sauce filled the air, seeping into the bread's warm crust, she spread on the final layer of seasoning.
However, there's an unspoken rule. Ragunna's pasta is not to be tampered with. No shortcuts, no twists. Taking a bite of her creation, Ciaccona was lost in her thoughts. "If I ever get banished, this bread might just be one of the reasons."

name: One-Pot Pasta
attributes_description: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming STA cost for all Resonators in the team by 35% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Zani's pasta is a rich and flavorful dish, made by layering hearty meat sauce with cheese, sausage, and fragrant herbs before cooking it to perfection.
According to what she said, she first stumbled upon the idea while reheating a takeout meal that had gone cold after a long workday. On a whim, she threw in whatever ingredients she had on hand, and to her surprise, the result was unexpectedly delicious. What began as a quick fix soon turned into a carefully refined recipe.

name: Outift Voucher - 300 Lunites
attributes_description: A special voucher issued across Solaris, valued at <color=Highlight>300</color> Lunites per voucher for outfit purchases.
bg_description: Across human civilizations, many take an interest in collecting vouchers. With unique fonts and designs from each era, these vouchers are like the outfits of history, carrying the memories of the past.

name: Phantom: Nimbus Wraith
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Phantom: Crownless
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Phantom: Nightmare Crownless
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Phantom: Chest Mimic
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Picture of the First Cubie Derby
attributes_description: A commemorative photo from the Pioneer Association. Can be enlarged to view the details.
bg_description: It was such a heated competition thanks to everyone's endless enthusiasm! As the saying goes, competition comes first… Ahem, I mean, friendship comes first!

name: Laurel Nymph
attributes_description: Used to unlock a Resonator-specific outfit that grants the designated Resonator a new look.
bg_description: In the warm mist of the indoor hot spring, behind the fluttering chiffon veils, the laurel-crowned nymph casts her gentle gaze—a signal of invitation to a long-awaited, carefree holiday.

name: Astral Modulator
attributes_description: As the sounds in your memory fall into place, their magnificent echo crosses eons to reach your ears. Throughout your journey, your identity and purposes slowly piece themselves back together, and once again, you, the Astral Modulator, return to the center stage.
bg_description: Fully activate Rover: Spectro's Resonance Chain

name: Lark Among Clouds
attributes_description: Wind, though invisible in form, can be seen through the flowers it blows, the flames it caresses, and the larks it makes soar. Wind carries the birdsong high, echoing, echoing... until it is heard once more.
bg_description: Fully activate Yangyang's Resonance Chain

name: Hero Play Hero
attributes_description:
"The Flame Ranger still chooses to challenge an opponent who is simply unbeatable..."
The girl behind the curtain waves a hero figurine in her hand. Whether it was the light or something else, the figurine shone brightly in her grasp.
bg_description: Fully activate Chixia's Resonance Chain

name: Bloom in Snow
attributes_description: A bloom in snow is cold yet irresistibly tempting to touch. But in the end, it cannot escape the natural order of things, and melts away in your hand.
bg_description: Fully activate Baizhi's Resonance Chain

name: Crimson Jadeite
attributes_description: A girl who walks among the righteous and the wicked must constantly refine her sense of justice and morality. It is precisely because of this, that the jade pendant hanging from her chest remains so clear and pure.
bg_description: Fully activate Danjin's Resonance Chain

name: Unhindered Perception
attributes_description: "Sit, breathe, and find inner peace." She opens her eyes to perceive the gradual stabilization of frequencies, using pupils corroded by Tacet Discords. She had walked away, free from the blizzard.
bg_description: Fully activate Sanhua's Resonance Chain

name: Leisurely Observer
attributes_description: Being half a step slower also meant that Taoqi had more time to observe the world. She gradually began to notice subtle changes in the marketplace. A brick was missing here. A flower had wilted there. The next season would arrive when she was aware.
bg_description: Fully activate Taoqi's Resonance Chain

name: Flaming Intellect
attributes_description:
Many people light fires they cannot hope to contain.
But he is the creator of fire, the master of fire, and the smotherer of fire.
bg_description: Fully activate Mortefi's Resonance Chain

name: Grand Master
attributes_description:
They say Yuanwu can best any challenger in three minutes. It takes him one minute to step into the ring, then another minute to perform a ceremonial bow, and one final minute before the kettle comes to a boil.
"Come now, all martial artists are friends. Do stay for a cup of tea."
bg_description: Fully activate Yuanwu's Resonance Chain

name: Market Maker
attributes_description:
In the market, Aalto floats on the boundary between buying and selling, playing different roles: investor, opportunist, and market mover. He lays chips in every corner.
Every investment made is an avenue of future wealth.
bg_description: Fully activate Aalto's Resonance Chain

name: Whispers Amidst the Blooms
attributes_description: Planting seeds, watering and nurturing them till they sprout and bloom... That's how Verina initially imagined what the process of "Healing" meant.
bg_description: Fully activate Verina's Resonance Chain

name: Wooly Warrior
attributes_description: Encore's paradise is in the land of imagination. Brave Wooly Warriors and their wooly companions leap from the pages of books to a "Happily Ever After."
bg_description: Fully activate Encore's Resonance Chain

name: Fangs in Shadow
attributes_description: The "hound" in the shadow stalks his prey. First, he is calm, waiting for his target to move through the crowd. Then, unease sets in as the surroundings grow eerily quiet. Finally, the fangs are bared, and the target can no longer see its own shadow.
bg_description: Fully activate Calcharo's Resonance Chain

name: Lion Dancer
attributes_description: With every step a dance, he will surely leap to the highest perch.
bg_description: Fully activate Lingyang's Resonance Chain

name: Heart of Clear Mirror
attributes_description: With a limpid mind and sustained inner peace, she, who has undergone the trials of the world, completes the final piece of the mirror. The heart is a mirror. The mirror reflects her heart.
bg_description: Fully activate Jianxin's Resonance Chain

name: Loong with the Wind
attributes_description: "The enemies surging in were suddenly met by a streak of blue light. Qingloong swept in with the wind, and after the storm subsided, the Midnight Rangers' flag stood tall on the high ground…"
bg_description: Fully activate Jiyan's Resonance Chain

name: Silent Judge
attributes_description: Like a puppet with a thousand faces, she walks through the shadows in different facades. But at the end of the day, she's still the one holding the strings.
bg_description: Fully activate Yinlin's Resonance Chain

name: Chrono Thawbringer
attributes_description:
It was an age when the flow of time was chaotic, with dawn blurring into dusk and the cold proving relentless.
Doubt, weariness, and the weight of duty... such was the life of a Magistrate. Though quite young, she shouldered it all as she ascended the mountain, striving to illuminate the sky with a sliver of candlelight. It was the moment when winter relented. The thaw came, and the slopes awoke, bathed in the first tender hues of spring...
bg_description: Fully activate Jinhsi's Resonance Chain

name: Eternal Fire
attributes_description:
Changli wishes for an era of peace and prosperity.
This is the longest game of Weiqi she's ever played, and with each move, she becomes a part of the game, an eternal fire that lights the way.
bg_description: Fully activate Changli's Resonance Chain

name: Vision of Truth
attributes_description:
Xiangli Yao often describes himself as a greedy person, who is hungry for truth, yet equally starves for the warmth of human bonds.
Though he often gazes at the stars, he occasionally casts glances at the distant mountains and the vast land they anchor. And with each step forward, he measures the distance he has traveled, the life he has lived.
bg_description: Fully activate Xiangli Yao's Resonance Chain

name: Ink Dyed Nature
attributes_description:
She prefers colors on ink and wash, which, while not the most dazzling, still depict a stunning array of hues.
This is Zhezhi's true colors, that which she hopes will one day burst forth with the power to leave others in awe.
Or at least, during self-introductions...
bg_description: Fully activate Zhezhi's Resonance Chain

name: Stellar Roamer
attributes_description: Starlight falls into the deep sea, filling all of her longing and emptiness. In vastness and loneliness, she stood watch over the shores that exist only because of {Male=him;Female=her}... This is her innate duty, both past and future.
bg_description: Fully activate Shorekeeper's Resonance Chain

name: Keen Conservator
attributes_description: Though young, Youhu can already distinguish real antiques from fakes. Valuables weighed down by time can only be cherished and cared for when entrusted to those who understand their value.
bg_description: Fully activate Youhu's Resonance Chain

name: Camellya Rouge
attributes_description: Blossom, wither, and bloom again with memories of the past. When red and white converge... What form will Camellya take when she flowers once more in your eyes?
bg_description: Fully activate Camellya's Resonance Chain

name: Courier of Dawn
attributes_description:
We Promise, We Deliver!
Bright and cheerful Lumi travels across the vast land of Solaris, delivering messages from distant places to those on her route.
bg_description: Fully activate Lumi's Resonance Chain

name: Overflowing Opal
attributes_description:
Before this radiant moment arrived, the "gem" had endured endless nights of rain.
Once, she loathed the downpower, but now she embraces the rhythm... With patient hands, she polished the rough stone that was "herself" until it shimmered with a thousand captured hues, in the name of Montelli, and more so in the name of Carlotta.
bg_description: Fully activate Carlotta's Resonance Chain

name: Dancer in the Starlight
attributes_description: How should the stage be set for a drama? Spotlights check, curtains check, magnificent costumes? Check. "Pero Pero!" A strange box jumps up and hands her a confetti gun. "Ta-da!" —It's showtime!
bg_description: Fully activate Roccia's Resonance Chain

name: The Merry Fool
attributes_description: Set sail! The curtain rises! This maritime stage belongs to Brant. From the bow comes the scent of "Troupe Strength" and wild laughter mocking the outdated doctrines of The Order. On deck, they're rehearsing plays banned by The Order. From the stern, the sea chases after them in pursuit.
bg_description: Fully activate Brant's Resonance Chain

name: Envoy of Light
attributes_description: "As the sand of time flickers through your finger, please remember: in the gentle starlight, among beautiful waves, beneath the lantern... and where the kindness of your heart shines, my unspoken words are waiting for you... Listen! The door is open. It's time to move on."
bg_description: Fully activate Phoebe's Resonance Chain

name: Diver of Dreams
attributes_description: Where does the dream end and reality begin? The moment your fingers meet the jellyfish, you're falling into a deep sea, descending ever deeper... Only to surface at last into the calm harbor of her gaze.
bg_description: Fully activate Cantarella's Resonance Chain

name: Soloist of Fate
attributes_description: Listen! The chimes of a starry, starry night, a prelude to the young maid's song. Bright as midsummer sun even in the depth of the night, yet gentle as the breeze on a summer's day. The wind carries her music across the dark, a melodic story that greets the dawn.
bg_description: Fully activate Ciaccona's Resonance Chain

name: Night Aflame
attributes_description:
A fixed routine isn't that bad. Stability has got to count for something. These are words Zani lives by.
Her routine consists of work, meals, sleep, and the occasional bouts of saving the world. Life, after all, is simply a matter of style.
bg_description: Fully activate Zani's Resonance Chain

name: Havoc Reaper
attributes_description: In the face of darkness, shadow, and fear, courage is your sharpest blade.
bg_description: Fully activate Rover: Havoc's Resonance Chain

name: The Vanguard Gale
attributes_description: The wind that sweeps across mountains and seas knows no hesitation, no retreat. As steadfast as an ancient oath and as faithful as a time-forged pact, I am the blade of justice. I am the vanguard that never falters.
bg_description: Fully activate Rover: Aero's Resonance Chain

name: Returnee's Forgery Aid
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Festivity Point
attributes_description: A token of festival gaiety obtained in Solaris New Voyage Celebration. Can be used to advance reward progress.
bg_description: A true celebration should be full of life! Bring your friends, dive into the fun, and crank up the excitement!

name: Phantom: Fae Ignis
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Phantom: Cuddle Wuddle
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Challenge Progress
attributes_description: Your progress in the "Banners Never Fall" event. Unlock bountiful rewards by increasing your progress.
bg_description: Valiant warriors, go claim the final victory!

name: Pioneer Podcast Supply Pack
attributes_description: Open to claim one <color=Rare4>Golden Eternal series weapon</color> of your choice or <color=Rare5>Premium Tuner x200</color>.
bg_description: It contains the powerful weapon selected by the Pioneer Association for its explorers.

name: Verses and Rhythms
attributes_description: A sheet music book gifted by Ciaccona, preserving every melody she recorded on her travels.
bg_description: A sheet music book gifted by Ciaccona, preserving every melody she recorded on her travels. With her Forte, she can bring the stories behind the music back to life.

name: Reunion's Sealed Tube Aid
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: "Script"
attributes_description: A play script given by Phrolova.
bg_description:
A script telling a story. It updates its contents as the plot progresses.
Every actor has their assigned role, and all stories unfold exactly as written, unless...

name: Champion's Medal
attributes_description: A medal awarded to the winner of Septimont's Agon of Champions.
bg_description:
A medal split in two. Lupa wears the other half. 
It's a testament to the applause you've earned in the City of Glory and the symbol of the triumph you've achieved side by side.

name: Splashing Summer
attributes_description: Used to unlock a Resonator-specific outfit that grants the designated Resonator a new look.
bg_description: Soft satin smoothly flows down from her body. The droplets on her glisten like luxurious gems. As they dip into the water, ripples spread across the pool into you and the girl's heart.

name: "Dawn upon Thorns" Set
attributes_description: Used to unlock the corresponding Echo Aspect set.
bg_description:
Once bound by thorns, these wings now break free, soaring into the boundless sea of clouds.
The old laws no longer hold sway, for they will carry you to the farthest skies of freedom.

name: Lupa's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Lupa's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Cartethyia's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Cartethyia's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Unfading Glory
attributes_description: Lioness of Glory's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: When the hero's banner rises, even the mountains of Septimont honor this crown with respect. It's not made to dazzle like gold or gems. It's forged from sheer strength and unshakable will.

name: Oaknut
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description:
A nut from the tall evergreen trees of Septimont. They drop when ripe, waiting to be gathered by animals preparing for the coming year.
Where there's a Leaftail Fox, you'll usually find these nuts. The foxes wrap their tails in oak leaves and use the nuts as lures for unsuspecting prey.

name: Amber Halite
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: These clear, cube-shaped halites, marked by unique swirling patterns, are found along Septimont's coastlines and coastal ravines. Septimontians often grind them into smelling salts or craft them into elegant jewelry.

name: Bamboo Iris
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: A common purple flower from the Septimont plains. Locals use it for spice blends or as home décor.

name: Bloodleaf Viburnum
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: Viburnums that grow in Border Mountains. Its deep red leaves stand out sharply, like blood seeping through the pale mountains.

name: Oaknut Honeycake
attributes_description: Reduces Flight STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 10% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Add more syrup! No, even more! Until this honeycake is as sweet and warm as a hug! And don't forget to top it with some Oaknuts, the forest's blessings and nature's gift.
May you have a sweet day.

name: Saltimbocca
attributes_description: Grants 40% Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A traditional Septimont dish made from mashed veal and Bloodleaf Viburnums.
It's said that it leaps into your mouth and gives you courage for battle.
Septimontians drum and feast before the hunt. They defend their home with blood and flesh.

name: Glory Roast Platter
attributes_description: Grants 50% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Skewers, poultry legs, and meat wraps. Now you've got yourself a Glory Roast Platter!
Come, Hero of Gladiators, Star of the Arena, take this "glory" and let's meet at the top!

name: Frosted Cream Blizzard
attributes_description: Grants 25% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A cup of seemingly ordinary shaved ice. Is it really as ordinary as it looks?
...Alright, yes. It is absolutely ordinary. But for Septimontians, this simple treat is one of the few chances to truly cool down.

name: Solis
attributes_description: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A popular energy drink among Septimont Gladiators.
Drink this can of Solis, and fight 'til the last breath!

name: Bamboo Iris Crisps
attributes_description: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A local Septimontian Snack made from fried petals of Bamboo Iris. Light and crunchy.
Each pack holds just a few Bamboo Iris Crisps... and a whole lot of deliciously fragrant air. You won't stop at just one.

name: Seasalt Popcorn
attributes_description: Grants 10% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team and increases their Max HP by 20%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Seasalt Popcorn, your must-have snack for any Agon. Salty, joyful, and healthy! Every bite brings the taste of the sea.

name: Bubbly Buddy
attributes_description: Grants 30% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Whether you're watching Agons or catching every clash in the arena, it's there for you.
Zero sugar. Zero calories. Packed with Bloodleaf Viburnums. Let it fire up the arena!

name: Heartpour
attributes_description: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 34% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Endorsed by Gladiator Star Lupa, it's still a hit across Septimont.
Lightly sweet, refreshingly smooth, and coming in a variety of flavors, it is best enjoyed ice cold.
For Lupa, fighting in the arena is an indispensable part of her life. At the breaks of matches, she still takes a sip of this Heartpour, remembering the thrill of the fight and the laughter she shared with her partner during the Agon of Champions.

name: Knight-Errant's Essentials
attributes_description: Grants 34% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Prepared by Cartethyia herself, this Laurus Salad comes packed with extra Viscum Berries, crispy and sweet.
Now a wandering knight, she's hungry to learn, to grow, and to see the world.
Let's start with a salad made just for the wandering knight. This time, extra berries included!

name: Oaknut Honeycake Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Oaknut Honeycake.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Oaknut Honeycake.

name: Saltimbocca Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Saltimbocca.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Saltimbocca.

name: Glory Roast Platter Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Glory Roast Platter.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Glory Roast Platter.

name: Frosted Cream Blizzard Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Frosted Cream Blizzard.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Frosted Cream Blizzard.

name: Solis Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Solis.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Solis.

name: Bamboo Iris Crisps Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Bamboo Iris Crisps.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Bamboo Iris Crisps.

name: Seasalt Popcorn Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Seasalt Popcorn.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Seasalt Popcorn.

name: Bubbly Buddy Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Bubbly Buddy.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Bubbly Buddy.

name: Her Oath
attributes_description: A fleeting trace in memory, one that belongs to Lupa for your journey in the City of Septimont.
bg_description: The journey has come to an end. Her oath remains steadfast and sincere.

name: Her Wishes
attributes_description: A fleeting trace in memory, one that belongs to Cartethyia for your journey in the City of Septimont.
bg_description: The journey has come to an end. Her three wishes have now all come true.

name: Dreamland Badge
attributes_description: A memento from the Dreamland, used to redeem rewards.
bg_description: An exquisite badge once given to guests of Dreamland as a souvenir. The Hocus Pocus on it seems to be ever beckoning guests into a wonderland of boundless surprises.

name: Lost Mirror Piece
attributes_description: A shard of mirror showing the reflection of the White Cat. Used to unlock Dream Boon.
bg_description: A shard of mirror showing the reflection of the White Cat. But on which side of the mirror does reality lie? Glancing into it feels like delving into a dream.

name: Reveler Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

name: Whispers from Dim Abyss
attributes_description:
Grants 25% Fusion DMG Bonus. Casting Resonance Liberation recovers 2 points of Energy. Resonators can hold up to 2 points of Energy.
When Resonators deal Resonance Liberation DMG, 1 point of Energy is consumed to cast AoE attack, dealing 1500% Fusion DMG to nearby targets in total. This effect can be triggered up to once every 2s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description:
"That unspeakable voice came from beyond the hull. Not even thick timber or thousands of feet of seawater could stop it from drilling into our minds. We tried to resist."
"But to no avail."

name: A Breeze from Faraway Shores
attributes_description:
When a Resonator inflicts Aero Erosion upon enemies, the active Resonator in the team gains 40% Aero DMG Bonus for 15s, stacking up to 3 times. 

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: He heard from his grandmother that birds could carry wishes from the mortal world to the heavens. From that moment on, he began carving birds day and night, hoping that the Sentinel would allow him to see his departed mother once more. When the chisel in his hand suddenly fell to the ground, he realized that it was the moment the Sentinel answered his wish.

name: The Gaze that Pierces Through Time
attributes_description:
Each time dealing Coordinated Attack DMG increases Basic Attack DMG of all Resonators in the team by 12%, stacking up to 10 times for 30s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: "He bent down and picked up the box, salvaged from the wreckage. Its surface, stained with blood, radiated a strange, captivating glow. This eerie luster seemed to beckon him, drawing him away from the tragic aftermath of the crew's violent fights. Without a glance back, he vanished into the depths of the island."

name: The Death Defier
attributes_description:
The Divinity spoke whispers in her ears, she swung her sword in reply. Fate has written her a script, she tore the pages to shreds.
She has chosen her own path through gale and tide.
bg_description: Fully activate Cartethyia's Resonance Chain

name: Lupus Firestar
attributes_description: Flames ignite the cheers of the arena, as the wolf tears out the throats of every shadow. She is the brightest star on the field.
bg_description: Fully activate Lupa's Resonance Chain

name: The Meditating Blessed Maiden
attributes_description: An intact portrait of the Blessed Maiden discovered in the ruins of Avinoleum. You can zoom in to admire it.
bg_description: The painting captures the Blessed Maiden's contemplation in the Seminary. Though it has weathered the passage of time, her sacred aura remains undimmed.

name: Copper Mirror of Truth
attributes_description: A copper mirror given by Buling.
bg_description:
An old copper mirror, simply crafted, with a fox-shaped tassel at its tail.
In the tales of Huanglong, mirrors are said to reveal hidden truths, and in certain hands, even legends may reflect reality.

name: Badge of Glory
attributes_description: A souvenir badge for travelers in Septimont. Can be used to advance reward progress in Gifts of Glory.
bg_description: The Agon Medals are a mark of honor for the people of Septimont. Over time, they have become one of the symbols of the city itself. Inspired by that, this souvenir badge lets travelers carry home a piece of Septimont's fiery spirit. Even far away from Septimont, they can still hear the echo of battle in their hearts.

name: Sonance Casket: Septimont
attributes_description: Sonance Caskets in Septimont are often found in precarious locations. Use Grapple for easier access. Deliver them to the Plushies in the Border Mountains in exchange for resources.
bg_description: The product of a collapsed Sonoro Sphere, scattered all over the world. It records the untwisted memories of the past. The Plushies are collecting them—perhaps they'll have something in exchange.

name: Samousas' Treasure
attributes_description: A heavy chest, stashed away here by Samousas.
bg_description: It gives off a dull metallic clatter when shaken. It seems like it's packed with coins... and some dreams long since forgotten.

name: Reminiscence - Glory of Freezing Crown
attributes_description: Open to get 1 random Glacio Echo, a material for weapon and skill upgrade, and Shell Credits.
bg_description: Victory crowns the worthy. Frostcrest Gladiator offers her highest salute to your strength and to your unyielding will.

name: Virtual Vanquisher
attributes_description: A special reward obtained in "Virtual Crisis: Frontier Trials." It records the highest total Stress Level reached during the challenge.
bg_description: The Tethys System's Virtual Crises defy all reason, but you vanquished your limits in response. Now, you stand as a living beacon against the possible calamities, lighting the way forward.

name: Morphable Echo - Windward Pilgrimage
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Windward Pilgrimage.

2pcs Set: Aero DMG +10%.

5pcs Set: Hitting a target with Aero Erosion increases Crit. Rate by 10% and grants 30% Aero DMG Bonus, lasting for 10s.
bg_description: The footprints in the rift will never fade...

name: Morphable Echo - Flaming Clawprint
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Flaming Clawprint.

2pcs Set: Fusion DMG +10%.

5pcs Set: Casting Resonance Liberation increases Fusion DMG of Resonators in the team by 15% and the caster's Resonance Liberation DMG by 20%, lasting for 35s.
bg_description: The spark in the rift will eventually ignite a blaze...

attributes_description:

Windward Pilgrimage
Flaming Clawprint
bg_description: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

name: Ode to the Nameless Martyr
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: Fisalia Knight's Letter
attributes_description: A letter found in the underwater ruins near Ashen Dragon's Crypt of Septimont. It holds the final words of its master.
bg_description: A letter found in the underwater ruins near Ashen Dragon's Crypt of Septimont. It holds the final words of its master.

name: New Voyage Radiant Lightpack
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: New Voyage Radiant Heavypack
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Orchestration Movement I
attributes_description: Phrolova composed this melody upon the founding of the Fabricatorium. She blended the music of her past into it, wishing that those dear and near to her might one day play it in the real world.
bg_description: Incomplete sheet music, part of the core melody regulating the Fabricatorium of the Deep.

name: Orchestration Movement II
attributes_description: Phrolova composed this melody upon the founding of the Fabricatorium. She blended the music of her past into it, wishing that those dear and near to her might one day play it in the real world.

bg_description: Incomplete sheet music, part of the core melody regulating the Fabricatorium of the Deep.

name: Sacred Salt
attributes_description: An item that Butler the Steward of the Order at the Supply Station is collecting and willing to trade for.
bg_description: To the Acolytes, Sacred Salt has the ability to cleanse anything untouched by the Sentinel's grace. With its purifying power, sliced bread turns into the Divinity's nurturing meal, ordinary wine becomes holy blood that grants enlightenment...

name: Phantom: Nightmare Inferno Rider
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Above the Stars
attributes_description: A photo secretly taken by the Plushie Squad. They witnessed your ascending to the top.
bg_description:
A photo secretly taken by the Plushie Squad. They witnessed your ascending to the top.
You can zoom in to view the photo.

name: Wilting Reverberation
attributes_description: A residual fragment of Phrolova's Forte. Though not nearly as strong as her baton, it remains just sufficient for Orchestrating.
bg_description: As the blade drove through her chest, everything around her fell silent. Her body was flung away, light as a fallen petal. Tears and the blood bloomed into flowers unnoticed. In their midst, a melody whispered, softly and wistfully, of loss and regrets sunken beneath the sea.

name: Husk of Broken Dreams
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: Sunken Elegy
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: Radiance Across Sea and Sky
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: Truth in Lies
attributes_description: Fenrico's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: He fumbled forward through formless chaos, barely recalling when the shift in his perception took hold—the day he rose as the Primus, an icy conviction settled in his chest, so cold that it burned in his clenching grip.

name: Abyss Luminary
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description:
A strange glowing marine life found in the ocean depths.
The Rinascita legend has it that the Sentinel left the Abyss Luminaries beneath the waves to guide the souls of the drowned.

name: "Afterlife"
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A pure-white lycoris.
Its petals seem untinted by the vivid scarlet typical of its kind. Or perhaps the colors that were there have long faded. These delicate flowers bloom quietly in darkness. Just like the name they've been given, their unique appearance suggests maybe a whole new world exists beyond the Beyond.
"Things unfinished in this life shall wait for the next."

name: Phrolova's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Phrolova's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Redcurrant Tart
attributes_description: Reduces Flight STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 12% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A tart drenched in thick, tangy jam that floods every crevice of the pastry, overpowering its sweetness. No one but Phrolova enjoys this zesty flavor, nor does anyone know where the tiny, sour berries even come from.

name: Reveler Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

name: Whispers from Dim Abyss
attributes_description:
Grants 25% Fusion DMG Bonus. Casting Resonance Liberation recovers 2 points of Energy. Resonators can hold up to 2 points of Energy.
When Resonators deal Resonance Liberation DMG, 1 point of Energy is consumed to cast AoE attack, dealing 1500% Fusion DMG to nearby targets in total. This effect can be triggered up to once every 2s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description:
"That unspeakable voice came from beyond the hull. Not even thick timber or thousands of feet of seawater could stop it from drilling into our minds. We tried to resist."
"But to no avail."

name: Hymn to the End
attributes_description:
Amplifies Heavy Attack DMG and Electro DMG by 50%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: …In the end, only this strange melody echoed across the empty seabed. The first note of a promised world that never came.

name: Sail Against the Storm
attributes_description:
Casting Echo Skill increases Havoc DMG by 20%, stacking up to 2 times. The same Resonator cannot trigger this effect again with the same Echo Skill. At 2 stacks, the Resonator's next instance of damage dealt triggers an AoE attack, dealing 800% Havoc DMG to nearby targets. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: "Hoist the sail! This won't be the end. Our legend is just beginning!"

name: Dream Imprint
attributes_description: An old-style detective's hat, often a symbol of the protagonist in classic mysteries.
bg_description:
"No matter how late you show up, you're a detective.
Everything leaves a trace and a detective must pursue it without end."
The story is far from over. Someone deep within the Somnoire has entrusted this to you, awaiting the day the story reaches its end.

name: Shrimp Meat
attributes_description: Meat obtained from shrimps.
bg_description: Meat obtained from shrimps, tender and springy. In skilled hands, it can be transformed into exquisite dishes.

name: Pilgrim's Scriptures
attributes_description: A book given to you by the Acolyte of the Sanctuary of Faith.
bg_description: According to Acolyte Confere, this book offers the most comprehensive documentation of rites performed by the most devout of the Order. It may be worth studying.

name: Badge of Glory
attributes_description: A souvenir badge for travelers in Septimont. Can be used to advance reward progress in Gifts of Glory.
bg_description: The Agon Medals are a mark of honor for the people of Septimont. Over time, they have become one of the symbols of the city itself. Inspired by that, this souvenir badge lets travelers carry home a piece of Septimont's fiery spirit. Even far away from Septimont, they can still hear the echo of battle in their hearts.

name: Petals for Rosebearer
attributes_description: Petals symbolizing honor and triumph.
bg_description:
At the height of the celebration, petals will shower down as everyone rejoices.
Beneath this rain of petals, people who fought side by side will share honey and wine. Such is a true moment of joy for the Septimontians.
To receive petals from the Rosebearer is an honor. And to bestow them? Just as great a privilege.

name: Phantom: Fallacy of No Return
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Phantom: Kerasaur
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Adventure Log
attributes_description: A token earned by submitting exploration reports from various regions. Can be exchanged for "Adventure Packages" at the Lollo Logistics truck.
bg_description: "If the Pioneer Association is the eyes of civilization, then Lollo Logistics aspires to be the feet that carry humanity forward," a Lollo Logistics member remarked during an interview.

name: Sim Ingot
attributes_description: A simulated material composed of Remnant data, used to level up Combat Machines in "Tidal Defense Simulator."
bg_description: A virtual material that imitates standard metal cubes. In real combat scenarios, similar materials can be easily reshaped into various components with a crafting bench.

name: Blighted Fang
attributes_description: A calcified fang-shaped remnant of the Dark Tide creatures. Can be used to advance reward progress in Hunters' Rite.
bg_description: A calcified fragment left behind by the Dark Tide creatures, shaped like a beast's fang. Though affected by Tidal Blight, it poses no threat and holds no practical purpose. To most, it's just another forsaken shard scattered across the Plateaus. But to Gladiators, Blighted Fangs carry meaning. Hunters who clash with the Dark Tide often claim these fangs from fallen Dark Tide creatures before they dissolve. Each fang is a blood-earned token of valor and a silent yet gleaming badge of honor.

name: Titanhorn
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description: A hardened horn from a Titanhorn Antelope. These creatures are known to feed on stone in the most unforgiving environments, resulting in horns as tough as the rocks they consume.

name: Stone Rose
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: A strange flower that blooms where the Dark Tide has receded. Though its core has been completely calcified, a faint fragrance still lingers—a proof that life's resilience shall never be underestimated.

name: Sliverglow Bloom
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A rare flower found only in the Sanguis Plateaus, said to glow like moonlight in the dark.
"O warriors, should shadow steal the moon, look down, and the Sliverglow Bloom still shines beneath your feet."

name: Luminous Calendula
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A rare bloom found only in the Sanguis Plateaus, said to thrive where warriors have shed their blood.
When Gladiators die a glorious death in Septimont's wild hunts, their companions often place a Luminous Calendula at their graves as a solemn tribute to their courage and sacrifice.

name: Augusta's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Augusta's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Iuno's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Iuno's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Waveborn Moonstone
attributes_description: A mineral that holds a glimmer of light. Can be used in the Moonlit Revelation event to decipher the Lunar Phases.
bg_description: A natural blue mineral, known for its ability to absorb glimmers of light. When night falls, it gleams with a soft glow like moonlight rippling across the sea, hence the name Waveborn Moonstone. In Septimont, its association with the moon has made it a medium for reading the Lunar Phases.

name: Marinated Olives
attributes_description: Grants 50% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
The clever folk of Septimont know a thousand ways to prepare olives, but only the marinated kind truly wins their hearts.
A handful of olives and a good bottle of wine, that's all it takes to bring Septimontians the simplest joy and happiness sometimes.

name: Blooming Bread
attributes_description: Grants 40% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A traditional staple of Septimont. Long before its people ever settled these highlands, this crisp-crusted, hearty bread had already become the most enduring flavor on their tongues.
To a Septimontian table, bread is what a sword is to a Gladiator.

name: Sweetened Olives
attributes_description: Grants 55% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Did someone pick these olives? Hardly. The branches, heavy with ripened fruit, simply yielded their bounty, dropping them gently into her waiting hands. No elaborate preparation could improve their natural, fresh flavor. A simple roll in honey is all it takes to satisfy her discerning palate: as the verdant aroma still clings to her fingertips, a wave of sweet freshness washes over her mouth.

name: Sweetleaf Blooming Bread
attributes_description: Grants 44% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
An ordinary, traditional bread found throughout Septimont, even in the far-off town of Fabianum. Perhaps to set it apart, local bakers in Fabianum would sprinkle crushed herbs over the crisp crust and, with a sense of ceremony, carve the word "Delicious" into the surface, as if this modest declaration could lend it a hint of dignity.
Is it delicious? The young Augusta never thought so. To her, it was just the dry, hard bread waiting at home after a day of running wild, something to fill her belly, the quiet "footnote" to every dinner her mother made. It was plain, unremarkable. Like water. Like sunlight. So ordinary it was easy to overlook. But years later, standing before her own stove in Septimont, Augusta tried to recapture that long-forgotten taste. And as the familiar scent and gentle sweetness returned to her tongue, she finally understood what "Delicious" meant.
Perhaps, she had never truly bid farewell to her hometown.

name: Blighted Crown of Puppet King
attributes_description: The False Sovereign's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
The shattered crown of the False Sovereign.
Forged from the collective yearning of the masses, the puppet took the form of their deepest desire. Yet its role as the Sovereign and even its very existence are nothing but a fabrication. When the tide recedes, the crown of power and authority is revealed to be nothing but a mask, tainted by the Dark Tide.

name: Abyssal Husk
attributes_description: Lady of the Sea - Embers of Glory's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
The cheers, the applause, the cry for glory from within...
She sinks, as if into the depths of the sea, drifting ever farther from those sounds of her past, unable to respond.
In the stillness below, only the shadows of a sea creature circle her in silence.

name: "TD Slayer" Coupon
attributes_description: A special coupon prepared by KU-Uigon for Black Shores staff participating in "Tidal Defense Simulator." Can be used to redeem rewards during the event.
bg_description: "Congrats on taking another one down!"

name: Marinated Olives Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Marinated Olives.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Marinated Olives.

name: Blooming Bread Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Blooming Bread.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Blooming Bread.

name: The Nevermore
attributes_description: The living dwell upon the dark beyond, stubbornly denying the insurmountable divide between life and death.
bg_description: Fully activate Phrolova's Resonance Chain

name: Rating Star
attributes_description: After completing a simulation in Tidal Defense Simulator, you receive Rating Stars based on your performance. They can be used to unlock Overwatch Protocols.
bg_description: The Rating Star measures a participant's overall ability in handling threats. Only those who demonstrate exceptional leadership and tactical skills during the simulation are granted higher, more advanced access permissions.

name: Eternal Blazing Sun
attributes_description: What is the Sun? She is the one who offers warmth and radiance without end. To this ancient land, she devotes her blood, her glory, and her life. And thus, she becomes the Sun, the eternal blaze for all to look upon.
bg_description: Fully activate Augusta's Resonance Chain

name: Defier of Fated End
attributes_description:
The Moon has always been herself, long before she knew she was the Moon.
She no longer peers into the future through the scattered light of fate, for she understands that wherever she sets her gaze, the future she seeks awaits. Amid the countless paths of destiny, she chooses to become the one true Anchor for herself.
bg_description: Fully activate Iuno's Resonance Chain

name: Catcher in the Tide
attributes_description: A special reward obtained from the "Tidal Defense Simulator" event. It records the highest TD waves you withstood in the "Total Defense Test."
bg_description: Just as you once witnessed in the simulation, that towering tide will one day descend, engulfing all. But this time, you are ready to face it again.

name: NO CONTENT
attributes_description: NO CONTENT
bg_description: NO CONTENT

name: Galbrena's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Galbrena's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Qiuyuan's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Qiuyuan's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Curse of the Abyss
attributes_description: Threnodian Leviathan's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: Once the manifestation of Leviathan's power, its calcified tail stands as a testament to the fall of an ancient divinity—yesterday's shackles long since broken. As the endless night recedes, the curse turns into strength, carried forth until the final waves.

name: Returnee's Forgery Aid
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Skyhunter's Feather
attributes_description: Used to increase the Syntonization Rank of Hunter's Growl weapons.
bg_description: A raw material for fine weapons in Septimont, meticulously shaped by Septimont's artisans into the form of a Gryphon's feather. Cold to the touch, yet burning with untempered resolve.

name: Pioneer Podcast Supply Pack II
attributes_description: Open to claim one <color=Rare4>Golden Eternal</color> or <color=Rare4>Hunter's Growl</color> series weapon of your choice, or <color=Rare5>Premium Tuner x200</color>.
bg_description: It contains the powerful weapon selected by the Pioneer Association for its explorers.

name: Pioneer Podcast Syntonization Chest
attributes_description:
Open to obtain one exclusive Syntonization material of your choice, from either the Hunter's Growl series or the previous Pioneer Podcast Weapon:
<color=Rare4>Gilded Ginkgo x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Skyhunter's Feather x1</color>
bg_description: Provided by the Pioneer Association, this Supply Chest contains base weapon materials and is updated in sync with Pioneer Podcast Weapon Chest.

name: O Sun, Witness My Name
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.
