name: Return to Asphodel's Embrace
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: Pure Dark Tide Frequency
attributes_description: A pure reverberation from the Dark Tide of the past.
bg_description:
Pure and silent, this frequency has slumbered long enough to leave no ripples. As the firstborn of the Dark Tide, it carries the ancient will of its mother. Undeniably powerful yet defiant, it betrayed its creator in the abyss and now sleeps alone in the dark realm.
Only the sweet Resonance can stir its dreamless sleep… and awaken its long-forgotten hunger.

name: Enhancement Module
attributes_description: Used to amplify the intensity of the participant's data across various categories during the simulation.
bg_description: The more comprehensive data gathered across different simulation intensities become, the more Resonator allocation for future Waveworn Phenomenon encounters will improve.

name: Simulation Data
attributes_description: Large quantities of data gathered during the testing of the hologram.
bg_description: The more data is collected from the drills, the more accurate the Waveworn Phenomena simulations become.

name: Knowledge Module
attributes_description: Used to unlock talents for the participant in the simulation.
bg_description: Using different talents allows the participant to gather varying data, which leads to clearer training objectives for support personnels combating the Waveworn Phenomenon.

name: Reveler Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

name: Sail Against the Storm
attributes_description:
Casting Echo Skill increases Havoc DMG by 20%, stacking up to 2 times. The same Resonator cannot trigger this effect again with the same Echo Skill. At 2 stacks, the Resonator's next instance of damage dealt triggers an AoE attack, dealing 800% Havoc DMG to nearby targets. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: "Hoist the sail! This won't be the end. Our legend is just beginning!"

name: Gaze that Drowns in Dream
attributes_description:
Grants 20% Electro DMG Bonus and 20% Aero DMG Bonus.
When the active Resonator gains a Shield, they additionally recover Ember, triggered up to 1 time per second.
When the active Resonator deals damage while in the Burning Waves state, they unleash an AoE attack, dealing Electro DMG equal to 2400% of their ATK in total, triggered once every 6 seconds.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: The captain lowered his telescope, certain he had found the fabled land where treasures litter the ground like dust. He barked orders to charge through the last veil of fog that stood between them and their dream. But the fate waiting ahead was something he never anticipated.

name: Falling Star that Tears Fate Apart
attributes_description:
The Burning Waves state becomes permanent. While in Burning Waves, Resonators deal 50% more DMG.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Only when the stargazer saw destruction fall with their own eyes did they realize that nothing lasts forever. Not even stars that seem to shine with endless life.

name: Reveler Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

name: Haven that Gleams Elegantly
attributes_description:
Grants 30% Fusion DMG Bonus.
When the active Resonator casts Echo Skill or deals Echo Skill DMG, they additionally recover Ember, triggered up to 1 time per second.
When the active Resonator deals damage while in the Burning Waves state, they unleash an AoE attack, dealing Fusion DMG equal to 1600% of their ATK in total (considered Echo Skill DMG), triggered up to 1 time every 6s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Its whisper repeated over and over, offering a tempting promise: Give up yourself. Give up your freedom. Give up your thoughts. Surrender everything, and live on like a bird in a cage. In return, it promises true happiness.

name: Gaze that Drowns in Dream
attributes_description:
Grants 20% Electro DMG Bonus and 20% Aero DMG Bonus.
When the active Resonator gains a Shield, they additionally recover Ember, triggered up to 1 time per second.
When the active Resonator deals damage while in the Burning Waves state, they unleash an AoE attack, dealing Electro DMG equal to 2400% of their ATK in total, triggered once every 6 seconds.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: The captain lowered his telescope, certain he had found the fabled land where treasures litter the ground like dust. He barked orders to charge through the last veil of fog that stood between them and their dream. But the fate waiting ahead was something he never anticipated.

name: A Breeze from Faraway Shores
attributes_description:
When a Resonator inflicts Aero Erosion upon enemies, the active Resonator in the team gains 40% Aero DMG Bonus for 15s, stacking up to 3 times. 

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: He heard from his grandmother that birds could carry wishes from the mortal world to the heavens. From that moment on, he began carving birds day and night, hoping that the Sentinel would allow him to see his departed mother once more. When the chisel in his hand suddenly fell to the ground, he realized that it was the moment the Sentinel answered his wish.

name: Lollo Stamp
attributes_description: The voucher used to participate in the Lollo Genie special lottery.
bg_description: Each time you complete an order and upload the data, Lollo Stamps will be transferred to your account as smoothly as a warm cup of milk before bed.

name: Peso's Challenge Note
attributes_description: A note found behind the waterfall near the Three Heroes' Crest. Use to view details.
bg_description: "It's located beside the House of Prophecy, beneath the Hornett."

name: Sim Credits
attributes_description: Simulated Shell Credits composed of Remnant data, used to craft Combat Machines in "Tidal Defense Simulator" or purchase materials from KU-Money's Store.
bg_description: These Shell-Credit-based currencies are used to represent the logistics budget earned during combat, including but not limited to supplies, manpower, Echo data, energy, and any other resources measurable in monetary terms.

name: A Debt Note
attributes_description: A scrap of paper retrieved from a fallen Gladiator.
bg_description: Fictro owes Nolon his life for scribbling on his shield and needs to keep it safe until the hunt ends.

name: A Reply Letter
attributes_description: A scrap of paper retrieved from a fallen Gladiator.
bg_description: Why buy such an expensive helmet? And it doesn't even fit! Return it!

name: An Unsent Note
attributes_description: A scrap of paper retrieved from a fallen Gladiator.
bg_description: Thanks for the gift. Works like a charm. Still not ready to forgive you.

name: A Challenge Letter
attributes_description: A scrap of paper retrieved from a fallen Gladiator.
bg_description: Round Ten. Let's see who makes it to the Wastelands first, Fictro.

name: Cloth of the Unyielding
attributes_description: The frequency lingering on the cloth still echoes the battles of old.
bg_description:
A scrap of fabric imbued with the unyielding will of its former owner, a warrior who stood fearless against the Dark Tide.
Bathed in the Dark Tide, the Gladiator faced death without hesitation. Crimson blood long stained the cloth that bound his wounds. He fought. He bled. He rose. He fought again. Until death came, but never conquered.

name: "Dawn of Home"
attributes_description: A finely crafted toy of unknown material. It emits a faint but warm frequency.
bg_description:
A token of your successful completion of all the challenges in "Dreams of Cindertide: Septimont." A tribute to the long-awaited Hero of the Heroes from their loyal warriors.
It emits a faint but warm frequency, though its true purpose remains uncertain.
"The cherished homeland of mine... I wonder if flowers begin to bloom there once more?"

name: Menu Board
attributes_description: A menu board made by Namipon for the cafe's opening day, showcasing the new food and drinks to be expected.
bg_description: An embodiment of good wishes to the opening day of Shashou Cafe.

name: Cherry Blossom Bonsai
attributes_description: A cherry blossom bonsai made by Chisa. She handpicked the branches from Sakura Quarter, where you two roamed together.
bg_description: An embodiment of good wishes to the opening day of Shashou Cafe.

name: Mysterious Standee
attributes_description: The standee Namipon made to celebrate the opening day according to your suggestions. It shows a mysterious, stylish, and adorable girl.
bg_description: Legend has it that she is the Mysterious Scissorswoman hunting down Tacet Discords in Honami. How long can you meet her gaze?

name: Weekly Challenge Supply Pack II
attributes_description:
Open to claim a type of advanced skill material of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Monument Bell x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Unending Destruction x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Dreamless Feather x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Sentinel's Dagger x1</color>
<color=Rare4>The Netherworld's Stare x1</color>
<color=Rare4>When Irises Bloom x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Curse of the Abyss x1</color>
bg_description: Upon touching the chest, you hear what sounds like a battle hymn.

name: Champion's Battlesong Collection
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Anchor Stone Fragment
attributes_description: A shattered piece of an Anchor Stone.
bg_description:
A shattered piece of an Anchor Stone, still emitting the force field as ever.
"Let this small thing pry open the cracks in fate's door."

name: Imperator's Relic
attributes_description: A relic that Sentinel Imperator left you.
bg_description: This relic from Sentinel Imperator has been sealed in the Earthrend Wedge, waiting silently for the destined hand. As your fingers lightly tap on its surface, a gentle wind whispers past your ear, carrying with it an unspoken tenderness from realms beyond the farthest horizon.

name: Invitation Letter from Ephor's Palace
attributes_description: A handwritten invitation from Augusta herself.
bg_description:
You feel lingering warmth on the envelope as you unfold the letter:

To Our Distinguished Guest from Afar,

I hope your stay in Septimont has been pleasant. Though we never met again after the Great Agon's Final, your deeds have already stirred fresh winds through our halls. Even from mere fragments of conversation, I know your arrival has breathed new life into our city.

While formalities were never Septimont's tradition, I must apologize for missing our appointed meeting. No excuse justifies such neglect toward a Champion of Septimont. Now, with preparations complete and sunrise approaching, I too await the dawn.

Should this invitation still find favor with you, I would be honored by your presence at Ephor's Palace. I await your coming with humble anticipation.

Augusta

name: Lunarum Bracelet
attributes_description: A bracelet given to you by Iuno.
bg_description: This bracelet has been with Iuno ever since she became a Priestess. Forged from lunarum and adorned with sprout motifs, it is not only a keepsake, but a quiet witness to her journey. Now, she entrusts it to you as a medium of Anchoring so you may draw upon her strength to reveal the Dark Tide creations.

name: Old Anchor Stone
attributes_description: An Anchor Stone that looks a bit worn.
bg_description:
A type of small device manufactured with Tacetite formed around the Earthrend Wedge. It provides energy to Anchor Obelisks, which in turn amplify its frequency to repel the Dark Tide and its creations.
During the hunts, Gladiators of Septimont strategically set up Anchor Obelisks carrying Anchor Stones at critical locations across Maroonwood, the main battlefield. These devices help them drive the Dark Tide and its creations toward the base of the Earthrend Wedge, where they are eliminated. The strategy has proven highly effective in preventing the Dark Tide's spread beyond the Earthrend Wedge's containment.

name: Downtown Repose
attributes_description: Used to unlock a Resonator-specific outfit that grants the designated Resonator a new look.
bg_description:
She leans casually against the railing, her sweater soft against the light, appearing equally elegant as she is relaxed. Changing up the style every now and then isn't so bad.

Turning slightly, Zani looks down at the city stretching beneath her. The afternoon sunlight spills over the buildings, their outlines shimmering in the glow. She gazes quietly, letting the city's clamor become the backdrop to this moment of ease.

name: Together in the Petal Rain
attributes_description: Bruno happened to capture this moment at the height of the celebration.
bg_description: She has preserved many such memories in this way to guard against the fading blur brought on by her Anchoring ability. Those photos have blurred in the eyes of those who no longer recall her. But… this one marks a beginning. Moonlight pours down, filling the quiet void. For the first time, the present belongs to both of you.

name: Together in the Petal Rain
attributes_description: Bruno happened to capture this moment at the height of the celebration.
bg_description: She has preserved many such memories in this way to guard against the fading blur brought on by her Anchoring ability. Those photos have blurred in the eyes of those who no longer recall her. But… this one marks a beginning. Moonlight pours down, filling the quiet void. For the first time, the present belongs to both of you.

name: Lunarum Bracelet
attributes_description: A bracelet given to you by Iuno, once again.
bg_description: You tried to return it to her. Yet, in time, it found its way back to you. To wear it or keep it safe, the choice is yours, and in that choice lies her trust. But this time, it means something more. No longer merely a relic of her long and lonely journey, it has become proof that you reached out and drew the moon to your side. She Anchored the world, and you, with this, have Anchored her.

name: Rice Dango
attributes_description: Used in Honami City to upgrade Cafe Decor, unlock Sticker slots, upgrade Namipon Badges, and make item purchases in the Supply Station.
bg_description: A specialty snack from Homani City, widely praised for its soft, chewy texture and sweet, fragrant filling. Namipon's favorite. Deliver these to Namipon in exchange for items or use them to upgrade Cafe Decor.

name: Lollo Logistics Delivery Box
attributes_description: A misplaced delivery box.
bg_description: A box with an "Items Insured" label affixed to the side. What valuables could be inside?

name: Reveler Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

name: Haven that Gleams Elegantly
attributes_description:
Grants 30% Fusion DMG Bonus.
When the active Resonator casts Echo Skill or deals Echo Skill DMG, they additionally recover Ember, triggered up to 1 time per second.
When the active Resonator deals damage while in the Burning Waves state, they unleash an AoE attack, dealing Fusion DMG equal to 1600% of their ATK in total (considered Echo Skill DMG), triggered up to 1 time every 6s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Its whisper repeated over and over, offering a tempting promise: Give up yourself. Give up your freedom. Give up your thoughts. Surrender everything, and live on like a bird in a cage. In return, it promises true happiness.

name: Falling Star that Tears Fate Apart
attributes_description:
The Burning Waves state becomes permanent. While in Burning Waves, Resonators deal 50% more DMG.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Only when the stargazer saw destruction fall with their own eyes did they realize that nothing lasts forever. Not even stars that seem to shine with endless life.

name: A Question with Many Answers
attributes_description:
Ignore 20% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG to enemies inflicted with Negative Statuses.
Resonators who inflict Negative Statuses on enemies recover additional Ember, triggered once every second.
While in the Burning Waves state, Resonators deal 50% more DMG, and the Negative Status on the target is raised to max stacks upon hit.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: "Used by poets to record dreams, by playwrights to create lives, by scholars to deduce truths. What is this item that I spoke of?"

name: Coffee Point
attributes_description: Used to exchange limited-time extra rewards.
bg_description: Shashou Cafe loyalty card. They say you can get a special prize by accumulating enough of it.

name: Phantom: The False Sovereign
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Laurel Shrimp in Nimbus Reduction
attributes_description: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Food that was once a staple of Rinascitan home cooking, but which has since disappeared from the public eye as high demand led to a precipitous drop in the availability of the tasty shrimp used in its preparation. Today, only a few who purchase expensive shrimp from merchants affiliated with the Order are able to recreate this classical dish.

name: Super Doubleshot Shaved Ice Milkshake Deluxe
attributes_description: Grants 28% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Galbrena's unique dessert recipe features large scoops of ice cream over a bowl of shaved ice, topped with colorful jams for that extra kick in flavor, along with a portion generous enough to eat to your heart's content. She even took extra care to adjust the Tacet Discord-shaped candies and cookies to be more appealing and cute.
Perhaps there's a deeper reason behind it all: When dealing with Tacet Discords, one needs a sharp, decisive "crunch." But when it comes to life, one should savor its flavors to the fullest. According to Galbrena, eating them separately or together comes down to personal preference. Her only advice is: Enjoy it before it melts. Many life's precious moments "melt in an instant," just like the sprinkles of ice. But don't worry, delightful flavors cling to the taste buds and never fade, always there to enjoy.

name: Chongzhou Spicy Tofu
attributes_description: Defeating overworld enemies yields 55% more Shell Credits, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
When Qiuyuan and his comrades were still in service, their missions often required them to travel fast and eat light, with little chance to enjoy a good meal. Even when they lodged at village inns, they still had to cook their own food out of an abundance of caution. Originally from Chongzhou, Qiuyuan had learned a few basic recipes at a young age. One of his dishes was fragrant, spicy, and mouthwatering, perfect for an empty stomach when paired with rice. Simple, yet satisfying. 
"Eat well, live well."

name: Laurel Shrimp in Nimbus Reduction Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Laurel Shrimp in Nimbus Reduction.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make Laurel Shrimp in Nimbus Reduction.

name: Abyssal Solvent
attributes_description: Increases Echo Skill DMG by 50% for all Resonators in the team for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A solid solvent made using a special process that imparts healing effects.
Allegedly invented by someone after going to Rinascita. Apparently, they really wanted to become a Master Echo Trainer.

name: Abyssal Solvent Recipe
attributes_description: Increases Echo Skill DMG by 50% for all Resonators in the team for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A small, compact proportioning data card, the data of which is read by the Synthesizer to gain access to Synthesis' corresponding products.

name: Rice Dango
attributes_description: Used in Honami City to upgrade Cafe Decor, unlock Sticker slots, upgrade Namipon Badges, and make item purchases in the Supply Station.
bg_description: A specialty snack from Homani City, widely praised for its soft, chewy texture and sweet, fragrant filling. Namipon's favorite. Deliver these to Namipon in exchange for items or use them to upgrade Cafe Decor.

name: Summer Flower
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: This flower has always remained in bloom as the Lament sealed it and the City within the Sonoro Sphere. Just like an eternal summer, it never withers, never fades. In the past, during every blossom season, Honami City would hold a traditional Summer Flower viewing event.

name: Cartethyia's Pendant
attributes_description: A pendant once worn close to Cartethyia's heart. It seems she left a message within. Since her frequency still lingers within you, resonating with the pendant may reveal her message.
bg_description: {PlayerName}, trust her. And trust me... Everything we've done... is to... defeat... Leviathan...

name: Phantom: Twin Nova - Nebulous Cannon
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Phantom: Twin Nova - Collapsar Blade
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Flame Undying
attributes_description:
I am ash, I am flame; I am darkness, yet I am salvation.
Though light falters and torments sear my flesh, still I remain true to my oath. My undying flame shall scour all evil.
bg_description: Fully activate Galbrena's Resonance Chain

name: Blade Within Bamboo
attributes_description: A verdant edge cut from bamboo, concealed for the way, unsheathed for the cause.
bg_description: Fully activate Qiuyuan's Resonance Chain

name: Modding EXP
attributes_description: Experience gained by riding the motorbike through varied and challenging terrain. Used to upgrade an expedition motorbike's Modding Level.
bg_description: Measure the world with your wisdom.

name: Token of Radiance: Lahai-Roi
attributes_description: A badge earned by completing the challenges of Peaks of Prestige in Lahai-Roi. Can be used to redeem rewards.
bg_description: A badge earned by completing the challenges of Peaks of Prestige in Lahai-Roi. Can be used to redeem rewards.

name: Prestige Point: Lahai-Roi
attributes_description: Frequency data collected from fights in Peaks of Prestige. Used to unlock special Echoes exclusive to the event. Can only be used in Lahai-Roi.
bg_description: Duelists use specialized Frequency data called Prestige Points to unlock their Echoes. As the Peaks of Prestige version in Lahai-Roi differs from the one in Septimont, Prestige Points earned in Septimont cannot be used in Lahai-Roi.

name: Lahai-Roi Rank Point
attributes_description: Points earned from defeating opponents in the Peaks of Prestige Lahai-Roi Ranked Tornament. Used to increase your rank in Lahai-Roi.
bg_description: So far, the success of Peaks of Prestige in Lahai-Roi has surpassed even Furius's wildest dreams. Many qualified duelists have gathered in Lahai-Roi, all competing for the coveted title of Division Champion, making Rank Points the most sought-after prize of all.

name: Travails of a Steely Sword
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: Till Dawn
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: Firebound Angel
attributes_description: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
bg_description: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

name: Chisa's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Chisa's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Buling's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Buling's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Lemon-Scented Sukiyaki
attributes_description: Increases Echo drop rate by 22%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode
bg_description: Refreshing lemons meld their zesty notes into this rich stew. Tender and flavorful, it is one of Chisa's signature dishes. Every winter, she'd curl up under a heated futon to watch music shows while scents wafting from the pot filled the room. Those were the coziest days in her memories.

name: Shredded Fish Soup
attributes_description: Restores 50 STA.
bg_description: Stir fry the shredded fish with seasoning, place it on top of the simmered thick broth, and then pour hot oil over the dish, creating a sizzling sound that brings out sweet and savory flavors. This rich soup is by far Buling's favorite hometown dish.

name: Honami Doom Walker
attributes_description: A special reward obtained from the "Stranger Things in Honami" event.
bg_description: Even amidst the shattered mirage, you still manage to build a haven of peace.

name: Where the Red Thread Binds
attributes_description: Through rain and night, tracing the threads that run through all things, she severs the endless loop, spreads her arms wide, and embraces a summer no longer trapped in stillness.
bg_description: Fully activate Chisa's Resonance Chain

name: Heeded by Divinities and Demons
attributes_description: I grant this Fu Talisman, purging every trace of malice, until my ears hear only clarity, where neither demon nor divinity remains.
bg_description: Fully activate Buling's Resonance Chain

attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Phantom: Iceglint Dancer
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: The Stigma that Signifies Vainglory
attributes_description:
When Resonators are in mid-air, their DMG dealt is Amplified by 80%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: "Return, people, to ways of old, and cast aside the arrogant boasts of progress. For yesterday's light shall ever outshine today's pale imitation, as today dimly outglows tomorrow's coming darkness. Cling to the known, the tried, the true. Only then may we find shelter from the terrors and confusion of the unknown."

bg_description: The captain lowered his telescope, certain he had found the fabled land where treasures litter the ground like dust. He barked orders to charge through the last veil of fog that stood between them and their dream. But the fate waiting ahead was something he never anticipated.

name: "The Real Me"
attributes_description: A stand-up card that conveys Chisa's special feelings, which she crafted herself while convalescing at the Black Shores. Zoom in for a closer look.
bg_description:
Under the open city sky stands the Chisa in her high school days.
The joys and sorrows she once knew in her hometown have become indelible traces upon her heart, shaping the "Kuchiba Chisa" of today.
Now, she offers you those treasured memories of her past, her love, and all that she once called her own.

name: Old Student ID
attributes_description: An old student ID from Startorch Academy, said to have been yours once.
bg_description:
The student ID Chisa unintentionally took amid the Void Storm.
The ID is eroded, but you can still make out your face in the picture.
Twenty-odd years ago, you once roamed the halls of Startorch Academy.

name: Old Student ID
attributes_description: An old student ID from Startorch Academy, said to have been yours once.
bg_description:
The student ID Chisa unintentionally took amid the Void Storm.
The ID is eroded, but you can still make out your face in the picture.
Twenty-odd years ago, you once roamed the halls of Startorch Academy.

name: Phantom: Chop Chop
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Adventure Log
attributes_description: A token earned by submitting exploration reports from various regions. Can be exchanged for "Adventure Packages" at the Lollo Logistics truck.
bg_description: "If the Pioneer Association is the eyes of civilization, then Lollo Logistics aspires to be the feet that carry humanity forward," a Lollo Logistics member remarked during an interview.

name: Mechanite
attributes_description: Material gathered from the environment, essential for constructing the Spacetrek Observatory and routes.
bg_description: Once a native mineral widely distributed throughout Lahai-Roi, this ore developed crystalline formations etched with mechanical patterns under the influence of the Exostrider. Electronic devices crafted from this material exhibit modest increases in computational performance, making it a highly sought-after industrial resource.

name: Compressed Bedrock
attributes_description: Material recovered from fallen enemies, used in constructing the Spacetrek Observatory and routes.
bg_description: A high-density material processed from Lahai-Roi's native stone. Specially formulated for use with Route Constructors, it played a critical role during the early stages of the Spacetrek Collective's large-scale infrastructure development in Lahai-Roi. When paired with Route Constructors, Compressed Bedrock enabled rapid and stable route deployment across the region.

name: Constructor Core
attributes_description: Material gained unintentionally during exploration, used in constructing the Spacetrek Observatory and routes.
bg_description: A portable, rechargeable power unit developed by the Spacetrek Collective to support long-term field expeditions in Lahai-Roi. Within it stores the energy converted from the Reactor's glow by Solis Lens Arrays. Each Constructor Core can supply the basic power needs of a five-person expedition team for approximately 12 hours.

name: Service Credit
attributes_description: Points earned by completing the reconstruction of the Spacetrek Observatory and the routes. Can be used to redeem rewards in the store.
bg_description: Digital credits granted by the Spacetrek Collective to anyone who has contributed to the construction of Lahai-Roi's Route Network, which can be redeemed at the Spacetrek Collective for rewards.

name: Resonator Type-I Sticker Blind Box
attributes_description: Open to get 1 <color=#ca6dff>Unique</color> Resonator Type-I Sticker at random.
bg_description: Luck is also power.

name: Universal Sticker Pack
attributes_description: Open to get 1 <color=#ed354d>Legendary</color> Universal Sticker at random.
bg_description: Luck is also power.

name: Universal Sticker Pack

name: Tape of Last Words
attributes_description: Touch to collect or use Grapple to hook and quickly approach the Tapes of Last Words scattered across Lahai-Roi.
bg_description:
When the Void Storm consumes personnel carrying a Cassette, the magnetic moment within the device becomes corrupted, reducing it to a Tape of Last Words. The encoded information is rendered unreadable.
A Mechasout in a Solsworn apparel is now collecting these Tapes of Last Words in the hope of "cleansing" the Voidmatter corruption and restoring the data once preserved within them.

name: Soliseed of Essehalo
attributes_description: Obtained by finding a lost Soliskin. Deliver it to the Giant Soliskin at the Monument of Returning Soliseeds to claim your reward.
bg_description: Like plants, the Essehalo floating above the Soliskin grows and bears fruits, which are carefully preserved and later given to those who earn the Soliskin's trust.

name: Lingering Summer Light
attributes_description: Background music played while looking down at the lights in Honami on top of Neon Tower.
bg_description: Unlocked after completing Main Quest "Stagnant Dawn on Wastelands."

name: Tangled Flower
attributes_description: Background music in Honami City.
bg_description: Unlocked after completing Main Quest "Stagnant Dawn on Wastelands."

name: Towards the End
attributes_description: Background played when battling the Elegy of the Fallen.
bg_description: Unlocked after completing Main Quest "Stagnant Dawn on Wastelands."

name: Before the Cicadas Fade
attributes_description: Background music in the unrenovated Shashou Cafe.
bg_description: Unlocked after completing Main Quest "Stagnant Dawn on Wastelands."

name: Collapsing Dawn
attributes_description: Background music played when falling into Honami City.
bg_description: Unlocked after completing Main Quest "Stagnant Dawn on Wastelands."

name: Unfolding Chaos
attributes_description: Background music in Neon Tower.
bg_description: Unlocked after completing Main Quest "Stagnant Dawn on Wastelands."

name: When You Hold the Truth
attributes_description: Background music played when bidding farewell to Sumika.
bg_description: Unlocked after completing Main Quest "Stagnant Dawn on Wastelands."

name: Broken Wing Polarizer
attributes_description: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
bg_description: A metallic shard, resembling a solitary butterfly wing, its surface dull and covered with a dense passivation layer. Under suitable temperature conditions, the residual frequency energy within can still be harnessed.

name: Monowing Polarizer
attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
bg_description: A metallic shard, resembling a pair of butterfly wings, its surface glimmers like Tacetites. Due to its reactive nature, careful storage is required after collection to prevent loss of its frequency energy.

name: Polywing Polarizer
attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
bg_description: A triple-winged metallic shard, exhibiting an unusual radiance. This material forms under extremely rare conditions, and its transformation patterns remain largely unexplored by current scientific research.

name: Layered Wing Polarizer
attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
bg_description: A solidified metallic shard, resembling a fused cluster of butterfly wings. Microscopic analysis of a few samples reveals their highly intricate internal structure, which appears more like that of a living organism than an inorganic material.

name: Incomplete Combustor
attributes_description: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
bg_description: A bullet-shaped metal, named Combustor for its peculiar shape. Specialized purification processes are required as it typically contains a high level of impurities.

name: Aftertune Combustor
attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
bg_description: Resembling a solidified bullet, this metal has undergone quenching, greatly reducing impurities. Even non-specialists can discern the differences between various grades.

name: Remnant Combustor
attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
bg_description: Resembling a bullet, this metal has its impurities almost removed after repeated purification. Beyond its practical applications, its exquisite and unusual form makes it a highly sought-after collectible.

name: Reverb Combustor
attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
bg_description: Rsembling a bullet, this metal is virtually flawless in purity. Some Resonators hesitate to use it as Ascension Material, preferring to have it crafted into unique ornaments by skilled artisans.

name: Spliced String
attributes_description: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
bg_description: Pieced together from fragments, this Resonance Cord reveals to humans the concept of stationary vibration for the first time.

name: Broken String
attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
bg_description: Intermittent and incomplete, this Resonance Cord contains stored tonal energy that can be extracted by researchers, yet its content remains indecipherable.

name: Solidified String
attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
bg_description: Complete and solidified, this Resonance Cord captures the paradox of motion and stillness that fascinates researchers. Its secrets, however, remain unsolved.

name: Melodic String
attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
bg_description: Interwoven yet balanced, this Resonance Cord is as harmonious as a song that no one has ever written. Perhaps it is more a subject for aesthetics than science.

name: LF Carved Crystal
attributes_description: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
bg_description: A chipped crystal of Waveworn residue. Originally a blocky structure, its equilibrium is broken, and its Remnant Energy has mostly dissipated.

name: MF Carved Crystal
attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
bg_description: A chipped crystal of Waveworn residue. It remains stable and, with the proper absorber, the contained Remnant Energy may still be extracted.

name: HF Carved Crystal
attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
bg_description: A chipped crystal of Waveworn residue. It maintains a delicate equilibrium and, after centrifugation, its concentrated product becomes widely useful.

name: FF Carved Crystal
attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
bg_description: A chipped crystal of Waveworn residue. It maintains a breathtakingly stable equilibrium. As a critical material for advanced technologies, it is subject to the strictest trade restrictions worldwide.

name: LF Waveworn Shard
attributes_description: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
bg_description: A radial-cracked Waveworn residue. Its equilibrium has been disrupted, and the remaining Remnant Energy has decayed to mere Reverberations.

name: MF Waveworn Shard
attributes_description: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
bg_description: A radial-cracked Waveworn residue. It remains stable and, with the proper absorber, the contained Remnant Energy may still be extracted.

name: HF Waveworn Shard
attributes_description: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
bg_description: A radial-cracked Waveworn residue. It maintains a delicate equilibrium and, after centrifugation, its concentrated product becomes widely useful.

name: FF Waveworn Shard
attributes_description: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
bg_description: A radial-cracked Waveworn residue. It maintains a breathtakingly stable equilibrium. As a critical material for advanced technologies, it is subject to the strictest trade restrictions worldwide.

name: Synchro Coin
attributes_description:
A special token issued by the Synchrolink System based on the trainee's performance in general simulation training.
Each hard-earned coin stands as proof of a Synchronist's progress and breakthroughs. Can be exchanged for a variety of supplies that the Academy prepared for Synchronists.
bg_description: NO CONTENT

name: Suncoveter's Reach
attributes_description: Starward Handmaiden: Hyvatia's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
Fragment of the Hyvatia Observation Array's Primary Lens
Once used to survey the Reactor Drive, Hyvatia was among the Spacetrek Collective's proudest creations. Now, the polished beryllium plate no longer reflects the sun of tomorrow, but a distorted illusion of Voidmatter. What stretches toward the future is no longer noble ideals, but grasping, covetous hands.

name: Burning Judgment
attributes_description: Reactor Husk's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
When the Reactor Drive's defense is triggered, it can only mean that the Threnodian has breached containment. The mech will eliminate the intruder at all costs. 
Even if the body itself is destroyed, it will fulfill its duty to the very last moment.

name: Pine Cone
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description: These pinecones grow slowly under low clusters of needles. Their thick shells can't hide the warm, nutty scent inside. The kernels have a gentle pine-resin sweetness, and once roasted, they release a mellow, toasty aroma, perfect for travelers crossing the frostlands who need quick energy.

name: Dusk Honeypot
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description:
A large berry nourished by the Reactor Drive's light, gleaming with the warm amber glow of dusk. Sweet-tart, juicy, and rich in natural sugars, it is often gathered by Shepherds tending the Exoswarm, who drink its nectar to recover their strength.

Yet once a Dusk Honeypot overripens, it can leave both humans and Exoswarm intoxicated. When a Shepherd fails to return from a foraging trip, chances are they've simply indulged in one too many overripe berries without realizing it.

name: Fern Spore
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description:
An ancient fern that thrives in cool, shady spots. Its newly sprouted fronds will curl tightly at the tips, forming tender, fresh fern balls. Naturally dehydrated after being picked, these balls are easy to preserve as compact, long-lasting dried food.

Before eating, simply soak them in snowmelt to rehydrate, and they instantly regain a vibrant, fresh green, as if just harvested. The Roya often thread Fern Spores for grilling or scatter them in shaded areas to grow new ferns. Most Roya have their first taste of Fern Spores in early childhood, though it's rarely a fond memory.

name: Cradle Lichen
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
This species of lichen clings to waterside rocks, its existence as ancient as the underground cavern itself, even predating the arrival of the Exostrider. Long before the underground was called Lahai-Roi, this type of lichen had already taken root. Over countless years, it slowly eroded the hard rock, breaking it down into soil capable of nurturing new life.

In Royan mythology, Cradle Lichen symbolizes return and transformation. When burying precious objects, the Roya will weave the lichen into mats, wrapping the treasures before laying them in the earth.

name: Jade Wood
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon and Tool crafting.
bg_description:
After the geological shifts in the Royan Frostlands, some trees were frozen instantly, while others were dragged underground with the moving crust and slowly turned into minerals under long pressure. Their growth rings remain perfectly preserved, providing key clues about how Solaris's climate changed after the Lament.

In Royan stories, Jade Wood stands for time, experience, and wisdom—the embodiment of nature's memories.

name: Gemini Spore
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
A meteorite crashes into the ground, and upon it sprout spores. The fungal network grows, forming a microscopic cosmos of its own.

The Gemini Spores are extraordinarily delicate. One gentle puff and they dissolve into fine spore dust, drifting like a miniature galaxy. Yet they are also incredibly resilient, perhaps harboring faint frequencies of the "old universe." They are the only Lahai-Roi creature capable of surviving in the Voidmatter Zone.

The frequencies of the star clusters have painted them with celestial colors. The Roya use these spores as pigments to record observed galaxies or create predictive petroglyphs of their structures.

name: Rimewisp
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: No taller than the knee, fragile against the icy wind, yet it grows year after year in the cracks of frozen rocks. Only at the very instant the polar night ends does it bloom, unfurling clusters of white flowers like delicate snowflakes. The Roya call it Linnaea, meaning "the last trace of tenderness in the blizzard."

name: Arithmetic Shell
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: For most Roya, their first encounter with "calculation" in childhood wasn't a numeration table from Startorch Academy, but the cross-section of an ancient seashell. These fossilized shells, known as Arithmetic Shells, have natural interiors etched into concentric grooves, like a mathematical grid carved by the hands of the divine. Elders would teach children to drop small stones of varying colors and shapes—or tiny sticks—into the grooves, mimicking the processes of addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, distribution, and pairing…

name: The Frosted Hope in Our Stars
attributes_description: An item serving as access to the Birthday Celebration. Used to review blessings sent by your companions.
bg_description:
Cream, icing, chiffon cake... every ingredient handpicked by your friends to bake this little "sweet dream," all for the sake of your gentle smile as you make your wish.
Take a bite, and you'll taste soft, warm memories: the days you shared, the hopes left unspoken, all blending into the cake's comforting aroma.

name: Trails of Companion Stars
attributes_description: A customized 2026 birthday accessory for Rover. This circlet braided from starlight and Resonance Cord now rests in your Backpack, as if it had always been there.
bg_description: The stars and voices that travel with you are gathered within this circlet-shaped device, their energy preserved and always flowing around you. Both functional and decorative, it stands for praise, honor, and the heartfelt wish from your friends: "May your path ahead be wrapped in light and hope."

name: A Promised Moment
attributes_description: The 2026 birthday song, specially readapted by your dear friends.
bg_description:
A piece of music as gentle and bright as the afternoon breeze that once brushed your cheek. It carries shared memories of adventures, unspoken gratitude, and quiet longing. With every note, the happy days you lived through return once more. This isn't merely a song written for you. It's a moment in time, carefully kept for you.
Happy birthday, Rover.

name: Antivoid Modding Point
attributes_description: A digital permit granted upon the completion of Modding Tasks. Used to install functional modules on an expedition motorbike.
bg_description: "A full-on skill-point upgrade system, straight out of the classic RPGs! Now that's what we're talking about!"

name: All-Terrain Modding Point
attributes_description: A digital permit granted by increasing the Modding Level. Used to install functional modules on an expedition motorbike.
bg_description: "A full-on skill-point upgrade system, straight out of the classic RPGs! Now that's what we're talking about!"

name: New Student ID
attributes_description: A new student ID of Startorch Academy.
bg_description: A brand-new student ID issued upon your admission, symbolizing your identity as an official member of Startorch Academy. Though its design has changed with new patterns, the people and moments from your past remain unchanged, waiting patiently for your return.

name: LF Exoswarm Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: Fragile flower-shaped Tacet Core, resembling a dying blossom. Commonly found in areas affected by Void Storms.

name: MF Exoswarm Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: Standard flower-shaped Tacet Core, resembling a wilting blossom. Often recovered from Exoswarm corrupted by Void Storms.

name: HF Exoswarm Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: Stable flower-shaped Tacet Core, resembling a budding blossom. Occasionally found in areas with frequent Void Storm occurrences.

name: FF Exoswarm Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: Unique flower-shaped Tacet Core, resembling a fully bloomed blossom. Found only in the most dangerous areas ravaged by Void Storms. Legend has it that when a Void Storm sweeps across Lahai-Roi, this kind of Tacet Core may be seen entwined around the body of the strongest Exoswarm.

name: LF Mech Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: Fragile triangle Tacet Cord, looking broken and unstable. Commonly found in areas affected by Void Storms.

name: MF Mech Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: Standard triangle Tacet Cord, on the brink of shattering. Commonly found in areas ravaged by Void Storms.

name: HF Mech Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: Stable triangle Tacet Cord, with a strong, enduring structure. Occasionally found in areas with frequent Void Storm occurrences.

name: FF Mech Core
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: Special triangle Tacet Cord, exhibiting the most resilient structure, retaining complete frequency even under intense energy shock. Legend has it that when a Void Storm sweeps across Lahai-Roi, this kind of Tacet Cord can control even the most powerful mech humanity has ever built.

name: Fractured Exoswarm Pendant
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A broken pendant. It was a traditional Royan accessory used by the Roya to bind scattered Exoswarm components together, symbolizing connection. Among the Royan Outcasts, however, the Exoswarm are seen not as companions but as prey. They hunt the Exoswarm and take the pendants from other Roya as trophies of their victories.

name: Worn Exoswarm Pendant
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A worn pendant. It was a traditional Royan accessory used by the Roya to bind scattered Exoswarm components together, symbolizing connection. Among the Royan Outcasts, however, the Exoswarm are seen not as companions but as prey. They hunt the Exoswarm and take the pendants from other Roya as trophies of their victories.

name: Chipped Exoswarm Pendant
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A slightly worn pendant. It was a traditional Royan accessory used by the Roya to bind scattered Exoswarm components together, symbolizing connection. Among the Royan Outcasts, however, the Exoswarm are seen not as companions but as prey. They hunt the Exoswarm and take the pendants from other Roya as trophies of their victories.

name: Intact Exoswarm Pendant
attributes_description: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: A relatively intact pendant. It was a traditional Royan accessory used by the Roya to bind scattered Exoswarm components together, symbolizing connection. Among the Royan Outcasts, however, the Exoswarm are seen not as companions but as prey. They hunt the Exoswarm and take the pendants from other Roya as trophies of their victories.

attributes_description: NO CONTENT

name: Luxite
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
Due to the Exostrider's fragmented frequencies incorporated into these minerals, they have become ideal materials for both Exoswarm restoration and construction. Over the course of history, the Exoswarm has been instinctively collecting Luxite. Some friendly Exoswarm also assist the Spacetrek Collective in harvesting the mineral, providing material for Lahai-Roi's infrastructure.

Beyond its practical uses, certain Luxite deposits possess exceptional optical properties. At specific angles, they refract the Reactor's light in a fixed pattern, allowing observers to determine their position relative to the Reactor Drive. The Roya call these special stones the Eye of Sol.

name: Calamity Ender
attributes_description: Obtained after completing all challenges in Tactical Hologram: Calamity.
bg_description: A testament to conquering countless foes within the simulation. What fails to kill you only makes you stronger.

name: Bathed in Pain
attributes_description: Obtained after completing all challenges in Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain.
bg_description: Pain spun from innumerable illusions becomes the whetstone that tempers your blade.

name: Colorful Dawn
attributes_description: Colors at her fingertips, wind in her ears, and the future in her gaze—her motorbike streaks a bright trail as she rides toward a dawning horizon.
bg_description: Fully activate Lynae's Resonance Chain

name: Anchor of Ideals
attributes_description: Observe. Calculate. Calibrate. Extrapolate… And in the end, she reaches toward the stars.
bg_description: Fully activate Mornye's Resonance Chain

name: Morphable Echo - Rite of Gilded Revelation
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Rite of Gilded Revelation

2pcs Set: Spectro DMG +10%.

5pcs Set: Dealing Basic Attack DMG increases Spectro DMG by 10% for 5s, stacking up to 3 times. With 3 stacks, casting Resonance Liberation grants 40% Basic Attack DMG Bonus.
bg_description: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

name: Morphable Echo - Halo of Starry Radiance
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Halo of Starry Radiance.

2pcs Set: Healing Bonus+10%.

5pcs Set: When healing a Resonator in the team, every 1% of Off-Tune Buildup Rate grants a 0.2% ATK increase to all Resonators in the team for 4s, up to 25%. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.
bg_description: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

name: Morphable Echo - Pact of Neonlight Leap
attributes_description:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Pact of Neonlight Leap.

2pcs Set: Spectro DMG +10%.

5pcs Set: Casting Outro Skill increases the ATK of the incoming Resonator who casts Intro Skill by 15%. Each point of Tune Break Boost the incoming Resonator has additionally increases their ATK by 0.3%, up to 15%. This effect lasts for 15s, or until the Resonator is switched out.

name: Dhalifa's Forte Evaluation Report
attributes_description: Use to view information
bg_description: During Dhalifa's pre-admission physical, researchers questioned her Resonance abilities, especially how she alone survived a Void Storm. The incident drew no small amount of attention at the time, but in the end, everyone agreed it was only a miracle no one could replicate.

name: Dhalifa's Cherished Item
attributes_description: Use to view information
bg_description: Dhalifa's childhood, the first chapter of her story.

name: Silk with Names
attributes_description: Use to view information
bg_description: On the day Dhalifa was discharged, Sephira could not hold back her tears. Holding this length of silk, she crossed out Dhalifa's name right before her eyes.

name: The Genesis of the Twin Nova Project: A Developmental Retrospective (Excerpt)
attributes_description: Use to view information
bg_description: At the Institute, discussions about the Twin Nova series combat mechs never seem to die down. Their development and their elegant combat maneuvers remain a favorite topic among researchers.

name: The Genesis of the Spacetrek Explorer Project: A Developmental Retrospective (Excerpt)
attributes_description: Use to view information
bg_description: Massive wheels, an intimidating cannon, and blistering speed. Students passionate about motorbike racing love challenging the Spacetrek Explorer, but every match is, without exception, terminated by S.I.G.M.A. before the engines even start.

name: Route Constructor Operation Manual
attributes_description: Use to view information
bg_description: When the first Route Constructor rolled off the production line, every researcher unanimously acknowledged that its creation was a major milestone in Lahai-Roi's scientific expeditions.

name: Relay Station Rental Service Notice
attributes_description: Use to view information
bg_description: Relay Stations serve as hubs in Lahai-Roi's route network. They bustle with traffic and supply deliveries, making them hotspots where rumors and intel flow.

name: Rakosan's Speech (Excerpt)
attributes_description: Use to view information
bg_description: Passion alone cannot sustain an undertaking of this scale. When Rakosan delivered his speech, every department head was present, a clear indicator of how meticulously he had laid the groundwork.

name: Who Are the "Outcasts" (Excerpt)
attributes_description: Use to view information
bg_description: Don't let the Outcasts' rough speech and brash manners fool you into thinking they are all brawn and no brains. Roya are, after all, Roya. Their intellect is not to be underestimated, even if they sometimes put it to dubious use.

name: "Module"
attributes_description: Special drops from the Lahai-Roi region, which can be used to exchange for various items from I.R.I.S. at the Spacetrek Archive.
bg_description:
The Spacetrek Collective has deployed Supply Chests across Lahai-Roi, serving not only as supply containers but also as terminals recording environmental data. 
These Supply Chests continuously record surrounding data, including temperature, humidity, frequency fluctuations, and the Voidmatter Index, storing it onto a disk known as the Module.
The information contained within the Modules can be revisited and analyzed, and they also serve as training data for I.R.I.S., nourishing her deep learning capabilities and enhancing her processing power.

name: Reprise Bounty
attributes_description: Obtain to unlock Reprise Bounty
bg_description: Hear the tide again, and seek the lost treasures scattered across Solaris.

name: Lynae's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Lynae's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Mornye's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Mornye's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Trust Key
attributes_description: A symbol of a trusted bond forged with H.E.R.M.E.S. Used to unlock and upgrade various clearance levels in the rider training.
bg_description: A data entity formed when H.E.R.M.E.S. grants you access to its underlying data port. You can even sense a faint warmth. Though born from pure logical computation, it feels like the prototype of a genuine heart.

name: Exploration Data
attributes_description: Exploration Data collected from research expeditions in Lahai-Roi. Used to upgrade Lahai-Roi Pioneer Level.
bg_description: What can be observed can be sensed, and what can be sensed can be understood.

name: Custom Livery: Farewell to Yesterday
attributes_description: Used to unlock the corresponding Echo Aspect set.
bg_description:
Once bound by thorns, these wings now break free, soaring into the boundless sea of clouds.
The old laws no longer hold sway, for they will carry you to the farthest skies of freedom.

name: Purified Mechanite
attributes_description: A Mechanite free of impurities, produced only after multiple rounds of highly complex refinement procedures.
bg_description: Specialized material for the older Route Constructor model.

name: Refined Compressed Bedrock
attributes_description: A product obtained by further compressing multiple Compressed Bedrocks, a process that consumes an immense amount of energy.
bg_description: Specialized material for the older Route Constructor model.

name: Boosted Constructor Core
attributes_description: A Constructor Core operating near overload, posing serious safety risks.
bg_description: Specialized material for the older Route Constructor model.

name: Admission Letter
attributes_description: An admission letter to Startorch Academy in Lahai-Roi, which also serves as an important passport within Lahai-Roi.
bg_description:
An admission letter personally prepared by the Shorekeeper, bearing a permanent authorization.
On it is written: "Synchronist Test passed. Rabelle's Curve fitted. Exostrider adaptability confirmed."

name: Frequency Cassette Recorder
attributes_description: A standardized Terminal for the Spacetrek Collective members. Your Rabelle Cassette is stored within.
bg_description: Voices from the past are now overlaid by new memories. As the tape turns, past and future wind into a single reel.

name: Trail of Sunshine
attributes_description: A livery gifted by Lynae for your expedition motorbike, in remembrance of your encounter and the battles you weathered together.
bg_description: Carried by the winds of Lahai-Roi, she no longer fears the shadow of her past and now paints her colors freely.

name: Casket Sonar Use Permit: Roya Frostlands
attributes_description: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to Casket Sonar in the given regions.
bg_description: The use permit of the Casket Sonar in Roya Frostlands. To ensure frequency safety in Roya Frostlands, users are permitted to use the Casket Sonar only within authorized areas in compliance with this official permit.

name: Lootmapper Use Permit: Roya Frostlands
attributes_description: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to the Lootmapper in the given regions.
bg_description: The use permit of the Lootmapper in Roya Frostlands. To ensure frequency safety in Roya Frostlands, users are permitted to use the Lootmapper only within authorized areas in compliance with this official permit.

name: Skelecanth Tartare
attributes_description: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 20% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: In the Royan language, the name of this dish means "sand-buried"—a reference to how the Roya preserve Skelecanth rinsed in salt and spice. During this slow process, the fish gently ferments, its flesh turning tender and deeply flavorful.

name: Lichen Salad
attributes_description: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: In Lahai-Roi, every edible ingredient is treasured, even the humble Cradle Lichen. A handful of fresh, lightly seasoned lichen mixed with the nuts of Creeping Torchpine creates a simple yet nourishing Royan delicacy rich in dietary fiber.

name: Pine Needle Soda
attributes_description: Restores 80 STA.
bg_description: In the clear container, bubbles fizz upward, rising through the pine needles that drift and settle inside the glass. What began as a simple "use-what-you-have" nutritional drink turned out to be unexpectedly delicious. One sip, and the pine's fragrance lingers between your teeth. Crisp, aromatic, with a cooling sweetness that sweeps away every trace of fatigue.

name: Honeypot Jam
attributes_description: Grants 25% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: To make preserved Dusk Honeypot, the fully ripened berries are harvested and gently simmered to remove excess moisture, then finished with just a touch of sugar. Time stops within the jar. The berry loses its faint, intoxicating effect, but its sweetness remains, safely kept for an entire year.

name: Smoked Meat Stew
attributes_description: Grants 40% Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Thin slices of meat smoked over Creeping Torchpine needles are stewed together with the fermented drink, then served with mashed potatoes and a spoonful of Honeypot Jam. The rich fat of the Kronapuff mingles with the firm, chewy Lemming meat, offering alternating waves of flavor. On a night when the cold wind cuts to the bone, one mouthful of this dish is enough to make you forget the coldness and the exhaustion.

name: Grilled Fern Spore
attributes_description: Increases Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 32% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Young fern balls are picked, skewered, and grilled into one of the most common Royan greens. They have a noticeable bitterness. Fans say the aftertaste is pleasantly sweet, calling it "the taste of adulthood." Royan children avoid them, but anyone who can finish a whole skewer without making a face earns bragging rights.

name: Fruit Crackle
attributes_description: Grants 30% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A snack made from Dusk Honeypots coated in frozen syrup. It gets its name from the cracking sound you hear when you bite into it. It's a favorite among Royan children, though it takes some skill to crunch the sugar-coated berry without spilling its juice onto the clothes.

name: "Crack & Bolt" Fish Jar
attributes_description: Grants 50% Basic Attack DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
A Royan specialty strictly banned from Startorch Academy. Salted fish is packed into a jar and sealed with wet clay, allowing it to ferment and develop a strong, distinctive flavor. To eat it, one must crack the jar's lid.

Before eating it, make sure to keep these things in mind:
1. Always open the jar outdoors, in a wide and downwind spot.
2. Never open it indoors, in a warm place, upwind, or near a crowd.
3. Check the jar before eating. If you see a crack, put it down immediately and bolt.

name: "Munchie-More" Bun
attributes_description: Increases ATK by 10% and Crit. DMG by 20% for all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A Startorch Academy cafeteria classic. It looks like a simple carb-on-carb combo, but it's surprisingly addictive: a soft bun brushed with salad dressing, stuffed with sweet-and-savory fried noodles, topped with red pickled ginger for balance. Most people can't stop munching more.

name: Complete Nutrition Squeezy Jelly
attributes_description: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 20% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Created for Startorch Academy's students and staff, this jelly is packed with balanced nutrients and fiber, offering steady energy and long-lasting fullness. Its nozzle is designed for easy use anywhere. You can customize the flavor, but be cautious when accepting homemade jelly from others. Not every creative flavor is pleasant for your tummy.

name: Lahai-Roi Special Plant Milk
attributes_description: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 1000 for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A drink rich in nervonic acid that helps sharpen mental response. It's mellow with a hint of pine-leaf bitterness. Developed by the Academy kitchen using local Lahai-Roi ingredients, it represents their effort to explore new, sustainable food options.

name: Canned Surprise
attributes_description: Grants 50% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Cake, jam, and cream are stacked in tidy layers, then sealed inside a tin. The metal casing gives this delicate dessert a long shelf life and sturdy protection. Whether you're alone in a dorm room, working late in a lab, or out on a frozen plain, it's always there when you need a small, almost magical comfort.

name: Instant Wakeup Energy Gel Sachet
attributes_description: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Created for people who dislike sweets, this smooth, savory blend goes down easily and is gentle on the stomach. According to one student who prefers not to be named, it tastes almost exactly like a cat treat.

name: Midnight Wonder Cup Noodles
attributes_description: Increases DEF by 10% and Max HP by 20% for all Resonators in the team, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description:
Specially made by the Agronomy Wing, the cup noodles are famous for their rich aroma, which somehow manages to tempt people mostly at night. They may not be the most balanced meal, but they're undeniably one of the Academy's favorites.

The container has its own heating system, so just add drinking water and wait. If left too long and the noodles or the vegetables start multiplying unusually fast, please contact the Agronomy Wing for collection.

name: Skelecanth Tartare Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Skelecanth Tartare.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to cook Skelecanth Tartare.

attributes_description: Used to learn how to cook Lichen Salad.

name: Gleaner's Ascension Supply
attributes_description:
Open to claim one material for Resonator Ascension of your choice:
Rimewisp *1
Gemini Spore *1
Arithmetic Shell *1
Summer Flower *1
Stone Rose *1
…
bg_description: Bio samples collected by the Black Shores' Bloombearers during their fieldwork, which were later transplanted, preserved, and archived in the Bank of Life at Tethys' Deep. When necessary, specimens stored within may be used as supplies and freely accessed by personnel in need.

name: Reveler Captain's Seal
attributes_description:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

name: Falling Star that Tears Fate Apart
attributes_description:
The Burning Waves state becomes permanent. While in Burning Waves, Resonators deal 50% more DMG.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Only when the stargazer saw destruction fall with their own eyes did they realize that nothing lasts forever. Not even stars that seem to shine with endless life.

name: The Clock of Doomed Future
attributes_description:
Dealing Tune Rupture DMG to the target increases the ATK and Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 15s.
All Resonators in the team have their Off-Tune Buildup Rate increased by 100%. Enemies are spawned with Tune Rupture - Shifting for 25s.
Dealing Tune Break DMG increases All-Attribute DMG of all Resonators in the team by 50% for 30s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Like clocks and falling sand, it foretells the doom already ordained. Yet even as that fate draws near, it extends a gentle reprieve—an opportunity not to change the destined finale, but to show the stubborn dignity that defines humanity.

name: Gaze that Drowns in Dream
attributes_description:
Grants 20% Electro DMG Bonus and 20% Aero DMG Bonus.
When the active Resonator gains a Shield, they additionally recover Ember, triggered up to 1 time per second.
When the active Resonator deals damage while in the Burning Waves state, they unleash an AoE attack, dealing Electro DMG equal to 2400% of their ATK in total, triggered once every 6 seconds.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: The captain lowered his telescope, certain he had found the fabled land where treasures litter the ground like dust. He barked orders to charge through the last veil of fog that stood between them and their dream. But the fate waiting ahead was something he never anticipated.

name: "Sweetness At the Corner" Chocolate Box
attributes_description: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A chocolate box filled with sweetness, and with the bright smiles of your friends melted into every piece. Share this moment of joy together, and let each bite bring back those happy encounters waiting just around the corner.

name: Crispy Juicy Fried Pork Chops Lunchbox
attributes_description: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A generously packed lunchbox loaded with flavor. Take a firm bite of the golden, crispy pork chops and savor every last piece. The satisfaction and energy it offers will fuel your next victory!

name: "Sweetness Around the Corner" Chocolate Box Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to make "Sweetness Around the Corner" Chocolate Box.
bg_description: A recipe that details how to make "Sweetness Around the Corner" Chocolate Box.

name: Cripsy Juicy Fried Pork Chops Lunchbox Recipe
attributes_description: Used to learn how to make Crispy Juicy Fried Pork Chops Lunchbox.

name: Knowledge of the Heliogyre
attributes_description: Knowledge the Shaper gleaned from the Heliogyre, enabling you to establish a link with the Solisylum.
bg_description: With your authorization, the Shaper harnesses the full computational strength of the Heliodic Six. Through the luminous stream of data, he perceives the whole truth of Lahai-Roi.

attributes_description: A photo of you, Mornye, and Lynae under the New Sun.

attributes_description: Grants 55% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A dish Mornye invented back when she was a student in her cooking class. She skipped the decorative fruit topping and packed in extra Dusk Honeypots instead, making each bite far more calorie-dense. According to her classmates, in the name of "better nutrition," she even tried adding fish and soggy Fern Spores...

name: Rainbow Wonder Cup Noodles
attributes_description: Increases DEF by 12% and Max HP by 25% for all Resonators in the team, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: Lynae's custom version of Midnight Wonder Cup Noodles takes her favorite flavor and tweaks it further. For some reason, the steam that rises when it's cooked glows in rainbow colors. One night, after an all-nighter experiment, a student opened a cup in the lab, and colorful mist drifted up from a dim corner, making them think they were seeing things.

bg_description: An oral potion formulated by the Resonator Nursing Unit of Startorch Academy. Its core ingredient is synthesized from unique Laihai-Roi materials. Shake well before use to temporarily enhance the Tune Disruption ability of a specified Attribute.
