name: Photo from Fa the Soliskin I
attributes_description: A photo Matthew left for the Soliskin.
bg_description: The red wasteland lay silent, like a seabed after the tide had withdrawn. The wind lingered, echoing endlessly across the surface. If Fa recalls correctly, this was where they first met Matthew. He was holding that strange object in his hands, which, with a single gentle pluck, let sound bloom into the night, bright and tender. It was here that the Soliskin learned how to enjoy music for the first time, and the photo quietly preserved that moment of first encounter.

name: Photo from Fa the Soliskin II
attributes_description: A photo Matthew left for the Soliskin.
bg_description: Water cascaded down the rock face, scattering into a fine mist that shimmered softly in the air. If Fa recalls correctly, they practiced playing the music here again and again with Matthew. When they finally succeeded, the melody carried them forward like flowing water. The color of "Mi" softened into green, and the photograph retained the memory of wind and water entwined, a light that still trembles gently, like dew on a blade of grass.

name: Photo from Fa the Soliskin III
attributes_description: A photo Matthew left for the Soliskin.
bg_description: A massive metal ring caught the light, its curves reflecting a warm, muted glow. Beyond it, the plains stood in silence. If Fa recalls correctly, it was here that Matthew taught them to recover the beat with their own steps. The bass drifted like the wind across open ground, rhythm lighting up within the Soliskin themselves. The photo preserves that moment when rhythm was rejoined, a faint tremor lingering in the sunlight.

name: Restored "Music Sheet"
attributes_description: A "music sheet" marked with the notes restored by the Soliskin.
bg_description: Beginning, climax, finale... red, yellow, and green marks rest quietly in order, forming a complete score. These colors once drifted separately, carried by wind, water, and light. until they return to a single melody. It is a song they completed together. And it remains, even now, a gentle echo that the Soliskin still remember.

name: Void Storm Generator
attributes_description: A device containing Voidmatter. Can be used to manually induce Void Storms.
bg_description: By storing Voidworm frequency, the device emits Voidmatter within a set radius, generating an artificial Void Storm.

name: Huafeng's Vehicle Key
attributes_description: A vehicle key found in a sealed case at the bottom of Sundermere.
bg_description:
A vehicle key found in a sealed case at the bottom of Sundermere.

The key of Huafeng's very first vehicle. A fine line engraved on its surface reads: "No.1 Biker." It's the key to both his old dream and his present success. Though the vehicle itself is long gone, Huafeng hopes this cheering line will bring you godspeed wherever the track leads.

name: Phantom: Zip Zap
attributes_description: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

name: Our Choice
attributes_description: Nameless Explorer's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
The broken helmet offers no clue to the explorer's identity, only a faint string of numbers: 1957104192825. 

It points back to lost times, leaving the present shrouded in mystery. The starlight once danced across its surface, but also scarred it with abyssal marks. Yet, even so, the choice would be repeated. Again and again.

name: Gold in Memory
attributes_description: Sigillum's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
bg_description: Memories of that person—their strength and frailty, their suffering and joy, everything that was them—remain only in this battered yet radiant golden fragment.

name: Starfall Coin
attributes_description: A coin frequency found at Forever Fest. Can be exchanged for decorations from Cobb Copo.
bg_description: An ancient coin frequency long withdrawn from circulation. Similar in form to Monnaie, it bears the pattern of a flowing star.

name: Lollo Voucher
attributes_description: A reward voucher from Lollo Logistics, issued to party supporters. Can be exchanged for generous rewards provided by Lollo Logistics.
bg_description: "Lollo Party, may you be happy everyday!"

name: Weekly Subscription
attributes_description: Used to claim login rewards on specific days within 15 days.
bg_description: Get unlimited access to the Celestial Observatory for a specified period with this pass.

name: Invitation to the Fest
attributes_description: A letter someone left at Forever Fest, inviting you to join a game and help boost the <color=Highlight>Vibe Gauge</color>.
bg_description:
"When revelry swells, and laughter fills the air, you will be answered with a gentle fall of stars."
The handwriting is stylish.
The envelope carries a blended scent of orange juice, lemon peel, and grenadine, a flavor some fondly call "Starfall."

name: Group Photo Under the New Sun
attributes_description: A photo of you, Mornye, and Lynae under the New Sun.
bg_description:
A photo of you, Mornye, and Lynae under the New Sun. With the light of Helios, a brighter future reveals before you.

"To freedom. To civilization. To new beginnings."

name: Law of Stars
attributes_description: Reach 5,000 Journey Points in "Starpaths Intertwined"
bg_description: Even if you were to lose everything, you would still set out to modulate the stars.

name: Roving Lodestar
attributes_description: A special reward obtained from the "Full Throttle! Bolt & Blitz!" event.
bg_description: There will always be those who follow, and their headlights never fade. Along the trail you blazed, the sky will stay bright with these burning stars.

name: Wings to Spring
attributes_description:
It began as a dream that took root in a child's heart, then was folded into paper wings and cast upon the spring breeze, flying to the end of the stars.
Now, I can finally walk beside you.
bg_description: Fully activate Aemeath's Resonance Chain

name: Golden Diagnosis
attributes_description: Under the frozen earth, time rusts like iron. He strips away gold, as if stripping away time itself.
bg_description: Fully activate Luuk Herssen's Resonance Chain

name: Adventurer's Starter Pack
attributes_description: Obtain to receive the items inside.

name: Moss Amber
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description: A "time capsule" preserving Lahai-Roi's warmer days. Tree resin encased the moss below, holding a fleeting moment in time. When this frozen memory shatters, even paused life may find a chance to begin anew.

name: Edelschnee
attributes_description: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
bg_description:
In the harsh frostlands, the carnivorous Edelschnee has developed a unique survival strategy.

At rest, it curls into a fluffy snowball. When it senses a wounded creature nearby, it gently unfurls, wrapping the being in its delicate tendrils to feed. While doing so, it cleans wounds and secretes a mild anesthetic, while its long fibers cover and protect the injury.

Creatures of the frostlands often seek Edelschnee for healing. Once the seed balls mature, they disperse through the environment. Its fluffy fibers are used for textiles and medicine, making Edelschnee an essential resource for the Roya.

name: Aemeath's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Aemeath's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

name: Luuk Herssen's Waveband
attributes_description: Can be used to activate Luuk Herssen's Resonance Chain.
bg_description: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

attributes_description:

<color=Rare4>Gold in Memory x1</color>

name: Starbright Resonance
attributes_description: A crown that casts countless rays of starlight.
bg_description: Rays of starlight and distant sounds are frozen within this crown at this very moment. It is a gift to you—the one who has always watched over them.

name: Transducer
attributes_description: Used to modify the Substats of a fully-tuned 5-Star Echo.
bg_description: A device designed to manipulate flowing frequencies. It blends human ingenuity with complex frequencies, making change tangible and controllable. With it, you can convert frequencies into the most functional forms you desire.

name: Spacetrek Datachip
attributes_description: An item issued by the Spacetrek Collective to researchers stationed in the frostlands. Used as a token for Tracing Progress.
bg_description: Issued by the Spacetrek Collective to researchers stationed in the frostlands, this item enables the recording of field logs and research data at any time. Its specialized chip is engineered to survive the region's volatile climate and extreme conditions. To the researchers, it is more than a tool—it is a beacon of knowledge. They entrust it with the hard-earned insights of their expeditions, and bury these devices across the frozen expanse to guide those who come after.

I will touch them. I will... unravel them.

name: Waxweaver Web
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
Legend has it that the Waxweavers were once Solsworns, cursed for failing their sacred charge.

Day in and day out, they observe the light. Day in and day out, they weave the light. Their spinning begins with the first rays of dawn and concludes at the hour of twilight when the finished web is retrieved. This endless vigil continues, as if they are still desperately striving to fulfill the duty they abandoned, weaving a web of their own atonement.

For this reason, the Roya maintain a solemn, religious reverence and deep pity for the Waxweavers.

When melted, their silk can be applied to wounds to aid healing, or used as a water-resistant coating.

name: Stellar Anchor of Memories
attributes_description: Use to claim one of the three Resonators: <color=#ffd12f>Shorekeeper, Camellya, Jinhsi</color>, or 8 Transducers.
bg_description: To the waves of the past, I call upon you. Following the tides of memory, you arrive as promised.

name: 5-Star Weapon Supply Chest - Synth Armament
attributes_description: Open to claim one of the following weapons: <color=#ffd12f>Laser Shearer, Radiance Cleaver, Phasic Homogenizer, Pulsation Bracer, Boson Astrolabe.</color>
bg_description: A custom weapon supply chest commissioned by the Spacetrek Collective. Inside lies the Synth Armament series, the dream equipment for every Academy student and researcher.

name: Voyaging Star Chassis Set
attributes_description: Used to unlock the corresponding Echo Aspect set.
bg_description:
Once bound by thorns, these wings now break free, soaring into the boundless sea of clouds.
The old laws no longer hold sway, for they will carry you to the farthest skies of freedom.

name: Frostwort
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description:
Frostwort has a structure remarkably similar to neural tissue. Over millennia of independent evolution, it has gained the ability to transmit simple signals through its symbiotic network, helping it grow efficiently and repair itself.

The Roya dry Frostwort and use it to brew drinks, though it is reserved only for adults.

name: Foxtail Kelp
attributes_description: A material used for Cooking.
bg_description:
Foxtail Kelp is entirely edible. Its long, fragile stems often break off and drift to the shore, looking like lost walking sticks or pipes.

The Roya call it the "Traveler’s Staff." For lost travelers trapped in caves, it can serve as a reliable source of food until they reach safety. Children also play with the stems, sparring with one another to see whose kelp lasts the longest.

name: Meteoric Iron
attributes_description: A material used for Synthesis.
bg_description:
Meteoric Iron is naturally magnetic and often paired with Sunstone to guide herders through snowstorms. Its excellent heat conductivity also makes cookware crafted from it highly prized, reducing cooking time while adding unique flavors.

Within the iron are dense gems formed under immense pressure when it fell, known as Star Marks among the Roya. They are extremely hard and valuable outside Lahai-Roi. Some have been caught defying Royan rules to extract and trade them.

name: Super Snowfluff Storm
attributes_description: Restores 100 points of STA.
bg_description:
Soft, snow-white ice cream floats atop dark coffee, with an ice in the shape of a Snowfluff Seal resting peacefully within. A staple for those burning the midnight oil in the library, this drink balances the bitterness with a light, creamy sweetness. Every sip is a quiet moment of refreshment.

This drink is Aemys's award-winning creation from the Startorch Academy Beverage Innovation Contest. She once said that it was inspired by homesickness.

That sounded like a joke, perhaps, but not entirely. Those childhood days spent on the silent frostlands, playing with her family and the seals, now feel far away. And yet, the memories still linger in her mind.

name: Hearty Double-Smoked Stew
attributes_description: Grants 44% Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: This stew is made with vegetables and poultry smoked separately, then simmered together in one pot to bring out a layered, comforting aroma. The vegetables add a light, woodsy freshness, while the chicken brings a rich, savory depth, all coming together in a warm, golden broth. Luuk often cooks it on a small tabletop stove after work. He says the rising steam and gentle smell help people relax the moment they step inside, like sitting down to a warm meal shared among friends.

name: Sweet Candy
attributes_description: Candy wrapped in gleaming paper, carrying a gentle sweetness.
bg_description:
Wrapped in translucent, colorful candy paper, the sweets are firm to the touch. Once in the mouth, they release a gentle, lingering sweetness.

A little sweetness keeps numbness at bay. You understand and accept his kindness, even though a faint trace of bitterness still lingers beneath the sugar.

name: Fleeting Snowfluff Fan Meeting Poster
attributes_description: A poster alive with bright colors, radiating the passion of its fans.
bg_description:
After the once-beloved voice faded from campus, fans of Fleeting Snowfluff found a haven on her clean, vibrant website. They left behind a trail of messages, wishes, and memories. Year after year, those words gathered like fallen leaves, slowly forming a genuine community.

The singer may be long absent, yet the youthful warmth of her voice still echoes through this academy.

name: Fan Meeting Keepsake Photo
attributes_description: A keepsake photo from the fan meeting, capturing a moment of music and joy.
bg_description:
Aemeath sings onstage, her voice light and warm, floating effortlessly through the air. You applaud from below. When the song ends, she slips in beside you and flashes a bright smile toward the camera.

Click.

In this moment, a song left unfinished more than a decade ago finally feels complete. Seeing Aemeath smile like this always lifts your spirits, and before you realize it, you're smiling too.

name: That Child's Talisman
attributes_description: A softly contoured talisman with a lustrous finish, engraved with Royan patterns.
bg_description:
A Royan talisman once cherished by a young owner, only to be lost to the whims of fate.
Now that it has found its way back to you, it feels like a silent proof that your efforts were never in vain. The world lies calm and beautiful before you at this moment, just as you always hoped it would on your journey.

The brief yet indelible time you two shared began with this talisman, and now, with its return, it has come full circle.

name: Fan Meeting Keepsake Photo
attributes_description: A keepsake photo from the fan meeting, capturing a moment of music and joy.
bg_description:
Aemeath sings onstage, her voice light and warm, floating effortlessly through the air. You applaud from below. When the song ends, she slips in beside you and flashes a bright smile toward the camera.

In this moment, a song left unfinished more than a decade ago finally feels complete. Seeing Aemeath smile like this always lifts your spirits, and before you realize it, you're smiling too.

bg_description: The rich, roasted aroma of coffee blends with a gentle hint of milk, creating a smooth, layered flavor in every sip. On every morning in Solaris, take this with you, and say "good morning" to yourself and to the world.

name: Spicy Crispy Chicken Burger
attributes_description: Increases ATK by 10% and Crit. DMG by 20% for all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
bg_description: A fried drumstick with a crisp golden crust and tender meat inside, finished with a house-made spicy sauce. It's savory with just the right kick, making every bite deeply satisfying.

name: Inscriber - Lone Light in the Long Night
attributes_description:
Enemies take 15% more total DMG and 50% more Tune Rupture DMG.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: The lantern is entombed in frost, as if a piece of history had been buried within. Someone cradled it, sinking into a deep slumber until the first breath of spring.

name: Hopebearer - Lone Light in the Long Night
attributes_description:
Enemies take 15% more total DMG. Resonators deal 15% more total DMG to enemies in Tune Strain - Interfered or Tune Strain - Shifting.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: Here, the light has shed its arrogance and taken a new name: hope.

name: Fabricator - Lone Light in the Long Night
attributes_description:
Enemies take 15% more total DMG. Echo Skill deals 25% more total DMG.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: The thorns of the wildflowers had encased the glass, and creeping vines traced the curve of her hand. The girl watched for a long time, and finally reached toward the flame beneath the greenery.

name: Solacer - Lone Light in the Long Night
attributes_description:
Enemies take 15% more total DMG. Inflicting Negative Status on the enemies increases total DMG by 15% for 30s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
bg_description: The night was far too long, so long that even the end of the endless dark was nowhere to be found. Holding tight to the final spark of light in her arms, in her haze, she mistook it for the breaking dawn.

name: Customized Squeezy Jelly
attributes_description: According to food safety inspections, each ingredient is entirely ordinary. And yet, together they form a flavor both complex and unexpectedly new.
bg_description: The first taste of it somehow stirs a sense of nostalgia.

name: Old Music Record
attributes_description: A salvaged vinyl record. The surface has been meticulously cleaned, yet the scars of time remain plainly visible.
bg_description: Your analysis of its residual frequencies reveals only a short, indistinct hum, as if carrying words that could never quite be spoken aloud.
